Title: Nyamasheke:Bishimiye ibyiza bakomeje kugezwaho nyuma yo kureka ibyangiza ishyamba rya Nyungwe
Body:
Abaturiye Pariki ya Nyungwe mu karere ka Nyamasheke bavuga ko abenshi muri bo bacitse kubikorwa byo kubangamira ibinyabuzima biri mu ishyamba rya Nyungwe kubera ibikorwa byâ€™iterambere ubuyobozi bwâ€™igihugu bubakorera.
Abaturiye Pariki ya Nyungwe mu karere ka Nyamasheke bavuga ko abenshi muri bo bacitse kubikorwa byo kubangamira ibinyabuzima biri mu ishyamba rya Nyungwe kubera ibikorwa byâ€™iterambere ubuyobozi bwâ€™igihugu bubakorera.
Ibi babigarutseho kuri uyu wa Gatandatu nyuma yâ€™igikorwa cyo gusiganwa ku maguru cyabereye mu ishyamba rya Nyungwe cyateguwe ku bufatanye bwâ€™ikigo cyâ€™igihugu gishinzwe iterambere RDB, akarere ka Nyamasheke ndetse nâ€™abikorera.
Mbere wasangaga abaturiye Pariki ya Nyungwe batunzwe no guhiga inyamanswa, gutwika amakara no gutema ibiti muri iri shyamba. Kuri ubu ngo siko bikimeze kuko aho batangiye kwitabwaho bakubakirwa ibikorwa remezo biva mu musaruro wâ€™amafaranga ava mu bukerarugendo, amakoperative yabo agatezwa imbere ngo ubuzima bwarahindutse kuburyo bafata iya mbere mu guhashya ba rushimusi.
Ntirenganya Sylver yagize ati â€œKugira ngo utijandika mu bikorwa byo kwangiza ishyamba hari ibikorwa bigomba kuguhuza birimo kubona imyidagaduro nkâ€™iyi kandi urabona ko cyatumye tunezerwa kandi abakora ubucuruzi bacuruje nâ€™abafite ibikorwa byâ€™umuco bungutse. Uyu ni umwanya wo gukangurira abantu kubungabunga ibidukikije.â€
Munganyinka Esther ati â€œIki gikorwa ni kiza cyaje gikenewe kubera ko iyo abakerarugendo baje batugana mu gihugu cyacu tubona bidususurutsa. Mbere twarashimutaga ariko ibikorwa nkâ€™ibi biradufasha cyane bikaduhuza. Nkanjye nkora ubukorikori bushingiye ku mateka.â€
Umuyobozi wâ€™akarere ka Nyamasheke, Mukamasabo Apollonie yavuze ko icyo gikorwa kibafasha kwerekana ibyiza bya Nyungwe kandi kikaba igikorwa cyo gushishikariza abaturage kureka ubushimusi.
Ati â€œiki gikorwa giha isura nziza abaturage bacu iyo turi kubereka ko ari igikorwa gishobora kuzana abashoramari mu karere kacu bituma nâ€™umuturage wacu avuga ko ya nyamanswa izana umushoramari akinjiza amadovize bigatuma adashobora kuyigirira nabi cyangwa ngo abe yayica. Ibi nabyo biri gutuma abaturage babona za nyamanswa ko zibafitiye akamaro.â€
Abasiganwe bari biganjemo abanyamahanga nâ€™Abanyarwanda bahagurukiye ku Kitabi mu karere ka Nyamagabe, abandi baturuka Pindura (hagati muri Nyungwe), abandi bava Kamiranzovu biruka nâ€™amaguru, bose basoreza mu marembo asohoka muri Pariki ya Nyungwe mu karere ka Nyamasheke.
Abasoganywe bose bambitswe imidari kuko iri rushanwa ryari rigamije gukora siporo mu rwego rwo kugira ubuzima bwiza, kwerekana ibyiza bya Nyungwe no gushishikariza abaturiye Pariki kuyibungabunga.

Title: Perezida Kagame yafunguye â€œOne&Only Gorillaâ€™s Nestâ€, hoteli yuzuye itwaye miliyoni 65 zâ€™amadolari
Body:
Perezida Kagame yafunguye ku mugaragaro hoteli ya â€œOne&Only Gorillaâ€™s Nestâ€ iherereye mu Kinigi mu Karere ka Musanze, yizeza abashoramari bâ€™Abanya-Dubai ba nyirayo ko u Rwanda ruzita ku bikorwa byabo ku buryo bibyarira inyungu impande zombi.
Perezida Kagame yafunguye ku mugaragaro hoteli ya â€œOne&Only Gorillaâ€™s Nestâ€ iherereye mu Kinigi mu Karere ka Musanze, yizeza abashoramari bâ€™Abanya-Dubai ba nyirayo ko u Rwanda ruzita ku bikorwa byabo ku buryo bibyarira inyungu impande zombi.
Iyi hoteli yuzuye umwaka ushize itwaye miliyoni 65 zâ€™amadolari ya Amerika nyuma yâ€™imyaka ibiri yubakwa.
Ifite ibyumba 21 biri mu byiciro bine, icya mbere gifite ibyumba 10, igikurikiraho gifite ibyumba bine, ikindi bitanu naho icya nyuma kikagira ibyumba bibiri. Uko bikurikirana, ni nako bitandukanye mu biciro, mu bunini no mu bwiza.
Bitatse mu buryo bwa Kinyarwanda hakoreshejwe imigongo, hakabamo nâ€™ibindi bikoresho byâ€™ubugeni.
Perezida Kagame na Madamu Jeannette Kagame nibo bitabiriye umuhango wo kuyifungura ku mugaragaro wabaye kuri uyu wa Kane. Witabiriwe na Mohammed Ibrahim Al Shaibani, ukuriye â€œKerzner Internationalâ€ igenzura amahoteli ya One&Only.
Perezida Kagame yashimye iri shoramari, avuga ko ribereye u Rwanda nâ€™inshuti zarwo zarigizemo uruhare zo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe zâ€™Abarabu i Dubai.
Ati â€œNdashaka kubashimira ku ishoramari ryanyu mwakoze hamwe natwe. Dufite inshingano zo guharanira ko twese twungukira muri iri shoramari.â€
Yavuze ko iri shoramari riri ku rwego rwo hejuru rijyanye nâ€™icyerekezo cyâ€™u Rwanda cyo kugira ibikorwa remezo byiza nka One & Only zombi yaba iyi yafunguwe nâ€™indi iri muri Nyungwe.
Ati â€œTuzabifata nkâ€™ibyacu, nkâ€™ibyanyu, kandi tuzakomeza kubyongerera agaciro mu buryo butandukanye.â€
Mohammed Ibrahim Al Shaibani uyobora Kerzner International icunga amahoteli ya One & Only, yashimiye abagize uruhare mu kuba iyi hoteli yatashywe.
Yavuze ko muri uyu mwaka wa 2020 bazafungura amahoteli nkâ€™aya ane ahantu hatandukanye ariko ko â€œmbabwije ukuri, nta muntu nâ€™umwe wambajije ahandi usibye mu Rwanda, buri wese yambazaga ngo ni ryari mu Rwanda muzasoza kugira ngo tujye gusura. Birasa nâ€™aho iki gihugu gifite ibintu byinshi byiza bikurura abantu, kureba amafoto yâ€™aha yatangariwe nâ€™abantu benshiâ€.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu gishinzwe Iterambere, RDB, Clare Akamanzi, yavuze ko u Rwanda rugize izi hoteli ebyiri, ashimira Kerzner ku cyizere yagiriye u Rwanda.
Yavuze ko u Rwanda rukomeje gukora ibishoboka byose kugira ngo mu gihe ba mukerarugendo barusuye, babe ahantu hatekanye kandi ko bikomeje gutanga umusaruro.
One and Only Gorillaâ€™s Nest yiyongereye ku zindi nyubako ebyiri zikomeye zakira ba mukerarugendo bo ku rwego rwo hejuru mu bice byâ€™ibirunga, zirimo Bisate lodge kuri uyu wa Gatanu yahawe inyenyeri eshanu na Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House, yatangije ibikorwa mu Rwanda ku wa 1 Kanama 2019.

Title: Akarere ka Bugesera karifuza kubyaza umusaruro ibiyaga gafite mu bukerarugendo
Body:
Ubuyobozi bwâ€™akarere ka Bugesera bwahamagariye abashoramari kubyaza umusaruro ibiyaga gafite, bigatunganywa neza ku buryo bikurura ba mukerarugendo.
Ubuyobozi bwâ€™akarere ka Bugesera bwahamagariye abashoramari kubyaza umusaruro ibiyaga gafite, bigatunganywa neza ku buryo bikurura ba mukerarugendo.
Ubusanzwe akarere ka Bugesera gafite ibiyaga icyenda birimo bibiri binini nka Rweru na Cyohoha.
Nubwo ari kamwe mu turere dufite ibiyaga byinshi, nta musaruro ugaragra bitanga haba mu bijyanye nâ€™ubukerarugendo cyangwa kuba byakwifashishwa mu buhinzi buteye imbere bwifashisha kuhira muri ako karere kakunze kurangwamo amapfa cyane.
Meya wâ€™akarere ka Bugesera, Mutabazi Richard aherutse kubwira IGIHE ko bifuza kubyaza umusaruro ibyo biyaga, bagahamagarira abashoramari kuhubaka amahoteli nâ€™ibindi bigezweho bikurura ba mukerarugendo.
Yagize ati â€œTuri gukangurira abashoramari gukora muri icyo cyiciro. Dufite ibiyaga icyenda ariko nta na kimwe kiriho inkombe zigezweho ikindi ugendeye ku miterere yacu ntabwo ari bya biyaga bifite umucanga, ni bigufi ariko uko byaba bimeze kose hakenewe abashoramo imari mu bijyanye nâ€™imyidagaduro.â€
Mu Bugesera ni hamwe mu bice byâ€™igihugu biri gutera imbere cyane, byâ€™umwihariko umujyi wa Nyamata uri hafi yâ€™ahari kubakwa ikibuga cyâ€™indege gishya kizaba ari icya mbere kinini mu Rwanda.
Ni agace kari kuzamurwamo inzu nyinshi kandi zigezweho zo guturamo. Meya Mutabazi avuga ko ikibura ari uburyo bwâ€™imyidagaduro ku buryo abantu benshi bifuza kuza gutura muri ako karere, bakajya gukora ahandi ariho baturutse.
Ati â€œAkarere kacu gakwiriye kuba akarere gasurwa, abantu bakaza kuharuhukira bakava mu murwa mukuru bakaza hano, bakabona ibikorwa byinshi byâ€™imyidagadauro bakaruhuka , abashaka kuhatura bakaza bakajya gukora baturutse hano.â€
Mu guhamagaririra abashoramari kuza muri ako karere, Meya Mutabazi avuga ko bakeneye abantu bahubaka ibikorwa byâ€™imyidagaduro nkâ€™utubyiniro nâ€™ibindi bituma urubyiruko ruhuga, aho gushidukira kujya mu mujyi wa Kigali.
Ati â€œInaha usanga nta kabyiniro gahari, ugasanga urubyiruko ruri inaha rushaka gusohokera i Kigali. Kwambuka amazi ugiye kubyina twumva bidasobanutse mu karere kacu, twagombye kuba dufite ibyo bikorwa byose. Turakorana nâ€™abashoramari batandukanye, turebe ko harimo ababyumva vuba.â€
Aka karere gaherutse kuzurizwa stade nshya igezweho, nka kimwe mu bikorwa remezo byâ€™imyidagaduro.
Mutabazi avuga ko ibiyaga bihari biramutse bibyajwe umusaruro, bigashyirwaho ibikurura ba mukerarugendo byakwinjiriza akarere, nâ€™abagatuye bakabona imirimo.
Ibiyaga icyenda biboneka mu karere ka Bugesera bifite ubuso bwa hegitari 10,635 byose hamwe.

Title: Rusizi: Ni iki cyadindije umushinga wa hoteli imeze nkâ€™ubwato yagombaga kubakwa ku kirwa?
Body:
Mu mwaka wa 2016 nibwo hatangajwe ko ku kirwa cya Gihaya hagiye kubakwa hoteli izaba ikoze mu ishusho yâ€™ubwato bumeze nkâ€™ubwa Titanic. Ni hoteli yagombaga kuzura bitarenze 2019 ariko kugeza ubu ntirubakwa.
Mu mwaka wa 2016 nibwo hatangajwe ko ku kirwa cya Gihaya hagiye kubakwa hoteli izaba ikoze mu ishusho yâ€™ubwato bumeze nkâ€™ubwa Titanic. Ni hoteli yagombaga kuzura bitarenze 2019 ariko kugeza ubu ntirubakwa.
Gihaya Island Resort yagombaga kuba ifite ishusho nkâ€™iyâ€™ubwato bwa Titanic ndetse igizwe nâ€™amagorofa atatu, ikubakwa mu Kagari ka Gihaya mu murenge wa Gihundwe, ku buso buri hagati ya hegitari 20 na 40.
Ugeze kuri iki kirwa usanga abahatuye bari mu mirimo yabo nkâ€™ibisanzwe ndetse nta nâ€™igikorwa kigaragaza iyubakwa ryâ€™iyi hoteli.
Nyabyenda Faustin, umwe mu bahatuye ati â€œUrebye imirimo yâ€™abaturage irakomeje ariko hoteli yo ntituzi ibyayo kuko tubona nta cyahindutse uretse ko hari abaturage bacye baguriye.â€
Muneza Nira, nyiri uyu mushinga avuga ko bahuye nâ€™imbogamizi nyinshi zituma badatangira ibikorwa ariko ko ubu ziri kugenda zicyemuka kuburyo imirimo yo kubaka izatangira muri Nyakanga cyangwa Kanama uyu mwaka.
Ati â€œTwagize ikibazo cyâ€™ibyangombwa, ibyangombwa byaho byangombaga guhuzwa bikaba icyangombwa kimwe kuko hari ubutaka bwâ€™abaturage benshi, hagiye haza nâ€™ibindi bibazo byinshi byo kugurira abantu aho hari abaturage wasangaga ubutaka butabanditseho.â€
Yakomeje agira ati â€œ Twahuye nâ€™ikindi kibazo kuko hatari haragenewe amahotei cyangwa ubuhinzi, ubu turi mu ndunduro twabonye inyandiko ko aho hantu hashobora guhuzwa, hakaba ubutaka bumwe. Tuzatangira ibikorwa byâ€™ibanze kuburyo bitakagombye kurenza muri 2022.â€
Muneza yavuze mu gice cya mbere himuwe imiryango igera muri 50 ariko ko hoteli ifite ibice bitatu kuburyo bizarangira abaturage bose bimuwe hakubakwa ibikorwa byâ€™ubukerarugendo.
Gihaya Island Resort biteganyijwe ko izuzura itwaye akayabo ka miliyoni 56 zâ€™amadolari ya Amerika.

Title: Abaholandi barimo Van Gaal bagaragaje urwibutso basigaranye mu rugendo bagiriye mu Rwanda
Body:
Louis Van Gaal wabaye umutoza ukomeye mu makipe ya FC Barcelone, Bayern Munich, Manchester United no mu Ikipe yâ€™Igihugu yâ€™u Buholandi, yavuze ku bihe bidasanzwe yagiriye mu Rwanda, agaragaza ko iki ari igihugu kidasanzwe cyakoze ibikomeye mu myaka 26 ishize.
Louis Van Gaal wabaye umutoza ukomeye mu makipe ya FC Barcelone, Bayern Munich, Manchester United no mu Ikipe yâ€™Igihugu yâ€™u Buholandi, yavuze ku bihe bidasanzwe yagiriye mu Rwanda, agaragaza ko iki ari igihugu kidasanzwe cyakoze ibikomeye mu myaka 26 ishize.
Louis Van Gaal yabigarutseho ku wa 20 Mutarama 2020 mu gikorwa cyiswe B2B cyahuje abaserukiye ibigo bitwara abakerarugendo mu Rwanda nâ€™ibigo binini byo mu Buholandi bicuruza ubukerarugendo.
Iki gikorwa cyateguwe na Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda mu Buholandi cyabereye i LaHaye, u Rwanda rwari ruhagarariwe nâ€™ibigo birimo Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere (RDB), Sosiyete Nyarwanda yâ€™Ubwikorezi bwo mu Kirere, RwandAir, Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda mu Buholandi nâ€™ibigo byâ€™ubukerarugendo birimo Amahoro Tours, Palast Tours and Travel na Wildlife Tours-Rwanda.
Ibi bigo byari byitabiriye Imurikagurisha Mpuzamahanga ryâ€™Ubukerarugendo rya Vakantiebeurs mu Mujyi wa Utrecht mu Buholandi. Byarimurikiyemo amahirwe yâ€™ubukerarugendo ari mu gihugu binyuze muri gahunda ya â€˜Visit Rwandaâ€™.
Abayobozi babyo ku mugoroba wo ku wa Mbere bahuye nâ€™Abaholandi basuye u Rwanda hagamijwe kungurana ibitekerezo, kugaragaza uko bakiriwe no gutanga inama ku byanozwa kugira ngo bakomeze bishimire serivisi bahabwa nkâ€™abakerarugendo.
Muri Nzeri 2019, Van Gaal ni umwe mu banyacyubahiro 25 bise amazina abana bâ€™ingagi mu Rwanda, ni umuhango wabereye mu karere ka Musanze witabirwa kandi na Perezida Paul Kagame.
Aloysius Paulus Maria van Gaal OON wâ€™imyaka 68 yavuze ko ibyo yishimiye mu Rwanda harimo kuba yarise izina umwana wâ€™ingagi, igikorwa yavuze ko ari ibyâ€™agaciro.
Yagize ati â€œIkindi nahabonye ni abantu badasanzwe kubera ko mu Rwanda mu myaka 25 ishize ibintu byari bimeze nabi, ariko iyo urebye uko bimeze bakemuye ibyo bibazo, ibi kandi ni ukubera umukuru wâ€™igihugu, njye nkâ€™umutoza ndabizi ko bitoroshye guhindura imyumvire mu buryo bworoshye, bitwara igihe ariko we yarabikoze.â€
â€œAbantu baho baratandukanye, ni abantu ubona ko bitonze kandi bazi kwakira abashyitsi, mu Rwanda ni abantu bazi kureba kure kandi ikirere cyaho ni cyiza, twagiye mu modoka nini, byari bishimishije.â€
Yavuze ko amahoteli yo mu Rwanda ari meza, agaragaza ko abantu bashobora gukeka ko wenda yagiye muri hoteli yâ€™inyenyeri eshanu ariko ko atari byo.
Yavuze ko aho wajya hose uhasanga ibintu byiza, ibiryo ndetse hakaba hari nâ€™isuku iri hejuru.
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu Buholandi, Karabaranga Jean Pierre, yavuze ko hari byinshi ibihugu byombi bisangiye, harimo ko haba mu Rwanda no muri iki gihugu abantu usanga bafite inzozi zo kugera kure mu kubaho neza.
Yagize ati â€œIyo urebye mu myaka 25 ishize ukareba aho twavuye nâ€™aho turi uyu munsi, ni ukubera ko Abanyarwanda twavuze tuti tugomba kugira imibereho myiza kandi turabiharanira.â€
Ku birebana no gusura u Rwanda, Amb. Karabaranga yagize ati â€œDufite iterambere, dufite ahantu hafite ikirere cyiza, imisozi myiza kandi nzi neza ko abenshi muri mwe usanga bagenda ahantu harambitse ariko twe byose turabyishimira.â€
Umuyobozi muri RDB Ushinzwe kumenyekanisha Ubukerarugendo, Mutesi Linda, yavuze ko u Rwanda ari igihugu gitekanye, benshi bishimira gusura.
Ati â€œU Rwanda ni igihugu gishimishije, ni igihugu cyiza kandi kigira ibihe byiza, iki ni kimwe mu bihugu byiza mu kugira umutekano mu kubitemberamo. Dufite ahantu heza ho gusura harimo mu Burasirazuba bwâ€™u Rwanda, mu Majyepfo, mu Majyaruguru yâ€™u Rwanda dufite ingagi zâ€™Ibirunga zisangwa gusa mu bihugu bitatu ku Isi.â€
â€œMu Burengerazuba bwâ€™u Rwanda tuhafite Ikiyaga cya Kivu ukaba wahafatira amafoto meza, dufite kandi uburyo bwiza bwo kugera muri izo parike kuko dufite kajugujugu zishobora kuva ku Kibuga cyâ€™indege i Kanombe zijyayo, uramutse ushaka kujyayo hari RwandAir iva Brussels mu Bubiligi inshuro enye mu cyumweru ukagera i Kigali.â€
Yababwiye kandi ko kugira ngo ubone VISA bidasaba ko uyakira mu gihugu urimo, ahubwo iyo ugeze ku kibuga cyâ€™indege mu Rwanda uhita uyibahwa.
Kuri ubu isoko ryo mu Buholandi riza mu myanya umunani ya mbere, mu kugira abakerarugendo benshi bakorana nâ€™u Rwanda. Abarusura biyongereyeho 11.9Â %, bavuye ku 4918 mu 2017 bagera kuri 5501 mu 2018.
Guverinoma yihaye intego ko mu 2024 inyungu u Rwanda ruvana mu bukerarugendo izagera kuri miliyoni $800 zivuye kuri miliyoni $404 yinjiye mu 2017.

Title: Umunyamakuru wâ€™icyamamare mu Buholandi yaryohewe nâ€™ibyiza byâ€™u Rwanda
Body:
Umunyamakuru ukomeye wo mu Buholandi, Humberto Tan, yaryohewe nâ€™ibyiza byâ€™u Rwanda, nyuma yo gusura ingagi zo mu birunga zitaba ahandi ku Isi akanirebera ibyiza bitatse Pariki yâ€™Igihugu yâ€™Akagera.
Umunyamakuru ukomeye wo mu Buholandi, Humberto Tan, yaryohewe nâ€™ibyiza byâ€™u Rwanda, nyuma yo gusura ingagi zo mu birunga zitaba ahandi ku Isi akanirebera ibyiza bitatse Pariki yâ€™Igihugu yâ€™Akagera.
Humberto ni umunyamakuru wâ€™icyamamare kuri Televiziyo ya RTL mu Buholandi, ayobora ibiganiro kuri iyi televiziyo ya mbere mu gutambutsa ibiganiro byâ€™ubucuruzi. Uretse kuba umunyamakuru wâ€™umwuga, Humberto ni umufotozi utarabigize umwuga, akurikirwa nâ€™abasaga 378,000 kuri Instagram.
Ishingiye ku kuba ari umunyamakuru wâ€™icyamamare kandi akurikirwa nâ€™abantu benshi ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda mu Buholandi ifatanyije nâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere (RDB), yamutumiye ngo asure u Rwanda mu rwego rwo kumenyekanisha ibyiza byâ€™igihugu, muri gahunda ya Visit Rwanda.
Humberto Tan yakiriye ubwo butumire neza, asura u Rwanda tariki 15 uku kwezi, yishimira uburyo Abanyarwanda bamwakiriye, umuco nâ€™ahantu nyaburanga yasuye harimo Pariki zâ€™Akagera nâ€™Ibirunga, ikiyaga cya Kivu nâ€™Umujyi wa Kigali.
Urugendo rwo gusura Ingagi ni rumwe mu byo avuga yabonye mu Rwanda atazibagirwa.
Yagize ati â€œIcyantangaje cyane ni ukuntu Ingagi zicisha bugufi kandi bigaragara ko zifite imbaraga, Ingagi yâ€™ingabo ya Silverback ifite ubudahangarwa, iguma yitegereza buri kimwe cyose kandi ihora yiteguye kuba yatabara hagize icyinjirira umuryango wayo. Twakoze urugendo rwâ€™amasaha abiri nâ€™igice yo kujya guhura nâ€™Ingagi kandi guhura nazo ni ibyâ€™agaciro cyaneâ€.
Abamukurikira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga nabo batangariye urugendo rwe mu Rwanda.
Umwe yagize ati â€œByiza cyane, uri umunyamahirwe kuba warabashije gukora uru rugendo, ubu noneho warukura ku rutonde rwâ€™ibyo wari wariyemeje kuzageraho mu buzima bwaweâ€.
Undi nawe ati â€œNibyo se koko warazibonye amaso ku maso ku manywa yâ€™ihangu? Amafoto wahafatiye ni meza cyaneâ€.
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu Buholandi, Jean Pierre Karabaranga, mu gusobanura ibyâ€™uru rugendo yagize ati â€œGahunda ya Visit Rwanda imaze kwamamara mu gihugu cyâ€™u Buholandi, kuva aho itangiriye twahafunguje ibiro bishinzwe kuyamamaza ndetse mu mwaka wa 2019, twatunganije ingendo zitandukanye zâ€™abanyamakuru na ba rwiyemezamirimo mu byâ€™ubukerarugendo bwâ€™Abaholandi batandukanye baje gusura u Rwanda.â€
Yakomeje agira ati â€œUretse ibyo Humberto Tan yatangaje ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, hari nâ€™indi nkuru yasohotse ku wa Gatandatu wâ€™icyumweru gishize ku rupapuro rwa mbere rwâ€™ikinyamakuru cya mbere mu binyamakuru bisohora inkuru zanditse cyitwa, TELEGRAAF.â€
Yavuze ko â€œKuva tariki ya 15 kugera 19 Mutarama uyu mwaka, gahunda ya Visit Rwanda irimo kwitabira imurikabikorwa ryâ€™ubukererarugendo rya mbere mu Buholandi, ryitwa â€˜Vakantiebeursâ€™, riri kubera mu mujyi wa Utrecht.â€
Yavuze ko bakiriye intumwa zâ€™u Rwanda zirimo abahagarariye RDB ndetse na ba rwiyemezamirimo batandukanye barimo abavuye muri Sosiyete yâ€™ubwokerezi bwo mu kirere, RwandAir, Amahoro Tours, Heritage Travel, Palast Tours & Travel na Wildlife Tours Rwanda.
Yagaragaje ko mu gutangiza iri murikabikorwa ku munsi wa mbere, bafatanyije nâ€™ikigo cyitwa Untamed Travellers mu kwakira kuri stand yabo ya Visit Rwanda, ba rwiyemezamirimo nâ€™abanyamakuru mu bukerarugendo basaga 200.

Title: Singita Kwitonda Lodge yashyizwe ku mwanya wa gatatu muri hoteli nziza ku Isi
Body:
Ikigo gikora Ubushakashatsi ku bijyanye nâ€™Amahoteli ku Isi (Luxury Travel Intelligence: LTI) cyashyize Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House iherereye hafi yâ€™Ibirunga ku mwanya wa gatatu muri hoteli nziza ku Isi ku rutonde rwa 2019.
Ikigo gikora Ubushakashatsi ku bijyanye nâ€™Amahoteli ku Isi (Luxury Travel Intelligence: LTI) cyashyize Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House iherereye hafi yâ€™Ibirunga ku mwanya wa gatatu muri hoteli nziza ku Isi ku rutonde rwa 2019.
Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House igizwe nâ€™inyubako zigezweho zubatse mu Murenge wa Nyange mu Karere ka Musanze, ku birenge byâ€™Ikirunga cya Sabyinyo, aho uba unitegeye ibirunga bya Gahinga na Muhabura. Yafunguwe ku mugaragararo na Perezida Paul Kagame muri Kanama 2019.
LTI yashyize ahagaragara urutonde rwa hoteli 15 nziza kurusha izindi mu 2019, Singita Kwitonda Lodge iza ku mwanya wa gatatu.
Hoteli ya mbere ni iyitwa The Nautilus yo muri Maldives, ifite umwihariko wâ€™inzu 26 zihariye ku bakiliya (Private Homes) nâ€™ibindi bintu bitandukanye igenera abakiliya, igakurikirwa na Grantly Hall yo mu Ntara ya Yorkshire yo mu Bwongereza.
Singita yo mu Rwanda iza ku mwanya wa gatatu, ni inyubako nshya iherereye hafi ya Pariki yâ€™Igihugu yâ€™Ibirunga, ahantu hakururiye LTI cyane mu myaka ishize.
Kuri urwo rutonde hoteli 12 za mbere zashyizwe ku rutonde hagendewe ku buryo zakira abakiliya nâ€™agaciro ziha abazigana.
Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House yubatswe ahantu hahoze igishanga cyari urwuri, ariko ubu hashibutse umushinga ukomeye wâ€™ubukerarugendo ugizwe nâ€™inzu umunani zubatswe mu buryo zirengera ibidukikije.
Zirimo zirindwi zagenewe umuntu umwe cyangwa uherekejwe kuko buri imwe ifite uburiri bumwe, uruganiriro rwagutse nâ€™ibindi byangombwa nkenerwa, hakaba indi imwe yiswe Kataza House yo igizwe nâ€™ibyumba bine byo kuraramo. Yubatswe nâ€™ibikoresho byinshi byakorewe mu Rwanda, ibyinshi ni ibiboneka i Musanze birimo amakoro nâ€™imigano.
Singita Kwitonda Lodge yashoweho miliyoni $25. Yahawe izina rya Kwitonda, yitiriwe ingagi yâ€™ingabo yari izwiho ubwitonzi, yapfuye mu 2012 ifite imyaka 40, icyo gihe yabonetse itagihumeka nyuma yâ€™iminsi yari ishize itakigaragara mu muryango wayo.
Uyu mushinga wa Singita ni umwe mu izatuma u Rwanda rwesa umuhigo wo kwinjiza miliyoni $800 avuye mu bukerarugendo mu 2024, avuye kuri miliyoni $438 rwasaruye mu 2017.
Singita ni izina risobanura â€™ahantu hâ€™ibitangazaâ€™ mu rurimi rwa Shangaan rwo muri Afurika yâ€™Epfo, ari naho iki kigo gikomoka. Cyatangiye ishoramari mu bukerarugendo mu 1993, gisanganwe izindi hotel zo mu bwoko bwa Lodge muri Tanzania (muri Grumeti Game Reserve na Lamai), muri Zimbabwe (Singita Pamushana Lodge) no muri Afurika yâ€™Epfo (Singita Sweni Lodge na Singita Sabi Sand.)

Title: Paris Saint Germain yiyongereye kuri Arsenal mu kwamamaza Visit Rwanda
Body:
Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu gishinzwe Ubukerarugendo, RDB, cyatangaje ko cyatangiye ubufatanye nâ€™ikipe ya Paris St Germain buzamara imyaka itatu bugamije kureshya abashoramari no gukomeza kuba icyerekezo kibereye ubukerarugendo.
Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu gishinzwe Ubukerarugendo, RDB, cyatangaje ko cyatangiye ubufatanye nâ€™ikipe ya Paris St Germain buzamara imyaka itatu bugamije kureshya abashoramari no gukomeza kuba icyerekezo kibereye ubukerarugendo.
RDB yatangaje ko ubu bufatanye buzafasha abakurikiran PSG nâ€™isi muri rusange kumenya ubwiza bwâ€™u Rwanda, umuco ndetse nâ€™udushya twaruhangwamo kimwe nâ€™ibicuruzwa bigezweho birukorerwamo, bya â€™Made in Rwanda.â€™
Ubu bufatanye kandi bwitezweho kurushaho gufungurira amarembo abashoramari bo mu Bufaransa no mu bindi bice byâ€™Isi ku buryo babyaza umusaruro amahirwe aboneka mu Rwanda.
U Rwanda rwiteze ko binyuze muri ubu bufatanye, abakinnyi bâ€™ikipe ya PSG nâ€™ibindi byamamare mpuzamahanga, bizabafasha gusura u Rwanda, bakabona ibyiza bitatse igihugu cyâ€™imisozi igihumbi uhereye ku bijyanye nâ€™ubugeni, umuco, siporo, muzika, ubukerarugendo, amafunguro nâ€™ubwiza bwâ€™igihugu muri rusange.
Ibi bihe ntagereranywa bizajya bisangizwa abakurikira PSG ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zayo barenga miliyoni 70 bari hirya no hino ku Isi.
Muri ubu bufatanye, ikirango cya Visit Rwanda kizajya kigaragazwa kuri Stade ya Parc des Princes aho PSG yakirira imikino yayo ndetse no ku mugongo ku myenda iyi kipe ikoresha mu myitozo no mu gihe cyo kwishyushya mbere yâ€™imikino, yaba iyo yambara yasuye indi kipe cyangwa iyo yambara iwayo muri Shampiyona yâ€™u Bufaransa, Ligue 1.
Guhera umwaka utaha wâ€™imikino, ubu bufatanye buteganya ko icyayi cyâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™ikawa aribyo byonyine bizajya bitangwa kuri Parc des Princes.
Hazabaho kandi icyumweru cyâ€™imishinga yâ€™abanyempano bâ€™abanyarwanda nâ€™Abafaransa. Icyo cyumweru cyiswe â€œSemaine du Rwanda Ã  Parisâ€ kizajya gitegurwa na PSG mu kumenyekanisha ibintu byose bikorerwa mu Rwanda.
Ibi byiyongera ku mikoranire hagati yâ€™abakora mu ruganda rwâ€™imideli izatangizwa mu mezi ari imbere.
Mu bijyanye no kuzamura impano zâ€™u Rwanda, PSG izagira uruhare mu kuzamura abakiri bato binyuze mu gushinga ishuri ryâ€™umupira wâ€™amaguru i Kigali, aho iyi kipe izajya itegura imyitozo yâ€™abatoza nâ€™abakiri bato mu kubafasha kugira ubunararibonye bwâ€™iyi kipe ikomeye ku mugabane wâ€™u Burayi, byâ€™umwihariko yanditse amateka mu Bufaransa.
U Rwanda rwiteze ko binyuze muri ubu bufatanye na PSG, urugendo rwâ€™iterambere rumazemo imyaka irenze 20 ruzarushaho gufata indi ntera kandi rukihuta kurushaho.
Nkâ€™igihugu kiri gutera imbere muri Afurika mu bijyanye nâ€™ubukungu, aho bwiyongera ku kigero 8.5%, rwiteze ko ruzabasha kuba igihugu cya kabiri muri Afurika mu koroshya ubucuruzi.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RDB, Clare Akamanzi, yatangaje ko amafaranga yashowe muri ubu bufatanye ari igice gito cyâ€™inyungu nâ€™ubusanzwe iva mu bukerarugendo.
Ati â€œDushora ku nyungu iva mu bukerarugendo bwacu mu bufaranye nkâ€™ubu bwa Paris Saint-Germain kuko twumva neza ibyiza bizana ku isura rusange yâ€™igihugu ku Isi hose.â€
â€œIbi bisobanuye ko kureshya abashoramari, kongera ingufu mu bijyanye nâ€™ibyoherezwa mu mahanga muri gahunda ya Made in Rwanda, kurema amahirwe mashya yâ€™ubukungu ku baturage bacu no kongera imirimo mu bijyanye nâ€™ubukerarugendo. Uyu munsi abanyarwanda 142000 bafite akazi mu bukerarugendo, bageze kuri uwo mubare bavuye ku 90000 bariho mu 2017.â€
Yakomeje avuga ko umwaka ushize u Rwanda rwakiriye ba mukerarugendo bagera kuri miliyoni 1,7 ndetse rwiteze ko uyu mubare wiyongera kurushaho muri uyu mwaka.
Ikindi cyiyongera kuri ibyo ni uko rwanditse ishoramari rya miliyari ebyiri zâ€™amadolari aho byitezwe ko ubu bufatanye buzazamura ishoramari kurushaho.
Bivugwa ko aya masezerano yâ€™u Rwanda na PSG yaba afite agaciro kari hagati ya miliyoni umunani nâ€™icumi zâ€™ama-euro gusa nta muntu nâ€™umwe wo muri RDB wigeze wemeza ko ari ukuri.

Title: Burera: Inkomoko yâ€™izina ryâ€™agasantere kiswe Kidaho
Body:
Agasantere ka Kidaho gahurirwaho nâ€™imirenge ibiri ya Cyanika na Kagogo mu karere ka Burera, kakanahurirwaho nâ€™utugari tune twa Gisovu na Kagitega two muri Cyanika, Nyamabuye na Kayenzi two mu Murenge wa Kagogo, gusa igice kinini cya Kidaho giherereye muri Kagogo.
Agasantere ka Kidaho gahurirwaho nâ€™imirenge ibiri ya Cyanika na Kagogo mu karere ka Burera, kakanahurirwaho nâ€™utugari tune twa Gisovu na Kagitega two muri Cyanika, Nyamabuye na Kayenzi two mu Murenge wa Kagogo, gusa igice kinini cya Kidaho giherereye muri Kagogo.
Inkomoko yâ€™iri zina nkâ€™uko abasaza nâ€™abakecuru bahatuye babisobanura ngo ryaturutse ku kuba harabaga ibigega byinshi bahunikagamo imyaka itandukanye babaga bejeje, uwabaga yifuza kudahamo imyaka ngo ntibyamusabaga kunama ahubwo yayidahaga ahagaze kubera ko byahoraga byuzuye.
Mu myaka ya 1975 na 1992 abahinzi bo muri aka gace ngo bakundaga kweza cyane ibinyampeke birimo amasaka, ingano, uburo, babisarura bakabihunika mu bigega binini babaga bafite, aho wasangaga urujya nâ€™uruza rwâ€™abadahamo, ari naho hakomotse izina â€œ Kidahoâ€
Gakwandi Jonas wâ€™imyaka 68 ni umwe mu basaza basobanura ibyâ€™iri zina, aho yemeza ko ryakomotse ku bigega byinshi bahunikagamo imyaka.
Ati â€œ Aha uko uhabona mu myaka ya mbere ya Jenoside muri za 75 kuzamura, twezaga imyaka myinshi cyane, tukagira ibigega binini cyane twayihunikagamo, iyo umuntu yifuzaga kujya kudahamo imyaka ntibyamusabaga kunama kuko byahoraga byuzuye, ari naho havuye Kidaho, ariko aho iterambere ryaziye dusigaye duhinga kijyambere tukagurisha ubundi tugahunika amafaranga mu ma Bankiâ€
Nyirabirahure Donatille wâ€™imyaka 58 na we yagize ati â€œ Twagiraga ibigega binini nâ€™ibindi bitaga imitiba twahunikagamo imyaka twabaga twejeje. Uwabaga yahinze amasaka akajya kuguranisha ku wahinze ingano gutyo, ari naho Kidaho yavuye, ubu ntibikibaho tureza tukagurisha ubundi tukazigama kuri Kontiâ€.
Abatuye muri ako gasantere bakomeza bavuga ko nâ€™ubwo bezaga cyane bagahunika bahuraga nâ€™ibihombo byâ€™uko imyaka yabo hari ubwo yangirikaga bitewe no kumara igihe kinini mu bigega, ariko aho iterambere ryahagereye, bigishijwe guhinga kijyambere bakeza byinshi nyuma ubwizigame bwabo aho kujya mu bigega bakizigamira ku bigo byâ€™imari nâ€™ubucuruzi.
Umukozi wâ€™Umurenge wa Kagogo ushinzwe imibereho myiza yâ€™abaturage, Nsengamungu Sabin, yavuze ko aka gasantere kamaze kugeramo ibikorwa byinshi byâ€™amajyambere ugereranyije nâ€™igihe cyashize.
Ati â€œAka gasantere cyera nta terambere ryari rihari, nta muriro, nta bikorwa byâ€™ubucuruzi, hari inyubako za nyakatsi, ariko ubu byose byarahageze, ntibacyeza imyaka ngo bahunike mu bigega nkâ€™uko cyera byari, ahubwo bayijyana ku masoko kuko arahari ubundi bakamenya kwizigamira mu mabanki.â€
Kuri ubu aka gasantere ka Kidaho kazwi nanone nka Cyanika, hari ibikorwa byinshi byâ€™amajyambere ubucuruzi, amashuri, nâ€™ibindi, aho abaturage baho bakora ahanini ubuhinzi, bibanda ku buhinzi bwâ€™ibirayi, ibigori nâ€™ibishyimbo.

Title: Maria Sharapova yasuye ingagi muri Pariki yâ€™Ibirunga (Amafoto)
Body:
Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatatu, icyamamare mu mukino wa Tennis, Maria Sharapova, uri mu biruhuko mu Rwanda yasuye ingagi mu Pariki yâ€™Ibirunga.
Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatatu, icyamamare mu mukino wa Tennis, Maria Sharapova, uri mu biruhuko mu Rwanda yasuye ingagi mu Pariki yâ€™Ibirunga.
Uyu Murusiyakazi amaze iminsi itatu mu Rwanda aho yaje mu biruhuko bisanzwe nyuma yâ€™umwaka wâ€™imikino utaramuhiriye, dore ko waranzwe nâ€™imvune zatumye anakina amarushanwa make bikamuviramo no gusubira inyuma ku rutonde rwâ€™uko abakinnyi bahaze mu mukino wa Tennis ku isi.
Amakuru agera ku IGIHE avuga ko Sharapova wâ€™imyaka 32 azamara mu Rwanda icyumweru.
Amafoto Sharapova yasangije abamukurikira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga yagaragaje ko yasuye ingagi muri Pariki yâ€™Ibirunga.
Sharapova wigeze kuba nimero ya mbere ku isi mu bagore, nâ€™umwe mu bafite amafaranga menshi dore ko yigeze kuba umugore wa mbere mu bakina imikino itandukanye winjiza amafaranga menshi, abikora inshuro 11 zikurikiranya.
Maria Sharapova yabaye nimero ya mbere ku Isi guhera mu 2005, ariko kuri ubu ari kubarizwa ku mwanya wa 132 nyuma yo kwitabira amarushanwa 12 gusa uyu mwaka.
Uretse gusura ingagi mu Rwanda, Sharapova yanasuye zimwe muri Pariki zo muri Boswana nkâ€™uko yagiye abisangiza abamukurikira ku mbuga ze nkoranyambaga.
Sharapova aje akurikira myugariro wa Arsenal, David Luiz, nawe uheruka mu Rwanda agasura ahantu hatandukanye harimo na Pariki yâ€™ibirunga.

Title: Imbeho yâ€™ubutita, imvura ku bitugu, kubabwa nâ€™isusaâ€¦ Twasuye Ingagi mu Birunga (Amafoto)
Body:
Iyo uturutse mu Mujyi wa Kigali bigusaba amasaha asaga abiri ngo ube ugeze mu karere ka Musanze ahari igicumbi cyâ€™Ingagi zo mu Birunga zikurura benshi baje kureba imibereho yazo no kwimara amatsiko yâ€™imiterere yâ€™aho ziba.
Iyo uturutse mu Mujyi wa Kigali bigusaba amasaha asaga abiri ngo ube ugeze mu karere ka Musanze ahari igicumbi cyâ€™Ingagi zo mu Birunga zikurura benshi baje kureba imibereho yazo no kwimara amatsiko yâ€™imiterere yâ€™aho ziba.
Biba birenze ibyo tubona kuri televiziyo cyangwa se ibyo dusoma mu binyamakuru. Kubona amahirwe yo gusura ingagi ni nkâ€™imbonekarimwe cyane ko atari buri wese wabasha kwigondera $1500, ni ukuvuga asaga miliyoni 1,3 Frw asabwa abashaka kuzisura.
Kuri iki Cyumweru nibwo urubyiruko rwâ€™abahungu nâ€™abakobwa bujuje imyaka 25 uyu mwaka wa 2019 nâ€™ababaherekeje bajyanywe ku buntu gutembera muri Pariki yâ€™Igihugu yâ€™Ibirunga no kwirebera ingagi ziyibarizwamo, bikozwe nâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere (RDB) gifatanyije na Shalom Safaris.
Iya rubika mbere yo kwerekeza mu Birunga, twabanje gufata amafunguro ya mu gitondo nyuma dufata imyambaro yabugenewe irimo ikote rirerire ryo kwirinda imvura, uturindantoki na bote zo kwambara mu cyondo.
Ukigera mu Kinigi ahari ibiro bya RDB, uba uzi ko urugendo rucogoye nyamara nibwo ruba rutangiye! Nyuma yo guhaguruka mu Kinigi muri Musanze werekeza mu Murenge wa Jenda muri Nyabihu nâ€™imodoka, ni ahantu nibura naho hasaba amasaha abiri ubundi imodoka ikabasiga ku muhanda, mugafata iyâ€™agasozi mukerekeza ahari ingagi, aho mushobora kugenda mu ishyamba nibura iminota 40, isaha imwe cyangwa hejuru yayo, bitewe nâ€™aho ingagi mugiye gusura ziherereye.
Mbere yo guhaguruka mu Kinigi ariko mubanza gushyirwa mu matsinda yâ€™abantu umunani, mugahabwa amabwiriza bitewe nâ€™umuryango mushaka gusura, kuko umuryango wâ€™Ingagi usurwa nâ€™abantu batarenze umunani kandi bakamarana nâ€™ingagi igihe kitarenze isaha imwe.
Icyo gihe kibarwa nkâ€™aho ziba zitangiye guhararukwa abantu, zigahabwa nâ€™umwanya ngo zikomereze ubuzima.
Kuva mu Mujyi wa Musanze ikibunda cyari cyose, ikirere kiremereye ndetse hari aho twageze imvura iri ku mugongo, ubukonje ari bwinshi reka sinakubwira.
Mu rugendo rwo mu ishyamba muba muherekejwe nâ€™umurinzi ufite imbunda, ngo hato mudasakirana nâ€™inzovu cyangwa imbogo byo mu birunga, dore ko bigira amahane kubi. Hagize inyamaswa ibakanga, uwo murinzi icyo akora ni ukuyikanga igahunga.
Muba muri kumwe kandi nâ€™umugabo ubashakira inzira, akagenda atema ibyatsi byagandaye, ibisura byaguca urwaho ntibikurebere izuba. Ni inzira iba igoye ku buryo ugera aho ujya nta nkuru, ariko wakubita amaso Ingagi ugasabwa nâ€™ibyishimo.
Twasuye Ingagi zo mu muryango wa Igisha ariko amafoto ari muri iyi nkuru yo yafashwe nâ€™umufotozi wacu ni ayo mu muryango wa Isimbi aho yajyanye nâ€™irindi tsinda cyane ko yari amatsinda arindwi.
Muri iyi pariki harimo imiryango 20 harimo 10 ikorerwaho ubushakashatsi ndetse nâ€™indi 10 isurwa na ba mukerarugendo. Muri iyi icumi isurwa harimo Amahoro, Umubano, Hirwa, Igisha, Isimbi, Muhoza, Kwitonda, Sabyinyo, Susa, Pablo, Kuryama, Mafunzo, Kureba, Musirikali na Ntambara.
Ingagi zatanze amasomo akomeye ku bazisuye
Uwihirwe Yasipi Casmir wabaye Igisonga cya mbere cya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda, nyuma yâ€™uru rugendo yavuze ko ikintu cya mbere yavuga ari ugishimira RDB ku bwâ€™iki gikorwa.
Ati â€œByarenze ibyo twatekerezaga, twumvaga ko nyine ari ukureba Ingagi bikarangira ariko twabonye ibindi byinshi byiza. Nkanjye ku giti cyanjye twari twasuye Isimbi, twabonye ingamba zafashwe kugira ngo habungabungwe ibidukikije, uko Ingagi zibayeho, uko zibayeho mu miryango nâ€™uko hagati yazo ziganira.â€
Ikintu gikomeye uyu mukobwa yize mu gihe cyâ€™isaha yamaranye nâ€™ingagi, yavuze ko icya mbere ari ukuntu ziyoborana kandi zikubahana mu buryo bukomeye.
Ati â€œIkintu nazigiyeho zifite uburyo ziyoborana, ziba zizi ugomba kuba mukuru wazo (Silver-back) ikindi kuba ziba zizi ko ziri mu bwami bwazo uba ugomba kubizubahira. Icyo nabonye nazigiraho mu buzima busanzwe, zumva cyane ibijyanye nâ€™amasano kandi zikubahana, hanyuma rero natwe nkâ€™umuryango twakabaye tubana hamwe kandi tugatekereza kure, tukubaha nâ€™abaturuta."
"Ikintu natekerezaga cya mbere ni uko zimeze nkâ€™abantu kandi ni nako twabisanze biri."
Batashye bakubita agatoki ku kandi bavuga ko bazagaruka
Mushimimana Olivier ukora muri Shalom Safaris yafatanyije na RDB gutembereza abantu, isanzwe itembereza ba mukerarugendo mu mapariki atandukanye ku giciro kiri hasi mu rwego rwo kugira ngo bafatanye na leta guteza imbere ubukerarugendo bwâ€™imbere mu gihugu.
Yabwiye IGIHE ko atari ubwa mbere yari agiye mu Birunga ariko umuntu wese uhaza aba yifuza kugaruka.
Ati "Uko imyaka igenda ishira hagenda hazamo udushya. Ni ubwa kane nzisuye ariko nâ€™ubu byagenze neza nta kibazo, ntabwo ingagi wasura rimwe ngo unyurwe ahubwo uba wumva wahora ugaruka buri munsi.â€
Iki cyo kuba umuntu wese usuye ingagi ahora yifuza kugaruka agihuriyeho nâ€™abandi benshi bari bagiye muri uru rugendo.
Ingagi ziri mu biza ku isonga mu gukurura ba mukerarugendo mu Rwanda ndetse buri Munyarwanda wese aba yifuza kuzisura akihera ijisho uko zibayeho akanasobanukirwa byinshi birenze.
Muri Nyakanga 2019 RDB nibwo yatanze amahirwe mu gihe hizihizwaga imyaka 25 ishize igihugu kibohowe ubutegetsi bwaryanishije abaturage, bikageza kuri Jenoside yahitanye ubuzima bwâ€™inzirakarengane zirenga miliyoni. Aya mahirwe yo gusura ingagi yari agenewe abantu bujuje imyaka 25 uyu mwaka nâ€™abandi bayifite.
Ni igikorwa kijyanye na gahunda ngarukamwaka ya â€œTembera u Rwandaâ€, igamije gushishikariza Abanyarwanda byâ€™umwihariko gukangukira gusura ibyiza nyaburanga bigize igihugu cyabo. Tembera u Rwanda yabaga ku nshuro ya karindwi.

Title: U Rwanda rwamuritse ibyiza byarwo i Londres, rutumira abatuye Isi muri CHOGM 2020
Body:
Ubwo habaga ibirori bizwi nka â€˜The Lord Mayorâ€™s Showâ€™ mu mujyi wa Londres mu Bwongereza kuri uyu wa Gatandatu, u Rwanda rwahacanye umucyo rwekana ibyiza birugize, ruboneraho gutumira abatuye isi mu nama ya â€˜CHOGMâ€™ izahuriza hamwe abakuru bâ€™ibihugu na Guverinoma biri mâ€™Umuryango wâ€™ibihugu bikoresha Icyongereza, Commonwealth i Kigali mu 2020.
Ubwo habaga ibirori bizwi nka â€˜The Lord Mayorâ€™s Showâ€™ mu mujyi wa Londres mu Bwongereza kuri uyu wa Gatandatu, u Rwanda rwahacanye umucyo rwekana ibyiza birugize, ruboneraho gutumira abatuye isi mu nama ya â€˜CHOGMâ€™ izahuriza hamwe abakuru bâ€™ibihugu na Guverinoma biri mâ€™Umuryango wâ€™ibihugu bikoresha Icyongereza, Commonwealth i Kigali mu 2020.
â€˜The Lord Mayorâ€™s Showâ€™ ni ibirori bimaze imyaka 804 biba ndetse bikaba bimwe mu bikomeye ku Isi mu bihuza abantu barenga 6000 baturutse ku Isi yose, aho baza bakiyerekana mu buryo bwâ€™imbyino, umuco, amatsinda acuranga nâ€™ibindi.
Itsinda ryaserukiye u Rwanda ubwo ryiyerekanaga ryasabye abitabiriye ibi birori gusura u Rwanda mu nama ya CHOGM 2020.
Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu Bwongereza , Yamina Karitanyi yavuze ko ari ibyishimo ku Rwanda kuko kwitabira ibi birori bivuze byinshi ndetse bikaba byabaye inzira yo kumurika umuco Nyarwanda.
Yagize ati â€œUbu ni ubwa mbere u Rwanda rwitabira the Lord Mayorâ€™s Show, twatewe ishema no kuba muri iki gikorwa, dusangiza abandi umuco wacu ndetse dutumira nâ€™abatuye Londres kwitabira inama ya CHOGM.â€
Yongeyeho ko kuba u Rwanda rwitabiriye byerekana umubano mwiza rufitanye nâ€™umujyi wa Londres .
Ati â€œKuhaba kâ€™u Rwanda byerekana umubano mwiza nâ€™umujyi wa Londres ndetse nâ€™ukwiyemeza dufite mu muryango wa Commonwealthâ€.
Karitanyi yavuze ko uko CHOGM 2020 igenda yegera bazarushaho gusangiza abantu amakuru yâ€™uko u Rwanda rugenda rutera imbere nâ€™aho imyiteguro igeze kugira ngo igikorwa cyo kwakira iyi nama kizagende neza.
Abari bahagarariye u Rwanda muri ibi birori barimo itsinda ryâ€™intore nâ€™abakaraza biyerekanye mu myambaro nâ€™imbyino byâ€™umuco gakondo, byose hagamijwe guteza imbere ubukerarugendo nâ€™ishoramari mu Rwanda.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubukerarugendo mu Kigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere (RDB), Belise AKaliza yavuze ko inama ya CHOGM 2020 izaba amahirwe kâ€™u Rwanda yo gusangiza Isi bimwe mu byiza nyaburanga rufite.
Yagize ati â€œTwishimiye kwakira abarenga 5000 baturutse ku Isi yose bazaza mu Rwanda kubera inama ya CHOGM 2020. Iyi nama izaba ari imwe mu zihuza abantu benshi kandi batandukanye mu mateka yâ€™u Rwanda ndetse twishimiye gusangiza Isi umwihariko wâ€™igihugu mu byiza nyaburanga bikurura ba mukerarugendo uhereye ku gusura Ingagi, kwibonera ishyamba rya Nyungwe riri mu akuze, gusura inyambo, kubona ubuzima bwo muri Kigali ndetse no kujya mu Kagera gusura inyamaswa eshanu zikomeyeâ€.
Uretse ibijyanye nâ€™ubukerarugendo nâ€™umuco, itsinda ryari rihagarariye u Rwanda ryerekanye ubushake bwâ€™u Rwanda mu kubungabunga urusobe rwâ€™ibidukikije, aho biyerekanye bari mu mwambaro ubasanisha nâ€™ingagi bagenda iruhande rwa moto idasohora umwuka wangiza ikirere.
Muri ibi birori kandi Abanyarwanda biyerekanye mu mwambaro wa Arsenal nkâ€™uburyo bwo kwishimira ubufatanye bwâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™iyi kipe ndetse sosiyete Nyarwanda itwara abantu mu ndege Rwandair, isanzwe ijya muri uyu mujyi gatatu mu cyumweru nayo yiyerekanye iboneraho no kubwira abazitabira CHOGM ko izabafasha kugera i Kigali.

Title: U Rwanda ku mwanya wa mbere mu bihugu bizasurwa cyane muri Afurika mu 2020
Body:
U Rwanda rwashyizwe ku mwanya wa mbere muri Afurika nâ€™uwa kane ku Isi mu bihugu 30 bitanga icyizere cyo kuzasurwa nâ€™abakerarugendo benshi kurusha ibindi mu mwaka utaha wa 2020.
U Rwanda rwashyizwe ku mwanya wa mbere muri Afurika nâ€™uwa kane ku Isi mu bihugu 30 bitanga icyizere cyo kuzasurwa nâ€™abakerarugendo benshi kurusha ibindi mu mwaka utaha wa 2020.
Uru rutonde rwatangajwe ku wa 7 Ugushyingo 2019 rugaragaza ibihugu 30 bifite ibintu bikurura abakerarugendo, bitanga icyizere ko bizasurwa cyane kurusha ibindi mu 2020.
Ibihugu byatoranyijwe muri uyu mwaka byatangajwe muri iki cyumweru ku rubuga TravelLemming.com rusanzwe ruteza imbere urwego rwâ€™ubukerarugendo, mu muhango wabereye mu Bwongereza.
Ku mwanya wa mbere hatoranyijwe Georgia, igihugu kiri hagati yâ€™u Burayi na Aziya nkâ€™igitanga icyizere cyo kuzasurwa cyane mu 2020 kubera urunyurane rwâ€™imisozi iri mu gace ka Caucasus kandi kikagira imijyi ihendutse kuyibamo. Iki gihugu ngo gikunda gusurwa cyane hagati ya Mata nâ€™Ukwakira.
Iki gihugu gikurikirwa na Nova Scotia, Intara yo muri Canada ifite ibice bikunze gusurwa cyane birimo Pariki yâ€™Igihugu ya Cape Breton nâ€™ibindi. Ni igace kâ€™ikirwa kihariye ku bwiza gakondo nâ€™inyubako zitangaje gakunda gusurwa cyane muri Kamena nâ€™Ukwakira.
U Rwanda ruza ku mwanya wa kane inyuma Cook Islands iherereye mu Majyepfo yâ€™Inyanja ya Pacifique. Ibirwa byihariye ku kugira umucanga wo kwidagaduriraho, ukundwa nâ€™abakerarugendo cyane.
U Rwanda rwihariye ku ngagi zo mu Birunga, Pariki ya Nyungwe nâ€™izindi ngoro ndangamurage, Urwibutso rwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi nâ€™ibindi bikunzwe nâ€™abakerarugendo, rukurikirwa na Kyrgyzstan, Equateur, SuÃ¨de, nâ€™ibindi.
U Rwanda rukunze gusurwa cyane guhera mu Ukuboza hagati kugera mu ntangiriro za Gashyantare no muri Kamena na Nzeri.
Umuyobozi wâ€™Ishami ryâ€™Ubukerarugendo mu Kig0 cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere (RDB), Belise Kariza, yavuze ko â€œTwishimiye kwakira iki gihembo no kuba mu bihugu bya mbere bizasurwa nâ€™abakerarugendo mu 2020 nkâ€™uko byagaragajwe na travel bloggers.â€
Yakomeje agira ati â€œIki gihembo tugisangiye nâ€™abanyamuryango bose ba gahunda yo kumenyekanisha u Rwanda (Visit Rwanda), abashinzwe kubungabunga urusobe rwâ€™ibidukikije nâ€™ibinyabuzima, abakora mu bukerarugendo, amahoteli bagira uruhare buri munsi mu gutuma u Rwanda ruba ahantu hadasanzwe ho gusurwa.â€
Kariza yavuze ko ku batarasura u Rwanda bahawe ikaze kugira ngo baryoherwe nâ€™ubwiza karemano, umuco nâ€™urusobe rwâ€™ibinyabuzima birurimo.
 Mu mpamvu u Rwanda rwatoranyijwe mu bihugu byahawe iki gihembo harimo kuba World Economic Forum iheruka kurushyira ku rutonde rwâ€™ibihugu bifite umutekano muri Afurika kandi RwandAir ikaba iteganya mu 2020 gufungura icyerekezo gishya cya Kigali- JFK muri New York, ku kibuga mpuzamahanga cyitiriwe John F. Kennedy.
Umwe mu bagize akanama nkemurampaka ka Travel Blogger katoranyije u Rwanda, Amarachi Ekekwe, yavuze ko rukomeje kugira impinduka zikomeye mu rwego rwâ€™ingendo zâ€™indege muri Afurika mu byiciro bitandukanye.
Ati â€œBizaba bishimishije gusura Kigali ukareba impinduka zitangaje nâ€™imbaragaga ishyira mu kwita kuri Pariki zâ€™igihugu.â€
Undi mu bagize akanama nkemurampaka Amanda Mouttaki, yavuze ko â€˜U Rwanda ruri ku mwanya wa mbere wâ€™ibihugu nzasura muri Afurika nkibonera byinshi mu mico itandukanye, ubwiza karemano bwarwo nâ€™ubwâ€™ingagi zikurura benshi, hari nâ€™ibindi byinshi birimo ingoro zâ€™umuco gakondo abantu bahasanga.â€™
Igihugu cya Afurika kiza hafi ni Namibia iri ku wa 13 mu gihe Ethiopia yo iri ku mwanya wa 30.

Title: Umujyi wa Kigali ugiye gutaha ubusitani bugezweho imbere yâ€™ibiro byawo (Amafoto)
Body:
Umujyi wa Kigali uri mu mirimo ya nyuma yo kunoza ubusitani bugezweho bwubatswe imbere yâ€™ibiro byawo, bwagenewe ibikorwa remezo bigezweho bifasha abantu kwidagadura, kuruhuka no kunguka ubumenyi.
Umujyi wa Kigali uri mu mirimo ya nyuma yo kunoza ubusitani bugezweho bwubatswe imbere yâ€™ibiro byawo, bwagenewe ibikorwa remezo bigezweho bifasha abantu kwidagadura, kuruhuka no kunguka ubumenyi.
Ni ubusitani bugezweho bwubatswe ku muhanda imbere yâ€™ibiro byâ€™Umujyi wa Kigali, ahateganye nâ€™icyicaro gikuru cya I&M Bank. Bwubatswe ku nyubako yo hejuru, kuko munsi yabwo harimo inzu yagenewe ishyinguranyandiko ryâ€™umujyi wa Kigali.
Ubu busitani bugeze mu cyiciro cya nyuma cyo kubakwa, bufunguriwe abaturage muri rusange. Bufite intebe zihariye umuntu ashobora kwicaraho akahasomera igitabo, yumva akayaga aganira nâ€™inshuti nâ€™ibindi.
Mu buryo aha hantu hubatswe, biteganyijwe ko hazashyirwa internet nziramugozi yâ€™ubuntu, ku buryo abantu bashobora kuhicara bakarahura ubwenge.
Umujyi wa Kigali utangaza ko kuhatemberera bizaba ari ubuntu, ariko ku bantu bifuza kuhakorera ibikorwa byâ€™izindi nyungu nko kuhafatira amashusho yâ€™ubukwe cyangwa yâ€™indirimbo, urateganya kureba uko byazakorwa kugira ngo haboneke uburyo bwatuma hazajya habungabungwa neza.
Ubu busitani bwatangiye kubakwa muri Mutarama uyu mwaka, buzatahwa ku mugaragaro mu minsi iri imbere. Bwubatswe ku buso bwa metero kare 1072, butwara miliyoni 226,1 Frw.
Umujyi wa Kigali uvuga ko nibura 6% byâ€™ubuso bwawo, mu gishushanyo mbonera bwageneye ahantu ho kuruhukira. Mu bindi bice bikomeje gutunganywa ngo bigenerwe bene ibi bikorwa harimo igishanga cya Nyandungu, ahazwi nka Nyandungu Urban Wetland Eco-Tourism Park.
Ni ibikorwa ubuyobozi bwashyizemo imbaraga, aho buteganya ko mu gihe mu mwaka wa 2050 abatuye uyu mujyi bazaba bageze kuri miliyoni 3.8 bavuye kuri miliyoni 1.3 babarurwa kuri ubu, uyu mujyi ugomba kuba ufite ibidukikije bihagije kandi abaturage bafite ahantu hakwiye ho kuruhukira.
