Title: One&Only Gorillaâ€™s Nest yiyongereye ku nyubako zigezweho zakira ba mukerarugendo mu Rwanda (Amafoto)
Body:
Igice cyâ€™ibirunga nkâ€™ahantu hafite umwihariko mu bukerarugendo mu Rwanda, hibarutse inyubako nshya yâ€™agatangaza, One&Only Gorillaâ€™s Nest, yubatse mu Kinigi mu ishyamba ryâ€™inturusu, ahantu hitegeye ibyiza byâ€™ibirunga byâ€™u Rwanda.
Igice cyâ€™ibirunga nkâ€™ahantu hafite umwihariko mu bukerarugendo mu Rwanda, hibarutse inyubako nshya yâ€™agatangaza, One&Only Gorillaâ€™s Nest, yubatse mu Kinigi mu ishyamba ryâ€™inturusu, ahantu hitegeye ibyiza byâ€™ibirunga byâ€™u Rwanda.
Nyuma ya hoteli igezweho imaze igihe muri Pariki yâ€™Igihugu ya Nyungwe, International One & Only Resorts yibarutse irindi shami mu karere ka Musanze, yitezweho kuzajya yakira ba mukerarugendo basura ingagi.
One&Only Gorillaâ€™s Nest ifite ibyumba 14 bigezweho nâ€™inzu zirindwi buri imwe iri ukwayo. Zitatse mu buryo bwa Kinyarwanda hakoreshejwe imigongo, hakabamo nâ€™ibindi bikoresho byâ€™ubugeni. Izi nyubako kandi zigizwe nâ€™igice kinini cyâ€™ibirahuri ku buryo umuntu abasha kwitegereza ibyiza bitatse amajyaruguru yâ€™u Rwanda.
Yubatswe mu biti mo hagati ku buryo buri nzu iteretse ku byuma bishinze, aho nibura bibarwa ko inzu imwe yagiye itwara miliyoni imwe yâ€™amadolari ngo yubakwe.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 1 Ugushyingo nibwo One&Only Resorts yatangaje ko One &Only Gorillaâ€™s Nest yafunguye imiryango mu Rwanda.
Witegereje ku ndangaminsi igaragaza igihe umuntu ashobora kurara muri iyi nyubako, usanga kugeza ku wa 15 Ugushyingo yaramaze gufatwa.
Izi nyubako zikozwe mu buryo bifasha abantu kunga ubumwe nâ€™ibidukikije, kuko zubatse mu mahumbezi aboneka ku birenge byâ€™ibirunga.
Kugeza ubu kuharara byihagazeho kuko nka Forest lodge irimo ibitanda bibiri, kuyiraramo ijoro rimwe ari $3,825 ni ukuvuga nibura miliyoni 3.5 Frw; Forest Lodge King ni $3,060 ni ukuvuga asaga miliyoni 2,8 Frw; Virunga Suite ni $4,760 ni ukuvuga miliyoni 4,3 Frw naho Ingagi suite ni $5,900, nibura ni miliyoni 5,4 Frw.
One and Only Gorillaâ€™s Nest yiyongereye ku zindi nyubako ebyiri zikomeye zakira ba mukerarugendo bo ku rwego rwo hejuru mu bice byâ€™ibirunga, zirimo Bisate lodge kuri uyu wa Gatanu yahawe inyenyeri eshanu na Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House, yatangije ibikorwa mu Rwanda ku wa 1 Kanama 2019.

Title: Bisate Lodge yabaye hoteli ya kabiri mu ntara yahawe inyenyeri eshanu (Amafoto na Video)
Body:
Bisate Eco Lodge yubatse mu gace kâ€™Ibirunga yashyizwe ku rwego rwâ€™inyenyeri eshanu, iba iya kabiri irugezeho mu zibarizwa hanze yâ€™Umujyi wa Kigali nyuma ya One & Only Nyungwe House.
Bisate Eco Lodge yubatse mu gace kâ€™Ibirunga yashyizwe ku rwego rwâ€™inyenyeri eshanu, iba iya kabiri irugezeho mu zibarizwa hanze yâ€™Umujyi wa Kigali nyuma ya One & Only Nyungwe House.
Inyenyeri za hoteli zitangazwa nâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu gishinzwe Iterambere (RDB) gishingiye ku bipimo bizigenga muri Afurika yâ€™Uburasirazuba (EAC).
Ku nshuro ya gatatu mu Rwanda hatangajwe uko hoteli, appartements nâ€™izindi nzu zakira abakerarugendo zihagaze bijyanye nâ€™inyenyeri zazo kuva kuri imwe kugeza kuri eshanu mu birori byabereye muri Kigali Convention Center ku wa 1 Ugushyingo 2019.
Muri 40 zagenzuwe, Bisate Lodge ni yo yahawe inyenyeri eshanu mu gihe izahawe enye ari ebyiri zirimo Residence Prima 2000 na The Retreat & Heaven Boutique Hotel.
Hoteli zahawe inyenyeri eshatu zigera ku 10 zirimo Executive Suites Kigali na Landmark Suites iherereye i Kinyinya. Izisaga 10 zashyizwe ku rwego rwâ€™inyenyeri ebyiri zirimo The Court Boutique Hotel na Barthos Hotel mu gihe 10 zahawe imwe.
Gutanga inyenyeri hashingirwa ku birimo serivisi zitanga, aho ziherereye, imyubakire yazo, ubushobozi bwo kwakira abantu, amasaha zikora nâ€™ibindi hagendewe ku mabwiriza ahuriweho na EAC agenga hotel, restaurants, nâ€™izindi nyubako zakira ba mukerarugendo.
Bisate Lodge yubatswe hagendewe ku miterere yâ€™Ingoro yâ€™Umwami yâ€™i Nyanza mu Majyepfo, yahawe inyenyeri eshanu nyuma yuko mu 2018 yaje no ku rutonde rwa hoteli 56 nshya nziza ku Isi. Iri mu za mbere zakira ba mukerarugendo bo ku rwego rwo hejuru mu Rwanda, yubatswe nâ€™ikigo Wilderness Safaris.
Umuyobozi wa Thousand Hills ikorana na Bisate Lodge, Sebageni Jacqui, yagaragaje ko inyenyeri bahawe ari ishema rizatuma bakora cyane.
Ati â€œBiratanga ishusho yâ€™abo turibo kandi byereka abakiliya ko bakora amahitamo mazima yo kutugana. Guhabwa inyenyeri bifasha buri wese mu rwego rwâ€™ubukerarugendo kuko bituma dukora cyane.â€™â€™
Imiterere ya Bisate Lodge ituma ba mukerarugendo bizihirwa no kuharara kuko kugeza ubu ibyumba byayo byamaze gufatwa (booked) kugeza mu 2020. Mu bituma hakundwa harimo ubwiza bwaho, ingagi, ibirunga na serivisi nziza zihabarizwa.
Umuyobozi wa Landmark Suites Hotel ikorera mu Murenge wa Kinyinya muri Gasabo, Kirenga Sarah, yabwiye IGIHE ko guhabwa inyenyeri ari indi nyunganizi mu ishoramari rimaze imyaka itanu.
Ati â€œTwishimiye intambwe twateye yo guhabwa inyenyeri eshatu kandi ntitugiye kwicara kuko tuzi neza ko tuzakomeza gutera imbere. Inyenyeri ivuze ko abatugana baba bazi neza serivisi tugomba kubaha kandi bizadufasha kumenyekanisha ibikorwa byacu mu gihugu no hanze.â€™â€™
Igikorwa cyo guha hoteli inyenyeri cyagaragajwe nkâ€™inzira yo gukomeza guteza imbere ubukerarugendo bwâ€™u Rwanda.
Umuyobozi Wungirije wa RDB, Niyonkuru Zephanie, yavuze ko Guverinoma yâ€™u Rwanda izakomeza gutanga inkunga mu iterambere ryâ€™ubukerarugendo.
Mu myaka itanu ishize u Rwanda rwari rufite hoteli imwe yâ€™inyenyeri eshanu, ubu zigeze kuri eshanu zirimo Bisate Lodge, One & Only Nyungwe House, Radisson Blu Hotel, Kigali Serena Hotel na Kigali Marriot Hotel.
Yakomeje agira ati â€œIbi byatumye inyungu iva mu Bukerarugendo bwibanda ku kwakira ibiganiro, inama mpuzamahanga nâ€™ibikorwa bitandukanye, byiswe MICE izamuka iva kuri miliyoni $33 mu 2014 igera kuri miliyoni $55 mu 2018.â€™â€™
Umuyobozi wâ€™Umujyi wa Kigali, Rubingisa Pudence, yavuze ko kubaka ubukerarugendo buhamye bitagerwaho hatangwa serivisi mbi.
Yagize ati â€œIgihugu cyacu gifata serivisi nziza nkâ€™umusingi wâ€™iterambere ryâ€™ubukungu ndetse biri muri Gahunda yo kwihutisha Iterambere (NST1), igamije gukuba inyungu iva mu bukerarugendo ikarenga miliyoni $800 mu 2024.â€™â€™
â€œNi ngombwa kwita kuri serivisi duha abakiliya bacu, kuko ni ingenzi cyane. Ni ngombwa kumva ibyo dukeneye. Bigomba kuba inshingano za buri mushoramari na buri Munyarwanda wese.â€™â€™
Rubingisa yavuze ko ibyinjizwa nâ€™igihugu biba bigamije guhindura ubuzima bwâ€™abaturage.
Ati â€œNtibikiri muri Kigali gusa ahubwo byanageze mu ntara. Hoteli yahawe inyenyeri eshanu ni iyo mu Karere ka Musanze. Ni ingenzi kugaragaza ko ishoramari ritangijwe, abantu bashobora kungukira mu bikorwa remezo ndetse bakanabona imirimo.â€™â€™
U Rwanda rwihaye intego yo kwinjiza amadolari asaga miliyoni 150 buri mwaka muri gahunda ya MICE.
Kuva itegeko ryâ€™ubukerarugendo ryo mu 2014 ryatangira gushyirwa mu bikorwa hamaze gutangwa inyenyeri ku nyubako 156 mu gihugu hose.
Amafoto: Niyonzima Moses
Video: Mugwiza Olivier

Title: Dutemberane i Goma kwa â€˜Wananzambeâ€™ mu Mujyi wâ€™ubushabitsi buciriritse nâ€™ubuzima bworoheje (Amafoto)
Body:
Goma ni Umujyi Mukuru wâ€™Intara ya Kivu yâ€™Amajyaruguru mu Burasirazuba bwa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (RDC). Uherereye hafi yâ€™inkombe zâ€™Ikiyaga cya Kivu kiwutandukanya nâ€™Umujyi wa Gisenyi mu Rwanda.
Goma ni Umujyi Mukuru wâ€™Intara ya Kivu yâ€™Amajyaruguru mu Burasirazuba bwa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (RDC). Uherereye hafi yâ€™inkombe zâ€™Ikiyaga cya Kivu kiwutandukanya nâ€™Umujyi wa Gisenyi mu Rwanda.
Uyu mujyi uri ku buso bwa kilometero kare 75.72 [nibura ni hegitari 7 572 zâ€™ubutaka], utuwe nâ€™abaturage miliyoni ebyiri. Batuye mu buryo bucucitse ugereranyije nâ€™Umujyi wa Kigali utuwe nâ€™abasaga miliyoni 1,5 kuri kilometero kare 738.
Goma ifite ubukungu bwubakiye ku bucuruzi buciriritse, aho usanga ahenshi amaduka mato [boutique] atangira serivisi ku nkengero zâ€™imihanda; uburobyi; ubucukuzi bwâ€™amabuye yâ€™agaciro nâ€™ibindi.
Ugishingura ikirenge ku mupaka uhuza u Rwanda na RDC uhita uhingukira mu Birere ahari amasanganiro arimo nâ€™amagambo yanditse mu Kinyarwanda, atanga ubutumwa bugamije gushishikariza urubyiruko gukunda umurimo.
Ni amasanganiro yâ€™umuhanda yubatswe bitewe nâ€™uko hari abapolisi bagongwaga bagerageza kuyobora ibinyabiziga mu byerekezo bitandukanye, bubakiwe inzu bahagararamo ku buryo baba bagenzura ahantu hose batuje.
Nibwo umenya ko uvuye mu Rwanda kuko uhita utangira kubona ibintu bitandukanye nâ€™ibyari muri metero 100 inyuma yawe. Uhera ku kavuyo, umwanda, imodoka zitagira ibirango, ukagira ku bantu bagenda mu nzira birira ibisheke na za avocat nâ€™ibindi.
Urugendo rugana i Goma ku muntu uherereye i Gisenyi ni ugukozaho kuko impande zombi zihana imbibi binyuze ku mipaka ya Grande BarriÃ¨re na Petite BarriÃ¨re.
Ubucuruzi bwaho buragenda cyane bitewe nâ€™ubwinshi bwâ€™abahanyura kuko nibura Umupaka muto wa Petite BarriÃ¨re ucaho abantu ibihumbi 55 mu gihe uwa Grande BarriÃ¨re ucaho abantu 7 000 buri munsi.
Ugikandagiza ikirenge i Goma ushobora gutungurwa kuko usibye ubwinshi bwâ€™abagenda nâ€™abakorera muri uyu mujyi, usanga indimi zikoreshwa zitandukanye kuva ku Kinyarwanda, Amashi, Lingala, Igiswahili gifatwa nkâ€™ururimi rwâ€™igihugu nâ€™Igifaransa gikoreshwa nkâ€™ururimi rwemewe.
Ufite ubumenyi mu kuvuga Igiswahili, bikaba akarusho ashobora kuvangamo Igifaransa gike [Bya bindi abo muri Tanzania bita Kiswahili Kingwana] uwo ntiyagwa isari ari i Goma kuko yashobora kumvikana na benshi.
Goma iri muri kilometero ziri hagati ya 13â€“18 mu Majyepfo yâ€™Ikirunga cya Nyiragongo.
Mu mateka yâ€™uyu mujyi mu myaka isaga 17 ishize, ku wa 17 Mutarama 2002, Ikirunga cya Nyiragongo cyararutse bituma benshi bava mu byabo, abandi bahaburira ubuzima.
Ibirutsi bya Nyiragongo byasandariye mu Mujyi wa Goma rwagati, bikomeza no mu Kiyaga cya Kivu. Ni yo mpamvu iyo ugeze muri uyu mujyi, ubona amakoro hose ndetse nâ€™inzu nyinshi nizo zifashishwa mu bwubatsi.
Icyo gihe mu masaha 24, abantu 45 bari bamaze kubura ubuzima, ndetse ingendo mu Mujyi wa Goma zabaye nkâ€™izihagarara kuko imihanda yose yari yafunzwe ndetse imiryango itanga ubufasha ntiyashoboraga kuhagera.
Abantu 245 ni bo byaje kugaragara ko baguye mu iruka ryâ€™icyo kirunga, inyubako zirenga 4,500 zarangiritse mu gihe abarenga ibihumbi 120 bavanywe mu byabo.
Goma iyobowe na Meya TimothÃ©e Mwisa Kyese, yakomeje kwisuganya yiyubaka nyuma yâ€™iryo sanganya ryayigwiririye.
Nyuma yo gukumirwa mu ngendo mpuzamahanga zo mu kirere, Ikibuga Mpuzamahanga cya Goma cyongeye gukomorerwa aho kuri ubu Ethiopian Airlines ihakorera ingendo zihuza uyu mujyi nâ€™uwa Addis Ababa.
Mu bijyanye nâ€™ubukerarugendo, uyu mujyi ufite ibiyaga bito bigera kuri bitanu aho abantu bashobora gutemberera ndetse mu majyaruguru yawo hari Pariki yâ€™Igihugu ya Virunga ibarizwamo ingagi zo mu misozi.
Iyo urebye ibikorwa remezo byinshi mu Mujyi wa Goma usanga imihanda myinshi yiganjemo ishaje yangiritse cyane. Kuva mu 2011 nibwo ibigo byâ€™Abashinwa byatangiye gusana no kubaka imihanda itandukanye ndetse umujyi ukaba uri kuvugururwa hubakwa inyubako nyinshi zigerekeranye cyane mu gace ka Birere.
Bitandukanye nâ€™Umujyi wa Rubavu nâ€™uwa Kigali, i Goma usanga hari ahakiri amashashi menshi ku muhanda kugera no mu ngo zâ€™abaturage, ubucuruzi bwinshi bukorerwa mu mihanda, ubwikorezi rusange bukorwa hifashishijwe moto cyangwa imodoka nto zo mu bwoko bwa Hiace, izi wazigereranya na za zindi zakoraga i Nyamirambo kuko inyinshi usanga zinatatseho ibintu bitandukanye mu rwego rwo kuzirimbisha.
Imbaho ni imari ishyushye ku batuye mu Mujyi wa Goma kuko inzu nyinshi usanga arizo zubakishije ndetse kugeza no ku magorofa.
Hari aho ugera wareba inzu uko isa inyuma ariko iyo uyinjiyemo ugasangamo amadiva nâ€™amakaro.
Ahanini kubera umukungugu nâ€™umucanga uhora mu bicu, hari aho usanga inzu nyinshi zaranduye inyuma, gusa imbere ziba zimeze neza.
Bitewe nâ€™uburyo ubutaka bwihagazeho muri uyu mujyi usanga inzu nyinshi zubatse mu buryo bugerekeranye mu rwego rw kugabanya ikiguzi no gusaranganya.
Ijisho ryâ€™umufotozi wa IGIHE ryasanze hari nâ€™aho amaduka yubakwa ariko akanakorerwamo mu gihe indi mirimo iba ikomeje.
Ibicuruzwa byinshi bigaragara muri aka gace byiganjemo amavuta yo mu bwoko butandukanye, ibyuma bya muzika, nâ€™ibindi byiganjemo ibya caguwa.
Â 	Internet yihagazeho i Gomaâ€¦
Ibyapa byinshi byamamaza nâ€™amaduka menshi i Goma agaragaramo ibicuruzwa bya Sosiyete ya Airtel ndetse na Vodacom. Internet yaho irahenda cyane ndetse kubona uyikoresha ni imbonekarimwe. Usanga nibura megabyte 100 zigura igihumbi cyâ€™amanye-Congo [akabakaba 500 Frw].
Â 	Ubushabitsi buragendaâ€¦
Ubuzima bwâ€™abaturage mu Mujyi wa Goma usanga butagoye cyane. Biroroshye kwihina ku muhanda ugasanga umusore uri gukora capati, anakaranze umureti ukamusaba ibyo ushaka.
Restaurants zaho wavuga ko zigendanwa cyane kuko usanga umuntu yarashinze ihema hafi yâ€™umuhanda, akaba ariho acururiza inyama nâ€™ifiriti nâ€™ibindi biribwa.
Mu bicuruzwa kandi bifite abakiliya benshi nta wakwirengagiza inyama ariko ahenshi usanga banakunda byimazeyo ibinono bitekwa mu isombe nâ€™ayandi mafunguro atandukanye.
Usanga umuntu ahembwa amafaranga make ariko abayeho neza, atunze umuryango mugari bitewe nâ€™uko amafunguro ahendutse.
Mu bwikorezi bwâ€™ibintu usanga ari imbonekarimwe kubona abakarani bikoreye ku mutwe kuko higanje ingorofani zikoreshwa mu gutwara ibicuruzwa nâ€™ibindi bitandukanye.
Â 	Abanye-Congo biyita â€˜Wananzambeâ€™
Ubusanzwe â€œNzambeâ€ ni ijambo ryâ€™Ilingala risobanura Imana. Ryakunze gukoreshwa mu ndirimbo nyinshi zâ€™abahanzi bo muri RDC ndetse ryageze aho rinifashishwa mu gihe hari ushaka kuvuga abaturage bo muri iki gihugu, akabita â€˜Wananzambeâ€™ cyangwa â€˜Bananzambeâ€™.
Ni izina ryishimirwa na benshi ndetse bakabigendera amafiyeri yo kwitwa no kwiyita abana bâ€™Imana. Iyi mvugo yarafashe kugeza aho abantu benshi kugera no ku batazi bita Abanye-Congo â€˜Wananzambeâ€™.
Ku bijyanye nâ€™imyemerere usanga benshi babarizwa muri Kiliziya Gatolika no mu Itorero rya Pantekote.
Â 	Ebola yatumye inzego zikangukira kwita ku isukuâ€¦
Ku wa 14 Nyakanga nibwo umurwayi wa mbere wa Ebola yabonetse mu mujyi wa Goma, ubwo yahageraga atwawe nâ€™imodoka avuye i Butembo, agace kamaze igihe karimo icyorezo cya Ebola. Iyo ndwara yaje no kumuhitana.
Hafashwe ingamba zirimo nâ€™izihuriweho nâ€™u Rwanda. Kuri ubu ahantu hose hahurira abantu benshi hashyizweho ahantu ho gukarabira intoki mu kwirinda Ebola.
Mu bwikorezi bwâ€™abantu kuri moto, usanga ingofero zâ€™abagenzi zitagikoreshwa cyane. Imodoka nyinshi nazo usanga zidafite plaque ziziranga ku buryo ukoze impanuka byoroshye kumuburira irengero.
Â 	Ruhago mu mitima ya benshi
RDC imaze kuba ubukombe mu gutanga abakinnyi bakomeye muri ruhago yâ€™Isi nubwo abenshi bakinira ibihugu byâ€™amahanga ariko hari amazina aba azwi cyane.
Uvuze Chancel Mbemba Mangulu wa FC Porto yo muri Portugal, Dieumerci Ndongala ukinira KRC Genk mu Bubiligi cyangwa TrÃ©sor Mputu Mabi ukinira TP Mazembe muri RDC ni abantu bazwi cyane.
Ibi bituma abana bato bakura bafite inzozi zo kuzaba ibyamamare muri ruhago aho nibura nâ€™uvuye ku ishuri usanga anyura kuri stade akabanza akihera ijisho uko umupira wâ€™amaguru ucongwa.
Umujyi wa Goma ufite ibibuga byinshi ariko Stade de lâ€™UnitÃ© iri mu bikomeye cyane. Ikoreshwa byâ€™umwihariko mu mikino itandukanye ndetse yakirirwaho imikino nâ€™amakipe atandukanye arimo AS Dauphins Noirs, DC Virunga na AS Kabasha. Iyi stade yavuguruwe ndetse yongerwa gufungurwa ku wa 6 Gicurasi 2018 ahakinwe umukino wahuje AS Kabasha na DC Virunga.
Ingabo za M23 mu Ugushyingo 2012 zafashe Umujyi wa Goma ariko ziza gushyira intwaro hasi nyuma yâ€™imishyikirano.
Imirwano yâ€™imitwe yitwaje intwaro yakunze kuzahaza Goma yatumye abanyabirori cyane bo mu ijuru basa nâ€™abacitse intege.
Amafoto: Muhizi Serge

Title: â€˜This is Rwandaâ€™, igitabo gikomeje kumurikira amahanga umwimerere wâ€™ubwiza bwâ€™u Rwanda mu mafoto
Body:
U Rwanda ni igihugu gitatse ibyiza uhereye ku miterere yarwo igizwe nâ€™imisozi, ibibaya nâ€™utununga, bikaba umwihariko iyo bigeze ku bikorwa biranga amateka yarwo, pariki zâ€™igihugu nâ€™ibikorwa byâ€™iterambere ryihuse rukomeje kugeraho.
U Rwanda ni igihugu gitatse ibyiza uhereye ku miterere yarwo igizwe nâ€™imisozi, ibibaya nâ€™utununga, bikaba umwihariko iyo bigeze ku bikorwa biranga amateka yarwo, pariki zâ€™igihugu nâ€™ibikorwa byâ€™iterambere ryihuse rukomeje kugeraho.
Ibi byose biri mu bituma rukomeje guhinduka icyerekezo gikwiye cyâ€™ubukerarugendo nâ€™ishoramari, abarusura bakitegereza ibyiza birimo inyamaswa nkâ€™Ingagi zo mu birunga zitaba ahandi.
Iyo nkuru abafotozi bamaze kubaka izina mu Rwanda, Philippe Nyirimihigo na GaÃ«l Ruboneka Vande weghe bashatse kuyisakaza hose, bandika igitabo â€œThis is Rwanda: An Aerial Photography Journeyâ€ kigizwe nâ€™amafoto 144 yafatiwe muri kajugujugu, cyasohotse mu mwaka ushize wa 2018. Gifite paji 288, ndetse gifite ireme kuko gipima nibura ibilo 2.8.
Nyirimihigo na Ruboneka banahurira ku kigo bashinze gikora ibijyanye nâ€™itumanaho, Illume Creative Studio.
Umushinga wâ€™iki gitabo watangiye mu 2013, birengagiza ibihe byabaga bigoranye nkâ€™imvura, imbeho nyinshi, umuyaga nâ€™izuba, bibageza ku gitabo gitanga isura nyayo yâ€™u Rwanda, itandukanye na rumwe abenshi bamenye nkâ€™igihugu gikennye cyangwa cyâ€™ibibazo.
Nyirimihigo yabwiye IGIHE ko usanga abantu basura u Rwanda bifuza gutahana iki gitabo, nkâ€™urwibutso rwâ€™ibice byiza byâ€™u Rwanda basuye. Gikubiyemo ahantu nyaburanga mu bice byose byâ€™igihugu, uhereye mu majyaruguru ukagera mu majyepfo, ugaturuka iburasirazuba ukageza mu burengero bwaryo.
Ati â€œHarimo ahantu Abanyarwanda bumva ariko batazi uko hasa. Cyangwa se niba umuntu yaranageze ahantu hose, twe tuguha igihugu ukirebeye hejuru mu ndege, navuga ko ari cyo gitabo cya mbere mu Rwanda kimeze gutyo, nta wundi muntu waba yaragikoze.â€
Ni igikorwa gifite umusanzu ukomeye wo kurushaho kwerekana ibyiza u Rwanda rufite, ngo rurusheho kuyobokwa na ba mukerarugendo, muri gahunda izwi nka â€˜Visit Rwandaâ€™.
Nyirimihigo yakomeje ati â€œIkindi twashatse kwerekana ko Abanyarwanda ubwabo bashobora gukora igitabo gifite ireme, kuko akenshi urebye ibi bitabo nkâ€™iki cyacu, bikorwa nâ€™abanyamaanga baza bagafotora bakigendera, bagasohora igitabo, amafaranga ntagume mu Rwanda ugasanga inyungu yâ€™igihugu ntayo ihari.â€
â€œTuravuga ngo abasore babiri, reka dukore gahunda yâ€™iki gitabo, dukorane nâ€™Abafatanyabikorwa ba Akagera Aviation, dusohore igitabo cyiza, cyakozwe nâ€™Abanyarwanda, kigenewe Abanyarwanda nâ€™abanyamahanga.â€
Ni urugendo rwari rukomeye
GaÃ«l Ruboneka Vande weghe wagize uruhare mu ifatwa ryâ€™amafoto, avuga ko bitabaye urugendo rworoshye kuko ibihe byagiye bibagora.
Ati â€œNtabwo byoroshye ariko icyadufashije ni uko u Rwanda ntabwo ari igihugu kinini, ushobora kugera hose vuba, ariko byadusabye gusuburimo inshuro nyinshi kubera imvura, hari aho wageraga ugasanga ibyo ushaka ntabwo ubibona, cyane cyane muri Nyungwe.â€
â€œUshobora kugera i Nyamagabe ukabona hari imvura hose iturutse i Burundi ikagera i Musanze, icyo gihe usubira inyuma. Kandi iyo uri muri kajugujugu birahenda, ntabwo ari nko gufata moto. Twabikoze amasaha 12 turi muri kajugujugu, ariko ayo masaha ari mu myaka itandukanye. Hari nkâ€™igihe twamaze amezi atatu twicaye, turindiriye ko mu gicu haba heza.â€
Amafoto ya mbere yafashwe mu 2013, aba basore babona ko hashobora kuvamo umushinga ukomeye ariko basanga ibikoresho bakeneye batabifite ako kanya. Mu 2015 hafashwe amafoto ya Kigali Convention Centre, nyuma haza ubufatanye na Akagera Aviation, ibafasha kuzenguruka igihugu muri kajugujugu zayo.
Buri foto yashyizwe muri iki gitabo yagiye ihabwa ibisobanuro, kugira ngo byorohere umuntu wese wareba ayo mafoto gusobanukirwa ahantu hafatiwe.
GaÃ«l R. Vande weghe yakomeje ati â€œIgitabo â€˜This is Rwandaâ€™ abantu baragikunze, bakomeje kukigura nkâ€™uko twabitekerezaga, ikindi ni uko abantu bishimiye amafoto ku buryo batubwiye ngo ntabwo bari bazi ko u Rwanda rumeze kuriya, ku buryo icya mbere kubona Abanyarwanda bareba igitabo bakabona ikintu batari bazi, twe byaradushimishije cyane.â€
Imihigo irakomeje
Kugeza ubu hamaze kugurishwa ibitabo birenga 1000 kandi birakomeje, gusa bigurishwa mu Rwanda, ntabwo birashoboka ko bigezwa hanze yâ€™u Rwanda.
Mu 2011 Nyirimihigo yanagize uruhare mu gukora ikindi gitabo nacyo cyâ€™amafoto bise â€˜Birds in Rwandaâ€™, kigaragaza amoko anyuranye yâ€™inyoni ziboneka mu Rwanda.
Nyuma yâ€™iki gitabo, aba bagabo barimo kunoza umushinga wo gufotora mu bindi bihugu bitandukanye bya Afurika, nibura bakagenda bakorera buri gihugu igitabo nkâ€™icyo bakoze ku Rwanda. Hari na gahunda yo kugenda bavugurura igitabo kigaragaza u Rwanda, uko rugenda rugira isura nshya kubera umurongo wâ€™iterambere rurimo.
Mu gufotora ibindi bihugu bya Afurika, Nyirimihigo na Ruboneka bafite igitekerezo ko bazagenda bafatanya nâ€™abenegihugu babyo, kugira ngo abaturage bazibone muri ibyo bitabo.
Igitabo â€™This is Rwandaâ€™ kiboneka mu maguriro atandukanye yâ€™ibitabo arimo Ikirezi, Charisma muri Kigali Height, Pili Pili no ku biro bya Illume. Kigura $80.
Amafoto: GaÃ«l Ruboneka Vande weghe na Philippe Nyirimihigo

Title: Kigali: Uyu mwaka uzasiga ubusitani bwashyizwe ahimuwe inganda bwatangiye kubyazwa umusaruro
Body:
Ubuyobozi bwâ€™Umujyi wa Kigali bwatangaje ko uyu mwaka wa 2019 uzarangira ubusitani bwashyizwe i Gikondo ahimuwe inganda bwiswe â€œGikondo Recreation Parkâ€ bwatangiye gukoreshwa no kubyazwa umusaruro.
Ubuyobozi bwâ€™Umujyi wa Kigali bwatangaje ko uyu mwaka wa 2019 uzarangira ubusitani bwashyizwe i Gikondo ahimuwe inganda bwiswe â€œGikondo Recreation Parkâ€ bwatangiye gukoreshwa no kubyazwa umusaruro.
Ibi Umujyi wa Kigali wabitangaje kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki ya 28 Ukwakira 2019,mu kiganiro bwagiranye na IGIHE.
Ubu busitani bwatangiye gushyirwa muri aka gace muri Kamena 2018 ndetse biteganyijwe ko aho bwashyizwe hazaba ari ahantu nyaburanga, ahantu abanya-Kigali nâ€™abatembereye mu murwa mukuru wâ€™u Rwanda bazajya basohokera ariko bakishyura amafaranga make.
Umuvugizi wâ€™Umujyi wa Kigali, Bruno Rangira,yabwiye IGIHE ko igice cya mbere cyo gutunganya ubu busitani cyarangiye.
Yavuze ko umushinga watinze kurangira kubera inyigo Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu gishinzwe kubungabunga ibidukikije (REMA) ku buryo igishanga cyose cyatunganywa.
Yagize ati â€œ Hari inyigo iri gukorwa na REMA yâ€™ukuntu kiriya gishanga cyose cyatunganywa cyose. Byasabye ko bigenda gahoro kugira ngo bafate umwanzuro wâ€™igihe bizakorwa.â€
Yongeyeho ati â€œ Ubu turi kuvugana nâ€™abafatanyabikorwa batandukanye bashobora kuhakurikirana kugira ngo aribo bakira abantu bahaza no kuhakorera isuku nâ€™ibindi. Ndumva ibyo aribyo byose mu kwezi gutaha bizaba byatunganye kugira ngo harebwe uko hatangira gukoreshwa.â€
Rangira akomeza avuga ko bizeye neza ko uyu mwaka wa 2019 uzarangira buriya busitani bwatangiye gukoreshwa.
Byari biteganyijwe ko muri Kamena uyu mwaka aribwo gusura no gutembera muri ubwo busitani byari gutangira.
Icyiciro cya gatatu cyo gutunganya "Gikondo Recreation Park" kizaba ari icyo kuringaniza ubutaka, gusenya inyubako zihegereye no kuhatunganya ku buryo nâ€™umuntu uri kure azajya abasha kwihera ijisho.
Ubusitani bwa â€œGikondo Recreation Parkâ€ buzarangira gutunganywa butwaye miliyoni 600 Frw.

Title: Hafunguwe ahantu hihariye ho kwakirira abagenzi ku Kibuga cyâ€™Indege cya Kigali (Amafoto)
Body:
Radisson Blu Hotel and Convention Centre nâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Ingendo zâ€™Indege zo mu bwoko bwa Kajugujugu mu Rwanda, Akagera Aviation, byafunguye ahantu havuguruye ho kwakirirwa abagenzi ku Kibuga Mpuzamahanga cyâ€™Indege cya Kigali.
Radisson Blu Hotel and Convention Centre nâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Ingendo zâ€™Indege zo mu bwoko bwa Kajugujugu mu Rwanda, Akagera Aviation, byafunguye ahantu havuguruye ho kwakirirwa abagenzi ku Kibuga Mpuzamahanga cyâ€™Indege cya Kigali.
Umuhango wo gufungura ku mugaragaro ahantu ho kuruhukira ku kibuga cyâ€™indege (VIP Lounge) i Kanombe wabaye ku wa 25 Ukwakira 2019, witabiriwe nâ€™abashoramari mu byâ€™ubukerarugendo nâ€™abayobozi mu nzego zitandukanye.
Ni ahantu hazifashishwa nâ€™abagenzi bashaka kuruhuka no kuganira batuje muri gahunda ya â€˜Meet and greetâ€™; banateganyirijwe serivisi zihariye nko guhabwa icyo kunywa no kurya, internet ya 4G, aho gucomeka mudasobwa na telefoni nâ€™ibindi.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Akagera Aviation, Nkulikiyimfura Patrick, yavuze ko ahantu hafunguwe mu rwego rwo kugusha neza abasura u Rwanda.
Ati â€œIntego yacu yâ€™ibanze ni uguteza imbere gahunda ya â€˜Visit Rwandaâ€™ no kureba uko dufatanya nâ€™abikorera. Inshingano zacu ni ugutwara abantu, nta bunarararibonye dufite muri serivisi za hoteli, ariko twahuza imbaraga nkâ€™abari mu bukerarugendo.â€™â€™
â€œTwari dufite ahantu abantu bashobora kuruhukira bakaganira kuva mu myaka itanu ariko twasanze bamwe mu bakiliya ba Radisson ari bo bagenzi akenshi bajyana natwe. Igitekerezo gihari ni uguha ba mukerarugendo uburyo butuma banogerwa no kuba mu Rwanda bakihakandagiza ikirenge.â€™â€™
Abagenzi bazajya bakiranwa ubwuzu bategereje ko ibyangombwa byabo bisuzumwa nâ€™Urwego rwâ€™Abinjira nâ€™Abasohoka, cyangwa babwira ababo ko urugendo rwagenze neza.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Radisson Blu Hotel & Kigali Convention Centre, Denis Dernault, yavuze ko gutangiza aha hantu ari intambwe nziza yatewe mu gutanga serivisi nziza ku babagana.
Yagize ati â€œNi ahantu heza hazatanga ishusho ku basura u Rwanda bakarushaho kurwishimira. Izajya ikora amasaha yose itanga ibyo kurya no kunywa. Ni ukubaka ikintu kizatuma abantu bagaruka mu Rwanda baba bagamije gukora ubukerarugendo, gusura no kureba ubwiza bwâ€™igihugu nâ€™ibindi.â€™â€™
Iyi lounge yari imaze imyaka isaga ine ikora, serivisi zayo zaravuguruwe bijyanye nâ€™abashyitsi bahakirirwa na gahunda yo kubaka ubukungu bushingiye ku bukerarugendo. Abazahakirirwa bazahabwa serivisi zâ€™amasaha yose nkâ€™izo muri Radisson Blu.
Umuyobozi Mukuru mu Kigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere, RDB, ushinzwe Ubukerarugendo, Belise Kaliza, yashimye abahuje imbaraga mu gushyiraho ahantu ho kwakirira abantu.
Ati â€œU Rwanda rufite gahunda yo kubaka igihugu kibereye ubukerarugendo. Kugira iyi â€˜loungeâ€™ ni igikorwa cyuzuza Guverinoma muri icyo cyerekezo. Ni ahantu heza hazatuma abantu bagira ishusho yâ€™u Rwanda.â€™â€™
Yasabye ko hakongerwamo ikoranabuhanga nka iPad zafasha abashyitsi kureba ahari amahirwe yâ€™ishoramari mu Rwanda nâ€™ibindi.
The official opening ceremony of @AkageraAviation Lounge by #RadissonBlu was graced by high ranking government officials, representatives of tour operators & MICE industry. With an elegant design & 5-star service the lounge is a value add to the end-to-end passenger experience. pic.twitter.com/fsVeWx73UX
â€” Radisson Blu Kigali (@RadissonKigali) October 26, 2019
Radisson Blu Hotel & Kigali Convention Centre ni hoteli yâ€™inyenyeri eshanu. Ifite ibyumba 291, birimo 201 bisanzwe, bitanu biri ku rwego rwo kwakira Umukuru wâ€™Igihugu na kimwe cyakwakira umwami; nâ€™ibindi 68 byiyubashye ku buryo byakwakira abandi bayobozi bakomeye. Hari nâ€™ibindi byihariye bitanu biteye mu buryo bwisanzuye (Junior suites) bifite nâ€™uruganiro. Ifite restaurants esheshatu na bar, ahatangirwa serivisi za Spa nâ€™ahakorerwa imyitozo ngororamubiri.
Hagati ya Nyakanga 2016 na 2019, iyi nyubako yakiriye ibikorwa 853 byitabiriwe nâ€™abantu 320 000. Imaze kwegukana ibihembo 23 biri ku rwego mpuzamahanga harimo icyenda bitangwa nâ€™Ikigo Mpuzamahanga cyâ€™Ubukerarugendo, World Travel Awards (WTA).
KCC ifite ibyumba byâ€™inama 18 birimo nâ€™icyumba kinini cyakira abantu 2600, ariko hashobora kuberamo nâ€™ibindi bikorwa nkâ€™ibitaramo nâ€™ubukwe. Ibindi byumba byubatswe hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga rituma bishobora guhuzwa bikakira abantu 2000 icyarimwe, bisobanuye ko ibyumba byose byâ€™inama bigize iyi nyubako bishobora kwakira abantu 5500.
KCC ifite parking yo munsi yâ€™ubutaka [underground parking] ishobora kwakira imodoka 180, wakongeraho nâ€™indi rusange imodoka 650 zigaparika mu mutekano usesuye.
Akagera Aviation yo yatangiye gukora mu 2008, ariko mu 2013 nibwo yinjiye mu byo gutanga amahugurwa yo gutwara indege. Ni cyo kigo cya mbere kigisha ibijyanye no gutwara kajugujugu mu Karere ka Afurika yâ€™Iburasirazuba.

Title: I Kigali, mu bwiza bwa Nyandungu ahari kurimbishirizwa abifuza kuruhuka (Video)
Body:
Igishushanyo mbonera cyâ€™Umujyi wa Kigali giteganya ko ubuso bungana na 6% muri kilometero kare 738 zawo buzarimbishwa nkâ€™ahantu abantu bashobora gutemberera cyangwa kuharuhukira bakishimana nâ€™abandi.
Igishushanyo mbonera cyâ€™Umujyi wa Kigali giteganya ko ubuso bungana na 6% muri kilometero kare 738 zawo buzarimbishwa nkâ€™ahantu abantu bashobora gutemberera cyangwa kuharuhukira bakishimana nâ€™abandi.
Uyu mushinga uzasiga ibice bitandukanye bihinduwe ahantu nyaburanga ku buryo bishobora no gukurura ba mukerarugendo basura u Rwanda.
Mu 2020, Kigali izunguka ahantu ha mbere hari gutunganyirizwa abashaka kuruhuka mbere yo gutekereza ingendo zo mu ntara kureba amoko yâ€™inyoni, gusura ingagi nâ€™izindi nyamaswa ziri muri pariki.
Muri uyu mushinga Leta yâ€™u Rwanda iri guhindura Igishanga cya Nyandungu giherereye mu mirenge ya Ndera ho mu Karere ka Gasabo na Nyarugunga muri Kicukiro, Pariki yâ€™Ubukerarugendo bubungabunga Ibidukikije (Eco-Tourism Park).
Ibikorwa biri kuhashyirwa biri mu bya mbere byo ku rwego rwisumbuye byubakwa mu gihugu habungwabungwa urusobe rwâ€™ibinyabuzima.
Nyandungu iri gutunganywa ngo isubirane umwimerere wayo! Biteganyijwe ko izashyirwamo ibiyaga, ibyatsi nâ€™ibiti, ruhurura zubatse ku buryo buzifasha gufata amazi ava ku misozi no kuyayungurura mbere yo kugera mu gishanga.
Iyi pariki igabanyije mu bice bitanu birimo ahari igishanga hagumishijwe uko hari bimeze, ibiyaga karemano, ubusitani bwâ€™imiti ya Kinyarwanda yakoreshwaga mu kuvura nâ€™ibindi.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe Imishinga yo Kurengera Ibidukikije nâ€™Imihindagurikire yâ€™Ibihe mu Kigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Ibidukikije (REMA), Umugwaneza Janet, yabwiye IGIHE ko Pariki ya Nyandungu ari umushinga wa mbere ugamije kubungabunga ibidukikije ushyizwe i Kigali.
Yagize ati â€œTwifuza gusubiranya iki gishanga. Tuzatera ibimera bisa nâ€™ibicika mu gihugu ku buryo abana, abanyeshuri, abakora ubushakashatsi bazabona ibyo bumvaga mu magambo.â€™â€™
Ibyo biti byashyizwemo birimo â€˜umugoteâ€™, â€˜igikakarubambaâ€™, â€˜imiravumbaâ€™, â€˜iminyinyaâ€™, â€˜ikirogoraâ€™, â€˜umubiriziâ€™, â€˜igicuncuâ€™, â€˜igiteneteneâ€™, â€˜umukundeâ€™.
Yakomeje avuga ko â€œHari agace kazaterwamo ibyatsi (Medicinal garden) bijyanye nâ€™umuco wo kuvura. Hari ibiti byagiye bicika kandi byari bifite akamaro. Ni mu rwego rwo kwigisha ku buryo naho umuntu yabibona abiha agaciro ko byakwifashishwa mu yindi mishinga.â€™â€™
Iyi pariki kandi nkâ€™umushinga wagenewe kubungabunga ibidukikije, abayikoresha bazajya bagenda nâ€™amaguru cyangwa amagare yabugenewe.
Ukinjira muri iyi pariki unyuze ku muhanda ugana i Masoro, hari inzira ebyiri zirimo iyâ€™abanyamaguru nâ€™abanyamagare. Izi nzira zireshya nâ€™ibilometero 10 na metero ebyiri zubatswe hifashishijwe amabuye yâ€™amakoro, zikaba zikikijwe nâ€™imigano yavanywe mu Bushinwa ndetse hagati yazo hazaterwa indabyo nziza.
Yakomeje ati â€œIyi migano itandukanye nâ€™isanzwe. Iri mu igeragezwa ku buryo harebwa ko yazavamo ibindi bikoresho.â€™â€™
Umushinga wo kuryoshya Nyandungu hari aho ugenda buhoro bitewe nâ€™imiterere yâ€™igishanga kuko hari aho abakozi basanga amazi menshi bakifashisha ubundi buryo ariko butangiza cyangwa bubangamire ibidukikije.
Umugwaneza ati â€œHari aho igishanga dusanga kimeze neza tukahareka, aho dushyira ibikorwa ni ahangiritse, ahari ibiyaga naho ni ahacukuwe ibumba. Ibice bidafite amazi menshi niho hazaterwa utwatsi tugufi ku buryo umuntu yakwicaramo cyangwa agashyiramo intebe. Ahari urukangaga ho tuzahareka gutyo.â€™â€™
Ibiyaga karemano byashyizwe muri iki gishanga biri ku buso bwa metero kare ziri hagati ya 4393 na 5892; amazi abirimo aturuka mu gishanga cya Nyandungu, kera cyari cyajugunywagamo imyanda.
Yakomeje agaragaza ko â€œImyanda yari mu gishanga yabangamiraga inyoni, gutera ibiti bituma zibona aho zubaka ibyari nâ€™aho ziterera. Turashaka kureba ko hazaza ibindi binyabuzima.â€™â€™
Ati â€œUburyo ibiyaga bikorwa hashyirwamo uturwa duto duteyemo ibiti, duhamagara inyoni ziza zikurikiye ibiti nâ€™amazi ngo zibone aho zubaka. Turateganya guteza imbere ubukerarugendo bwo kureba inyoni, twabonye ko harimo nyinshi zishobora no kwiyongera.â€™â€™
Uyu mushinga witezweho kwirinda imyuzure cyane mu gace ka Nyandungu wose uzifashishwamo ibikoresho bitangiza ibidukikije.
Uhereye ku ruzitiro ruzaba rukozwe mu biti byâ€™amahwa ku buryo umuntu urimo imbere adashobora kubona inyuma yarwo cyangwa ngo yumve amajwi ahaturuka.
Restaurant izubakwa hifashishijwe ibyo bikoresho ndetse hatekerezwa uko yakubakwa ikazaterekwa ahabugenewe yuzuye.
Pariki ya Nyandungu kandi yagenewe parking ebyiri zingana na metero kare 2500 zishobora kwakira imodoka 100 icyarimwe. Biteganyijwe kandi ko umuriro wose uzakoreshwa uzaturuka ku mirasire yâ€™izuba.
Â 	Amateka ya Papa i Nyandungu ntiyarengejwe ingohe
Hagati ya tariki 7 na 9 Nzeri 1990, Mutagatifu Papa Yohani Pawulo II, yasuye u Rwanda aruzaniye ubutumwa bwâ€™amahoro. Yasomeye misa mu bice bitandukanye birimo na Nyandungu, aho yahagaze ku wa 9 Nzeri 1990 habura amasaha make ngo asoze uruzinduko rwe.
Buri hantu, Papa yahasigaga ikimenyetso ndetse hubakwa ibikorwa remezo na Kiliziya Gatolika mu rwego rwo kumuha icyubahiro.
Amateka yâ€™aho Papa yasomeye Misa i Kigali azashyirwa mu gishanga cya Nyandungu mu Mujyi wa Kigali, ari mu bizashyirwa mu Busitani bwitiriwe Papa.
Â 	Nyandungu yatangiye kuganurwaho!
Umushinga wo gutunganya Nyandungu uri muri gahunda zo kubungabunga ibidukikije mu gukumira iyangizwa ryâ€™ibikorwa bifitiye igihugu akamaro, kongera urusobe rwâ€™ibinyabuzima, kugabanya imyuzure, gukora ubukangurambaga bwo kubungabunga ibishanga no guhanga imirimo mishya muri Gahunda yâ€™Imbaturabukungu ya Kabiri (EDPRS II).
Abakozi barenga 200 [biyongera bitewe nâ€™akazi gahari] ni bo bari mu kazi ko gutunganya Nyandungu.
Abaganiriye na IGIHE bagaragaje ko bungukiye byinshi muri uyu mushinga wo kubungabunga ibidukikije.
Dusabemariya Alphonsine wâ€™imyaka 48, umunyamakuru wa IGIHE yasanze ari gukora mu irerero ryâ€™ibiti (PÃ©piniÃ¨re) yavuze ko â€œUbu ntunze abana banjye kandi nishyura mituweli nâ€™ibindi.â€™â€™
Iryamukuru Emmanuel wâ€™imyaka 35 yavuze ko yungukiye byinshi muri uyu mushinga. Uyu mugabo wâ€™abana babiri yavuze ko amaze gukuramo amafaranga asaga ibihumbi 300 Frw.
Ati â€œNzabwira abana banjye ko ahantu babona nahakoze, bakareba ibyiza nyaburanga nabo bakavuga bati umubyeyi wacu nawe yigeze kuba agezweho.â€™â€™
Umugwaneza yavuze ko uyu mushinga wakozwe muri gahunda yo kunoza ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku bidukikije.
Ati â€œTurifuza ko umuntu uzaza muri iyi pariki azagira ishusho yâ€™u Rwanda ku buryo ba mukerarugendo bazishimira kuhasura. Abaza mu Rwanda mbere yo kujya muri za Nyungwe, bakabanza kuhanyura. Hari ibikorwa byinshi bizahashyirwa kandi bizabyara amafaranga.â€™â€™
Uyu mushinga uhuriweho nâ€™Uturere twa Gasabo na Kicukiro, Umujyi wa Kigali Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere, RDB, nâ€™Ikigega cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Ibidukikije nâ€™Imihindagurikire yâ€™Ibihe, FONERWA. Biteganyijwe ko uzinjiza miliyari yâ€™amafaranga yâ€™u Rwanda yâ€™inyungu mu myaka 12.
Ni umushinga uri ku buso bwa hegitari 130, byitezwe ko uzuzura mu 2020 utwaye miliyari 5.2 Frw. Ibikorwa byo gutera ibiti nâ€™ubusitani bizakomeza kugeza mu 2021.
Â 	Ishusho ya bimwe mu bice bigize Pariki ya Nyandungu nimara kuzura

Title: DeGeneres na Portia bateguye ibirori birebana nâ€™ingagi zo mu Rwanda byitabiriwe nâ€™ibyamamare muri Hollywood
Body:
Ellen DeGeneres nâ€™umugore we Portia de Rossi kuwa Gatandatu wâ€™icyumweru gishize bateguye ibirori byiswe â€˜Gorillapaloozaâ€™ byari bigamije gushishikariza abantu kwita ku ngagi zo mu birunga mu Rwanda hakusanywa inkunga yo kuzibungabunga.
Ellen DeGeneres nâ€™umugore we Portia de Rossi kuwa Gatandatu wâ€™icyumweru gishize bateguye ibirori byiswe â€˜Gorillapaloozaâ€™ byari bigamije gushishikariza abantu kwita ku ngagi zo mu birunga mu Rwanda hakusanywa inkunga yo kuzibungabunga.
Ibi birori byabereye mu cyumba cya Hollywood Palladium, cyafunguwe mu 1940, kikaba gifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira abantu 5000. Byitabiriwe nâ€™abahanzi ndetse nâ€™ababyinnyi bâ€™ibyamamare.
Byakusanyirijwemo inkunga ya miliyoni $5 yo gushyira mu kigega The Ellen Fund, gitera inkunga ibikorwa byo kubungabunga inyamaswa ziri mu kaga ko gukendera ku Isi ndetse no kurangiza kubaka ikigo kigamije kubungabunga ingagi zo mu birunga mu Rwanda.
Iki kigo cyiswe The Ellen DeGeneres Campus kizafasha mu bikorwa byâ€™umuryango witiriwe Dian Fossey, aho kizibanda ku bushakashatsi bugamije kubungabunga ingagi zo mu misozi miremire ziri gukendera ku Isi.
Portia de Rossi yabwiye abitabiriye ibi birori ati â€œNdashaka ko abantu babyitaho. Ndakeka ko ari byo twese dushaka, ko abantu babyitaho bakamenya icyo bisobanuye ku kiremwamuntu kugira ibiremwa bitangaje nkâ€™ibi biriho kandi bibayeho nezaâ€.
Yakomeje agira ati â€œNagerageje guhindura Hollywood Palladium ishyamba ryo muri Afurika. Nashakaga mu byâ€™ukuri ko yumvikana nkâ€™aho ingagi ziri hariya kuko nkeneye ko abantu aho bari mu mudendezo i Los Angeles bajya mu Rwanda bakumva uko biba bimeze kuba ukikijwe nâ€™ibi biremwa bidasanzweâ€.
Ibi birori byagombaga kuririmbamo umuhanzi Miley Cyrus ariko ntibyakunda kubera uburwayi, asimburwa na Chris Martin, waririmbye indirimbo eshanu zirimo; Iâ€™m a Believer, Party in the U.S.A nâ€™izindi.
Cyasojwe kandi umuhanzi Bruno Mars, aririmbye indirimbo zirimo; â€˜Uptown Funkâ€™, â€˜24K Magicâ€™ na â€˜Just the Way You Are.â€™
Iki gikorwa cyakusanyijwemo miliyoni $5 zâ€™amadolari harimo ayavuye muri cyamunara yakozwe na DeGeneres afatanyije nâ€™icyamamare James Corden umenyerewe mu kiganiro Late Late Show, aho abitabiriye ibirori Julia Roberts na Sofia Vergara, batanze igiciro kiri hejuru.
The Ellen Fund irimo kubaka ikigo kizafasha mu bikorwa bya Dian Fossey Gorilla Fund, kizaba kiri ku buso bwa metero kare zirenga 4600, gifite laboratwari, isomero, ibyumba byâ€™inama, ahazajya habera imurikabikorwa, amashuri nâ€™amacumbi yâ€™abashakashatsi nâ€™abanyeshuri.
Inyubako zizaba zirimo amacumbi, aho kwigira, ibigo byâ€™ubushakashatsi ndetse nâ€™aho kumurikira ibihangano byâ€™ubugeni bijyanye no kubungabunga ibinyabuzima.
Iki kigega kivuga ko â€œIntego ni ugufasha umuryango witiriwe Dian Fossey wita ku ngagi, Dian Fossey Gorilla Fund, mu bikorwa byawo byo kurengera ingagi. Ni no kubera icyitegererezo buri wese uyisuye mu bijyanye no kwita ku ngagi ndetse no kuzibungabungaâ€.
â€œIcyâ€™ingenzi cyane, iki kigo kizafasha mu kwigisha abanyafurika bâ€™igisekuru cyâ€™ahazaza ibijyanye no kubungabunga urusobe rwâ€™ibidukikije.â€
Muri iki kigo nta ngagi zizahaba ahubwo hazaba abanyeshuri nâ€™abashakashatsi. Mu kubaka iki kigo abaturage 1500 bazahabwa imirimo. Ibuye ryâ€™ifatizo ryashyizweho tariki 12 Gashyantare 2019.
Muri icyo kigo ni naho hazaba hari ibiro byâ€™ ikigega Dian Fossey Gorilla Fund kimaze imyaka isaga 50 gikorera mu Rwanda binyuze mu gashami kacyo gashinzwe ubushakashatsi ka Karisoke Research Centre mu Karere ka Musnze.
Ikigega Dian Fossey Fund ni kimwe mu miryango mpuzamahanga ikomeye mu bijyanye no kubungabunga ingagi.
Iki kigo kizashimangira ubushake bwâ€™u Rwanda mu kubungabunga urusobe rwâ€™ibinyabuzima no guteza imbere ubumenyi. Biteganyijwe ko ikigo gishya kizafungura imiryango ku mugaragaro mu ntangiriro za 2021.
DeGeneres na de Rossi, bamaze kuza mu Rwanda inshuro eshatu mu bikorwa byo kurengera ingagi zo mu birunga.

Title: David Luiz yageze i Kigali (Amafoto)
Body:
Ahagana saa mbili zâ€™umugoroba kuri uyu wa Kane, nibwo David Luiz aherekejwe nâ€™umukunzi we ndetse na mama we bageze i Kigali, mu ruzinduko rwâ€™iminsi ibiri rugamije gusura u Rwanda.
Ahagana saa mbili zâ€™umugoroba kuri uyu wa Kane, nibwo David Luiz aherekejwe nâ€™umukunzi we ndetse na mama we bageze i Kigali, mu ruzinduko rwâ€™iminsi ibiri rugamije gusura u Rwanda.
Uyu myugariro wa Arsenal ni we mukinnyi wâ€™iyi kipe yo mu Majyaruguru ya Londres mu Bwongereza watoranyijwe ngo asure u Rwanda, mu bikorwa bijyanye nâ€™amasezerano ikipe ye yagiranye narwo yo kwamamaza ubukerarugendo.
Yakiriwe na bamwe mu bakozi bâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere, RDB, nyuma yerekeza muri Marriot Hotel aho acumbikiwe.
Mbere yâ€™uko agera mu Rwanda, Luiz yatangaje ko anejejwe no guhagararira Arsenal mu Rwanda nka hamwe mu hantu nyaburanga.
Ati â€œNumvise ibintu byinshi byiza bijyanye nâ€™ubwiza bwâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™Abanyarwanda, ntegerezanyije amatsiko gusura iki gihugu nâ€™ibyo gifite byose.â€
Luiz aje mu Rwanda mu gihe Shampiyona zo ku mugabane wâ€™u Burayi zahagaze kubera imikino yâ€™amakipe yâ€™ibihugu, uyu we akaba atarahamagawe nâ€™Umutoza wa BrÃ©sil, Tite, mu mikino ya gicuti igihugu cye kiri gukinira muri Singapore irimo nâ€™uwo cyanganyije na SÃ©nÃ©gal igitego 1-1 kuri uyu wa 10 Ukwakira 2019.
Azava mu Rwanda agiranye ikiganiro nâ€™abanyamakuru kizaba ku munsi ubanziriza uwo azasubiriraho mu Bwongereza.
Muri Gicurasi 2018 nibwo u Rwanda rwinjiye mu bufatanye bwâ€™imyaka itatu na Arsenal FC, bugamije kurumenyekanisha u Rwanda nkâ€™icyerekezo gikomeye cyâ€™ubukerarugendo nâ€™ishoramari, binyuze mu gushyira ikirango â€˜Visit Rwandaâ€™ ku kuboko kwâ€™ibumoso ku myenda yayo.

Title: RDB yeguriwe Pariki yâ€™Igihugu ya Gishwati-Mukura
Body:
Minisiteri yâ€™Ibidukikije mu Rwanda yashyikirije Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere, RDB, Pariki yâ€™Igihugu ya Gishwati-Mukura, kugira ngo kiyibyaze umusaruro mu buryo burimo no gukurura ba mukerarugendo.
Minisiteri yâ€™Ibidukikije mu Rwanda yashyikirije Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere, RDB, Pariki yâ€™Igihugu ya Gishwati-Mukura, kugira ngo kiyibyaze umusaruro mu buryo burimo no gukurura ba mukerarugendo.
Uyu ni umuhango wabaye kuri uyu wa Kabiri witabirwa nâ€™abayobozi batandukanye barimo Minisitiri wâ€™Ibidukikije, Dr Vincent Biruta ari kumwe nâ€™Umuyobozi Mukuru muri RDB Ushinzwe ubukerarugendo na Pariki zâ€™igihugu, Belise Kaliza.
Iki gikorwa kigezweho nyuma yâ€™aho muri Gashyantare 2016 ishyamba cyimeza rya Gishwati-Mukura riherereye mu ruhererekane rwâ€™Imisozi yâ€™isunzu rya Congo-Nil, ryemejwe nka Pariki yâ€™Igihugu ya kane u Rwanda rufite.
Iyi pariki iherereye mu Turere twa Rutsiro na Ngororero mu Ntara yâ€™i Burengerazuba bwâ€™igihugu, ingana na hegitari 3 558, harimo icyanya cya Gishwati gifite ubuso bungana na Hegitari 1 570, nâ€™icya Mukura kingana na Hegitari 1 988.
Ni pariki yabashije kubaho kubera uruhare rwa leta nâ€™abaturage, kuko nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi iyi pariki yari yarakendereye, ituzwamo abaturage ndetse ibindi bikorwa byabo birushaho kuyangiza.
Minisitiri Dr Biruta yavuze ko kuva itegeko ryo gushyiraho iyi pariki ryatorwa mu myaka ine ishize, hashyizweho ibikorwa byinshi byo kuyisana ahantu hari haragiye hangirika kubera ubucukuzi butemewe bwâ€™amabuye yâ€™agaciro nâ€™ibindi bikorwa byagiye biyikorerwamo.
Yagize ati â€œHashyizweho ibikorwa byo kubaka inzu aho abacunga iyi pariki bazajya bakorera, ahagurishirizwa ibintu bituruka muri ririya shyamba harimo ubuki, ibikorwa byâ€™ubukorikori nâ€™ibindi, ku buryo ba mukerarugendo bazajya baza, babikenera bakabibona.â€
â€œKuba twarashoboye gukora Pariki ya Gishwati ubu ikaba yarabaye iya kane ni igikorwa gikomeye kuko cyakiriwe neza ku rwego mpuzamahanga, iriya pariki usibye nâ€™ibyâ€™ubukerarugendo ni igikorwa gikomeye mu kubungabunga ibidukikije.â€
Umuyobozi Mukuru muri RDB Ushinzwe ubukerarugendo na Pariki zâ€™igihugu, Belise Kaliza, yashimiye abagize uruhare bose ngo iyi pariki icungwe neza, kugeza uyu munsi igiye gutangira kubyazwa umusaruro mu buryo bwâ€™ubukerarugendo.
Yagize ati â€œNdashimira abantu bose ku byo bakoze ngo bibe bigeze uyu munsi, turizera ko Gishwati tuzayibyaza umusaruro nkâ€™uko nâ€™izindi pariki tuzibyaza umusaruro.â€
Yavuze ko iyo bamukerarugendo bumvise ko igihugu gishyize imbere kubungabunga ibidukikije, nabo babiha agaciro gakomeye cyane.
RDB iheruka gusinyana amasezerano yâ€™imyaka 25 nâ€™ikigo Imizi Ecotourism Development Ltd, yo gutunganya no gucunga Pariki yâ€™igihugu ya Gishwati-Mukura, ku buryo ihinduka igice gikorerwamo ubukerarugendo mu gihugu.
Ikigo Imizi gishamikiye kuri Wilderness Safari imaze kubaka izina mu bijyanye nâ€™ubukerarugendo bugezweho kuri uyu mugabane.
Ayo masezerano azatuma ikigo Imizi gitunganya ndetse gicunge Pariki yâ€™igihugu ya Gishwati Mukura ku buryo ba mukerarugendo bazoroherwa no gusura inguge nâ€™ibisamuntu bihaboneka, RDB igumane inshingano zo kubungabunga urusobe rwâ€™ibinyabuzima nâ€™ibikorwa byo kurengera ibidukikije.
Iyi pariki izwiho ubwoko bwâ€™inyamaswa zinyuranye ziganjemo inkende nâ€™impundu (chimpanzee) nâ€™inkima (golden monkey) nâ€™izindi nyamaswa nto zinyuranye. Ririmo kandi amoko asaga 60 yâ€™ibiti, birimo ibinini nâ€™imigano. RDB yamaze gushyiraho umuyobozi wâ€™iyi pariki, akazunganirwa nâ€™abakozi 25 bazaba bayicunga.
Pariki yâ€™Igihugu ya Gishwati-Mukura isanga izindi eshatu zirimo Pariki yâ€™Igihugu yâ€™Akagera, iyâ€™Ibirunga na Pariki yâ€™igihugu ya Nyungwe.
RDB igaragaza ko mu 2017 u Rwanda rwinjije miliyoni $438 zivuye mu bukerarugendo, intego ya Guverinoma ni uko mu 2024 inyungu ruvana mu bukerarugendo izagera kuri miliyoni $800.
Amafoto: Dushimimana Ami Pacique

Title: Ba mukerarugendo batangiye gupimwa Coronavirus mbere yo gusura ingagi
Body:
Umuyobozi Mukuru wâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere (RDB), Clare Akamanzi, yatangaje ko abasura ingagi muri Pariki yâ€™Ibirunga batangiye gupimwa icyorezo cya Coronavirus mbere yo kujya gusura ibi byiza, igikorwa na bo bishimiye kuko bituma bumva bafite umutekano uhagije ku buzima bwabo.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere (RDB), Clare Akamanzi, yatangaje ko abasura ingagi muri Pariki yâ€™Ibirunga batangiye gupimwa icyorezo cya Coronavirus mbere yo kujya gusura ibi byiza, igikorwa na bo bishimiye kuko bituma bumva bafite umutekano uhagije ku buzima bwabo.
Kuri uyu wa Kane, tariki ya 12 Werurwe 2020, nibwo mu rwego rwo gukumira icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyugarije Isi, abakozi bâ€™ibitaro bya Ruhengeri ku bufatanye na RDB nâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Ubuzima, RBC, batangije igikorwa cyo gusuzuma ba mukerarugendo basura Pariki yâ€™Igihugu yâ€™Ibirunga.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RDB, Clare Akamanzi, yabwiye IGIHE ko ibi byose biri muri gahunda Guverinoma yâ€™u Rwanda yafashe yo gukumira ko iki cyorezo cyagera ku butaka bwâ€™u Rwanda.
Yavuze ko RDB yafashe izi ngamba kugira ngo abajya mu Birunga bapimwe, harengerwe ubuzima bwabo, ubwâ€™Ingagi nâ€™ubwabaturiye izi pariki. Abahanga bagaragaza ko abantu nâ€™ingagi bafite byinshi bahuza, ku buryo bashobora kwanduzanya indwara.
Akamanzi avuga ko nyuma yâ€™aho iki gikorwa gitangiriye, ba mukerarugendo babyishimiye kuko bibaha umutekano wâ€™ubuzima bwabo.
Yagize ati â€œNkâ€™uko mubizi iki ni ikibazo kibangamiye Isi, niyo mpamvu dufatanyije na RBC twatangiye gupima abantu bose bajya gusura ingagi ngo tubungabunge umutekano wazo, ndetse nâ€™abaturage baturiye hariya nâ€™Abanyarwanda muri rusange.â€
Yavuze ko ikindi barimo gukora ari uko abantu bajya gusura Ingagi babanza bagakaraba intoki bakagira isuku no kumenya buri muntu igihugu avuyemo.
Kugeza ubu RBC yashyizeho itsinda ryâ€™abaganga bahoraho 10 nâ€™abandi bashobora kuryunganira igihe bibaye ngombwa, bapima ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus kuri buri muntu wese uvuye hanze yâ€™u Rwanda, cyane cyane mu Bushinwa cyangwa uwo bikekwa ko yahageze kandi bashobora no gutanga ubufasha ku muntu babisangana.
RDB yashyizeho amabwiriza aha uburenganzira abakerarugendo batemberera mu Rwanda bwo kuba bahindura amatariki yo gusura ingagi mu gihe kitarenze imyaka ibiri mu rwego rwo guhangana na Coronavirus.
Iki kigo giheruka gutangaza amabwiriza azagenderwaho mu gihe hari abakerarugendo bashaka gusubika cyangwa kwimura ingendo zabo.
Itangazo rivuga ko â€œHakuweho uburyo umuntu yamenyeshaga mbere yâ€™iminsi irindwi kugira ngo asure pariki; hakuweho iminsi 30 yagenwaga ngo ikigo gitembereza ba mukerarugendo kibe cyamenyekanishije ko bishyuye.â€™â€™
Rikomeza riti â€œAbakerarugendo bifuza gusubika uruhushya baguze rwo gusura pariki kubera ihagarikwa ryâ€™ingendo zâ€™indege cyangwa bakumiriwe gukora ingendo ahantu runaka bitewe na Coronavirus bafite igihe cyâ€™imyaka ibiri yo kwimura itariki bari bafashe bidasabye ikindi kiguzi; abaguze impushya zo gusura pariki mu mezi atabamo ba mukerarugendo benshi bashobora guhindura igihe bagombaga gusurira ingagi, bagahitamo ikindi gihe nkâ€™icyo bitarenze imyaka ibiri. Abakerarugendo bagombaga kwitabira inama baguze impushya ku giciro kigabanyijwe na bo bemerewe kwigiza inyuma impushya baguze bakaba bazikoresha mu kindi gihe bahitamo mu myaka ibiri.â€™â€™
Iri tangazo rigaragaza ko uburenganzira bwatanzwe mu gihe butarahindurwa bwemerewe gukoreshwa mu gihe cyâ€™amezi atandatu uhereye igihe [ 9 Werurwe 2020] ryashyiriweho umukono kandi urwo ruhushya rugakoreshwa mu myaka ibiri.
Imibare igaragaza ko abantu 129,771 bamaze kwandura iyi virusi ku Isi, naho 4,751 bamaze kwitaba Imana.
Ibarura ryakozwe mu 2016 ryerekanye ko mu Rwanda habarurwaga ingagi 604 ziba mu miryango 41, bingana nâ€™izamuka rya 26% kuko zavuye kuri 480 mu mwaka wa 2010.
Guverinoma yihaye intego ko mu 2024 inyungu u Rwanda ruvana mu bukerarugendo izagera kuri miliyoni $800 zivuye kuri miliyoni $404 yinjiye mu 2017.

Title: Ubwiza bwa One&Only Gorillaâ€™s Nest, hoteli yâ€™i Musanze yishyurwa 3600 $ ku ijoro (Amafoto)
Body:
One&Only Gorillaâ€™s Nest ni hoteli yâ€™akataraboneka iherereye mu Karere ka Musanze mu Kinigi mu nzira igana mu Birunga, yihagazeho mu biciro kuko kuyicumbikamo ku ijoro bisaba kwishyura agera kuri miliyoni 3.5 Frw mu cyumba cya make ku ijoro.
One&Only Gorillaâ€™s Nest ni hoteli yâ€™akataraboneka iherereye mu Karere ka Musanze mu Kinigi mu nzira igana mu Birunga, yihagazeho mu biciro kuko kuyicumbikamo ku ijoro bisaba kwishyura agera kuri miliyoni 3.5 Frw mu cyumba cya make ku ijoro.
Ifite ibyumba 21 biri mu byiciro bine, icyiciro cya mbere gifite ibyumba 10, igikurikiraho gifite ibyumba bine, ikindi bitanu naho icya nyuma kikagira ibyumba bibiri. Uko bikurikirana, ni nako bitandukanye mu biciro, mu bunini no mu bwiza.
Zitatse mu buryo bwa Kinyarwanda hakoreshejwe imigongo, hakabamo nâ€™ibindi bikoresho byâ€™ubugeni.
Ibyumba icumi biri mu cyiciro cya mbere, byishyurwa 3600 byâ€™amadolari ku ijoro rimwe naho icyumba cya menshi ni ibihumbi 10500 byâ€™amadolari gishobora kwakira nkâ€™abakuru bâ€™ibihugu.
Mu mafaranga umuntu yishyura, haba harimo ibyo kurya nâ€™ibyo kunywa. Ibintu byose byubatse ibyumba byâ€™iyi hoteli bikozwe mu mbaho nubwo bifashwe nâ€™ibyumba.
Iyi hoteli yubatse ku buso bungana na hegitari 35, aho yubatse hahoze hari hoteli yitwa Gorillaâ€™s Nest. Imirimo yo kuyubaka yamaze imyaka igera kuri ibiri, yuzura itwaye miliyoni 65 zâ€™amadolari ya Amerika. Imaze gutanga akazi ku bantu 120 bahoraho barimo abanyarwanda 100.
Mu Ukwakira 2019 nibwo iyi hoteli yatangiye gukora ariko ntabwo yari yagafunguwe ku mugaragaro.
Kuva mu kwa gatanu kugera mu kwa cyenda, nibwo iba ifite abashyitsi benshi. Imboga zose zitekerwa abashyitsi muri iyi hoteli, zihinze mu bice byayo. Amoko yâ€™ibyatsi ibihumbi 36 niyo yatewe mu ishyamba ririmo iyi hoteli.
One and Only Gorillaâ€™s Nest yiyongereye ku zindi nyubako ebyiri zikomeye zakira ba mukerarugendo bo ku rwego rwo hejuru mu bice byâ€™ibirunga, zirimo Bisate lodge kuri uyu wa Gatanu yahawe inyenyeri eshanu na Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House, yatangije ibikorwa mu Rwanda ku wa 1 Kanama 2019.
Ije nyuma ya hoteli igezweho imaze igihe muri Pariki yâ€™Igihugu ya Nyungwe, International One & Only Resorts, iyi ikaba ari ishami ryayo.

Title: Twitege Visit Rwanda muri Formula 1 na NBA?
Body:
Guhera mu kwezi gushize, Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu gishinzwe Ubukerarugendo, RDB, cyatangiye ubufatanye nâ€™ikipe ya Paris St Germain yo mu Bufaransa, buzamara imyaka itatu bugamije kureshya abashoramari no gukomeza kuba icyerekezo kibereye ubukerarugendo.
Guhera mu kwezi gushize, Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu gishinzwe Ubukerarugendo, RDB, cyatangiye ubufatanye nâ€™ikipe ya Paris St Germain yo mu Bufaransa, buzamara imyaka itatu bugamije kureshya abashoramari no gukomeza kuba icyerekezo kibereye ubukerarugendo.
Muri ubu bufatanye, ikirango cya Visit Rwanda kigaragazwa kuri Stade ya Parc des Princes aho PSG yakirira imikino yayo ndetse no ku mugongo ku myenda iyi kipe ikoresha mu myitozo no mu gihe cyo kwishyushya mbere yâ€™imikino, yaba iyo yambara yasuye indi kipe cyangwa iyo yambara iwayo muri Shampiyona yâ€™u Bufaransa, Ligue 1 mu gihe kandi aya magambo agaragara ku myambaro yâ€™ikipe yâ€™abagore.
Mu masezerano harimo kandi icyumweru cyâ€™imishinga yâ€™abanyempano bâ€™abanyarwanda nâ€™Abafaransa. Icyo cyumweru cyiswe â€œSemaine du Rwanda Ã  Parisâ€ kizajya gitegurwa na PSG mu kumenyekanisha ibintu byose bikorerwa mu Rwanda.
Ubu bufatanye bwatangajwe nyuma yâ€™umwaka umwe nâ€™igice, RDB itangiye gukorana nâ€™ikipe ya Arsenal yo mu Bwongereza, aho binyuze muri Visit Rwanda, iyi kipe yo mu Mujyi wa Londres yamamaza ubukerarugendo bwâ€™u Rwanda.
Kuva icyo gihe, hari abanyabigwi benshi bakomeye ba Arsenal baje mu Rwanda barimo Tony Adams wabaye kapiteni wayo igihe kirekire, Lauren Etame Mayer, Alex Scott wabaye kapiteni wâ€™ikipe yâ€™abagore na David Luiz kuri ubu ukinira iyi kipe, bose baje mu Rwanda.
Muri ubu bufatanye kandi, abatoza babiri bâ€™Ingimbi za Arsenal FC, Simon McManus usanzwe ari Umutoza Mukuru wâ€™Amashuri yigisha umupira wâ€™amaguru ya Arsenal na Kerry Green, bahugura abâ€™Abanyarwanda mu kubafasha kubatoza umupira ugezweho nkâ€™uwo iyi kipe ikina.
RDB ivuga ko kuva u Rwanda rutangiye gukorana na Arsenal binyuze muri Visit Rwanda mu 2018, ba mukerarungo baza mu Rwanda bamaze kugera kuri miliyoni imwe na 700 (byatangajwe mu Ukuboza 2019) ndetse yizeye ko bazakomeza kwiyongera mu myaka iri imbere.
Ese birashoboka ko tuzabona Visit Rwanda mu marushanwa nka Tour de France, Formula 1 cyangwa NBA?
Imwe mu mpamvu ituma habaho ubu bufatanye bwâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™amakipe akomeye i Burayi, ni ugutekereza kure kugira ngo u Rwanda ruzabe igihugu gikize mu myaka iri imbere ndetse nâ€™Abanyarwanda bagire ubushobozi buhagije bwo gukora ibyishimirwa nâ€™abanyamahanga.
Tour de France niryo siganwa rya mbere ryâ€™amagare rikomeye ku Isi, Formula 1 naryo ni isiganwa rya mbere rikomeye mu mukino wo gusiganwa mu modoka mu gihe NBA yo muri Amerika ari yo Shampiyona ya Basketball ikunzwe na benshi ku Isi.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wâ€™Ishami ryâ€™Ubukerarugendo no kubungabunga za Pariki muri RDB, Ariella Kageruka, yavuze ko bishoboka ko u Rwanda rwagirana ubufatanye nâ€™imwe mu makipe agaragara muri aya marushanwa kuko byose bisaba kwiha intego ndetse bikagira uko bikorwa.
Ati â€œSinavuga ko hari igihe runaka bizabera, ariko nta kintu kidashoboka kuko iyo urebye ikintu gisabwa ni ukureba niba ibikorwaremezo dufite bihuye nâ€™ibyo. Nko kuri Formula 1, icya mbere ni imihanda kandi nkeka imbaraga Leta yashyize mu kubaka imihanda dushobora kuyibyaza umusaruro.â€
â€œKu kwerekana Visit Rwanda muri NBA, BAL (Basketball Africa League yashyizweho na NBA) yo ubwo yaje aha, mwabonye ko ikipe yacu (Patriots BBC) yari ihagarariye u Rwanda yari yambaye Visit Rwanda. Ni ukuvuga ngo ni ukugenda intambwe ku ntambwe kandi byose birashoboka. Icya mbere ni ukugira ngo tubyaze umusaruro ubufatanye dufite uyu munsi kuko ni ukubanza kureba icyo dukuramo, tukaba twava mu mupira wâ€™amaguru tukajya muri Basketball.â€
Kageruka avuga ko nubwo kuri ubu ubufatanye bwâ€™u Rwanda mu bukerarugendo bushingiye ku mugabane wâ€™u Burayi, bitabuza ko nâ€™Abanyamerika barumenya kuko nka Arsenal ikunda gukorerayo imyiteguro ya Shampiyona ijyanye nâ€™itangazamakuru ryayo rigari ndetse ubwo David Luiz yazaga mu Rwanda, byavuzwe cyane muri BrÃ©sil.
Ni iki cyakorwa ngo Siporo yâ€™u Rwanda itange umusaruro mu bukungu bwâ€™igihugu? 
Siporo ni umwe mu nkingi zâ€™iterambere u Rwanda rushaka kubakiraho ndetse igihugu kiri gushora cyane mu mikino kuko bitanga icyerekezo cyiza cyâ€™igihugu ndetse bigafasha nâ€™Abanyarwanda gutera imbere.
Mu kiganiro yatanze ubwo yari yatumiwe mu mahugurwa yahuje abagize ingaga za Siporo, yateguwe nâ€™Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi, Umuyobozi Mukuru wâ€™Ishami ryâ€™Ubukerarugendo no kubungabunga za Pariki muri RDB, Ariella Kageruka, yavuze ko muri Siporo hari amahirwe menshi arimo ashobora kwinjiriza igihugu nko gukora imyenda nâ€™inkweto bya Siporo.
Kageruka yakomeje avuga ko itangazamakuru rishobora kwifashishwa mu kumenyakanisha Siporo yâ€™u Rwanda, abakinnyi nâ€™abatoza bâ€™Abanyarwanda bagahabawa amahugurwa abafasha kugira ubumenyi buri ku rwego mpuzamahanga.
Ati â€œHari uburyo bwinshi bwo kubyaza umusaruro muri siporo, nko gushyiraho inganda zikora ibikoresho bya Siporo mu gihugu. Mu bijyanye nâ€™ubukerarungo bushingiye kuri siporo, ubufatanye twagiranye nâ€™abatwamamaza bwarengeje ibyo twari twiteze. Twari twiteze ko binyuze muri uku kwamamaza tuzabona miliyoni 28Â£, ariko mu mwaka umwe twabonye miliyoni 36Â£.â€
Indi nzira yafasha u Rwanda kwinjiza binyuze muri Siporo hari ugutegura amarushanwa akomeye abera mu gihugu hakanategurwa ibikorwa byishimirwa nâ€™Abanyamahanga baje muri iyi mikino, nko gusura ingagi nâ€™izindi Pariki, gutembera mu Kivu no kuzamuka imisozi.
RDB ivuga ko kuva u Rwanda rutangiye gukorana na Arsenal mu myaka ibiri ishize, hamaze gutozwa abana nâ€™abatoza basaga 120 ndetse no mu bufatanye na Paris Saint-Germain hazakorwa gahunda nkâ€™iyi.
Inzu yâ€™imikino ya Kigali Arena, ikibuga cya Cricket kiri i Gahanga, ikibuga cya Kigali Golf Club kiri kuvugurwa biri mu byitezweho kuzazamura ubukeragendo bunyuze muri siporo.
Mu 2017 ubukerarugendo bwinjirije u Rwanda miliyoni 401 zâ€™Amadolari, ariko intego ya Guverinoma ni ukuzamura ayo madolari akaba miliyoni 800 mu 2024.
