Title: Mbatembereze i Strasbourg, Umujyi ubumbatiye amateka yâ€™Abafaransa nâ€™Abadage (Amafoto)
Body:
Strasbourg ni umwe mu Mijyi yâ€™u Bufaransa ibumbatiye amateka menshi, ndetse iryoheye ubukerarugendo. Ku muntu ukunda gutembera agenda nâ€™amaguru cyangwa nâ€™igare, ni hamwe mu hantu wakwishimira.
Strasbourg ni umwe mu Mijyi yâ€™u Bufaransa ibumbatiye amateka menshi, ndetse iryoheye ubukerarugendo. Ku muntu ukunda gutembera agenda nâ€™amaguru cyangwa nâ€™igare, ni hamwe mu hantu wakwishimira.
Ni umujyi uhana imbibi nâ€™u Budage ndetse ubitse amateka menshi hagati yâ€™ibi bihugu byombi, uherereye mu gace ka Alsace. Ntabwo ari umujyi utuwe cyane kuko uri ku buso bwa kilometero kare 7826, ibarura ryo mu 2017 rigaragaza ko wari utuwe nâ€™abaturage 280966.
Ufatwa nkâ€™Umurwa Mukuru wâ€™u Burayi kubera ko ariwo ubarizwamo ibikorwa byâ€™inama yâ€™ubujyanama bwâ€™u Burayi, Urukiko rwâ€™u Burayi rwâ€™uburenganzira bwa muntu, Inteko Ishinga Amategeko yâ€™u Burayi nâ€™ibindi.
Ni umujyi kandi ubarizwamo ibikorwa byinshi bibungabungwa na UNESCO nkâ€™umutungo kamere wâ€™Isi. Muri ibyo harimo nka CathÃ©drale Notre-Dame de Strasbourg nâ€™agace gakundwa na ba mukerarugendo kazwi kitwa Petite France.
Ni agace karimo imigezi myinshi ndetse mu myaka yo hambere kakundaga kubamo abarobyi cyane, magingo aya ni ko gace gasurwa cyane muri Strasbourg yose.
Imiterere yako igaragaza imyubakire yo mu Bufaransa kera mu kinyejana cya 17 ari nayo mpamvu UNESCO yahisemo kugashyira mu duce tubungabunzwe kubera amateka yako.
Naho CathÃ©drale Notre-Dame de Strasbourg igizwe nâ€™inyubako zigaragaza amateka ya kera yâ€™Abaromani, ndetse igaragazwa nkâ€™urugero rwiza rwo kwerekana amateka yo hambere dore ko mu myaka ya 1647 na 1874 yabaye inzu ya mbere ndende ku Isi, ireshya na metero 142.
Uyu munsi ni kiliziya iri mu nsengero esheshatu ndende mu mateka yâ€™Isi ndetse yihariye agahigo ko kuba ariyo ya mbere ndende mu mateka yâ€™Isi yubatswe hagati yâ€™ikinyejana cya Gatanu nâ€™icya 15.
Umusizi Victor Hugo nâ€™umudage Goethe nawe wari umwanditsi, bakunze kuyigereranya nâ€™igiti cyâ€™Imana bashaka kuvuga uburebure bwayo. Bitewe nâ€™uko iteye, ahantu hose hari umusozi muri uyu mujyi, iyo uwugiyeho bituma umuntu abasha kuyibona neza
Ku bantu bakunda gutembera bihera amaso ibyiza bitatse Isi, ni umujyi mwiza cyane. Mu 2009 ubwo habaga inama ya NATO, Barack Obama na Chancelier wâ€™u Budage, Angela Merkel, bakoze urugendo rwâ€™amateka nâ€™amaguru, bava Strasbourg bagera mu Kehl banyuze ku kiraro cya Passerelle des Deux Rives cyubatswe mu 2004 nkâ€™ikimenyetso cyâ€™ubumwe mu Burayi. Nta passport bisaba ku muntu ushaka gukora uru rugendo nkâ€™urwabo, ugera mu Budage mu gace ka Rhine.
Alsace agace ka Strasbourg kazwi ho kugira umuvinyo uryoheye ijigo ndetse nâ€™inzoga nyinshi zituruka mu baturanyi bâ€™Abadage. Mu masaha yâ€™ijoro usanga hafi ya Notre-Dame hari abantu benshi bari ku gacupa bungurana ibitekerezo,
Umujyi wa Strasbourg guhera mu 2008 uyoborwa na Roland Ries nyuma yo kuba Umwarimu muri Kaminuza ya Strasbourg nâ€™Umusenateri muri aka Karere imyaka icyenda.

Title: Twitege Visit Rwanda muri Formula 1 na NBA?
Body:
Guhera mu kwezi gushize, Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu gishinzwe Ubukerarugendo, RDB, cyatangiye ubufatanye nâ€™ikipe ya Paris St Germain yo mu Bufaransa, buzamara imyaka itatu bugamije kureshya abashoramari no gukomeza kuba icyerekezo kibereye ubukerarugendo.
Guhera mu kwezi gushize, Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu gishinzwe Ubukerarugendo, RDB, cyatangiye ubufatanye nâ€™ikipe ya Paris St Germain yo mu Bufaransa, buzamara imyaka itatu bugamije kureshya abashoramari no gukomeza kuba icyerekezo kibereye ubukerarugendo.
Muri ubu bufatanye, ikirango cya Visit Rwanda kigaragazwa kuri Stade ya Parc des Princes aho PSG yakirira imikino yayo ndetse no ku mugongo ku myenda iyi kipe ikoresha mu myitozo no mu gihe cyo kwishyushya mbere yâ€™imikino, yaba iyo yambara yasuye indi kipe cyangwa iyo yambara iwayo muri Shampiyona yâ€™u Bufaransa, Ligue 1 mu gihe kandi aya magambo agaragara ku myambaro yâ€™ikipe yâ€™abagore.
Mu masezerano harimo kandi icyumweru cyâ€™imishinga yâ€™abanyempano bâ€™abanyarwanda nâ€™Abafaransa. Icyo cyumweru cyiswe â€œSemaine du Rwanda Ã  Parisâ€ kizajya gitegurwa na PSG mu kumenyekanisha ibintu byose bikorerwa mu Rwanda.
Ubu bufatanye bwatangajwe nyuma yâ€™umwaka umwe nâ€™igice, RDB itangiye gukorana nâ€™ikipe ya Arsenal yo mu Bwongereza, aho binyuze muri Visit Rwanda, iyi kipe yo mu Mujyi wa Londres yamamaza ubukerarugendo bwâ€™u Rwanda.
Kuva icyo gihe, hari abanyabigwi benshi bakomeye ba Arsenal baje mu Rwanda barimo Tony Adams wabaye kapiteni wayo igihe kirekire, Lauren Etame Mayer, Alex Scott wabaye kapiteni wâ€™ikipe yâ€™abagore na David Luiz kuri ubu ukinira iyi kipe, bose baje mu Rwanda.
Muri ubu bufatanye kandi, abatoza babiri bâ€™Ingimbi za Arsenal FC, Simon McManus usanzwe ari Umutoza Mukuru wâ€™Amashuri yigisha umupira wâ€™amaguru ya Arsenal na Kerry Green, bahugura abâ€™Abanyarwanda mu kubafasha kubatoza umupira ugezweho nkâ€™uwo iyi kipe ikina.
RDB ivuga ko kuva u Rwanda rutangiye gukorana na Arsenal binyuze muri Visit Rwanda mu 2018, ba mukerarungo baza mu Rwanda bamaze kugera kuri miliyoni imwe na 700 (byatangajwe mu Ukuboza 2019) ndetse yizeye ko bazakomeza kwiyongera mu myaka iri imbere.
Ese birashoboka ko tuzabona Visit Rwanda mu marushanwa nka Tour de France, Formula 1 cyangwa NBA?
Imwe mu mpamvu ituma habaho ubu bufatanye bwâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™amakipe akomeye i Burayi, ni ugutekereza kure kugira ngo u Rwanda ruzabe igihugu gikize mu myaka iri imbere ndetse nâ€™Abanyarwanda bagire ubushobozi buhagije bwo gukora ibyishimirwa nâ€™abanyamahanga.
Tour de France niryo siganwa rya mbere ryâ€™amagare rikomeye ku Isi, Formula 1 naryo ni isiganwa rya mbere rikomeye mu mukino wo gusiganwa mu modoka mu gihe NBA yo muri Amerika ari yo Shampiyona ya Basketball ikunzwe na benshi ku Isi.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wâ€™Ishami ryâ€™Ubukerarugendo no kubungabunga za Pariki muri RDB, Ariella Kageruka, yavuze ko bishoboka ko u Rwanda rwagirana ubufatanye nâ€™imwe mu makipe agaragara muri aya marushanwa kuko byose bisaba kwiha intego ndetse bikagira uko bikorwa.
Ati â€œSinavuga ko hari igihe runaka bizabera, ariko nta kintu kidashoboka kuko iyo urebye ikintu gisabwa ni ukureba niba ibikorwaremezo dufite bihuye nâ€™ibyo. Nko kuri Formula 1, icya mbere ni imihanda kandi nkeka imbaraga Leta yashyize mu kubaka imihanda dushobora kuyibyaza umusaruro.â€
â€œKu kwerekana Visit Rwanda muri NBA, BAL (Basketball Africa League yashyizweho na NBA) yo ubwo yaje aha, mwabonye ko ikipe yacu (Patriots BBC) yari ihagarariye u Rwanda yari yambaye Visit Rwanda. Ni ukuvuga ngo ni ukugenda intambwe ku ntambwe kandi byose birashoboka. Icya mbere ni ukugira ngo tubyaze umusaruro ubufatanye dufite uyu munsi kuko ni ukubanza kureba icyo dukuramo, tukaba twava mu mupira wâ€™amaguru tukajya muri Basketball.â€
Kageruka avuga ko nubwo kuri ubu ubufatanye bwâ€™u Rwanda mu bukerarugendo bushingiye ku mugabane wâ€™u Burayi, bitabuza ko nâ€™Abanyamerika barumenya kuko nka Arsenal ikunda gukorerayo imyiteguro ya Shampiyona ijyanye nâ€™itangazamakuru ryayo rigari ndetse ubwo David Luiz yazaga mu Rwanda, byavuzwe cyane muri BrÃ©sil.
Ni iki cyakorwa ngo Siporo yâ€™u Rwanda itange umusaruro mu bukungu bwâ€™igihugu? 
Siporo ni umwe mu nkingi zâ€™iterambere u Rwanda rushaka kubakiraho ndetse igihugu kiri gushora cyane mu mikino kuko bitanga icyerekezo cyiza cyâ€™igihugu ndetse bigafasha nâ€™Abanyarwanda gutera imbere.
Mu kiganiro yatanze ubwo yari yatumiwe mu mahugurwa yahuje abagize ingaga za Siporo, yateguwe nâ€™Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi, Umuyobozi Mukuru wâ€™Ishami ryâ€™Ubukerarugendo no kubungabunga za Pariki muri RDB, Ariella Kageruka, yavuze ko muri Siporo hari amahirwe menshi arimo ashobora kwinjiriza igihugu nko gukora imyenda nâ€™inkweto bya Siporo.
Kageruka yakomeje avuga ko itangazamakuru rishobora kwifashishwa mu kumenyakanisha Siporo yâ€™u Rwanda, abakinnyi nâ€™abatoza bâ€™Abanyarwanda bagahabawa amahugurwa abafasha kugira ubumenyi buri ku rwego mpuzamahanga.
Ati â€œHari uburyo bwinshi bwo kubyaza umusaruro muri siporo, nko gushyiraho inganda zikora ibikoresho bya Siporo mu gihugu. Mu bijyanye nâ€™ubukerarungo bushingiye kuri siporo, ubufatanye twagiranye nâ€™abatwamamaza bwarengeje ibyo twari twiteze. Twari twiteze ko binyuze muri uku kwamamaza tuzabona miliyoni 28Â£, ariko mu mwaka umwe twabonye miliyoni 36Â£.â€
Indi nzira yafasha u Rwanda kwinjiza binyuze muri Siporo hari ugutegura amarushanwa akomeye abera mu gihugu hakanategurwa ibikorwa byishimirwa nâ€™Abanyamahanga baje muri iyi mikino, nko gusura ingagi nâ€™izindi Pariki, gutembera mu Kivu no kuzamuka imisozi.
RDB ivuga ko kuva u Rwanda rutangiye gukorana na Arsenal mu myaka ibiri ishize, hamaze gutozwa abana nâ€™abatoza basaga 120 ndetse no mu bufatanye na Paris Saint-Germain hazakorwa gahunda nkâ€™iyi.
Inzu yâ€™imikino ya Kigali Arena, ikibuga cya Cricket kiri i Gahanga, ikibuga cya Kigali Golf Club kiri kuvugurwa biri mu byitezweho kuzazamura ubukeragendo bunyuze muri siporo.
Mu 2017 ubukerarugendo bwinjirije u Rwanda miliyoni 401 zâ€™Amadolari, ariko intego ya Guverinoma ni ukuzamura ayo madolari akaba miliyoni 800 mu 2024.
Amafoto: Umurerwa Delphin

Title: RDB yitabiriye imurika rikomeye ryâ€™ubukerarugendo muri Amerika
Body:
Itsinda rimenyekanisha ubukererugendo bwâ€™u Rwanda mu Kigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere (RDB) hamwe nâ€™ibigo byigenga byâ€™ubukererugendo mu Rwanda bitabiriye imurika ryâ€™ubukerarugendo rikomeye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika rizwi nka New York Times Travel Show.
Itsinda rimenyekanisha ubukererugendo bwâ€™u Rwanda mu Kigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere (RDB) hamwe nâ€™ibigo byigenga byâ€™ubukererugendo mu Rwanda bitabiriye imurika ryâ€™ubukerarugendo rikomeye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika rizwi nka New York Times Travel Show.
Iri murika ryâ€™ibikorwa byâ€™ubukerarugendo riri mu ya mbere akomeye muri Amerika yâ€™Amajyaruguru. Riri kubera mu Mujyi wa Manhattan ahazwi nka Jacob K.Javits. Ryatangaiye taraiki 24 Mutarama, rirasozwa kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 26 Mutarama 2020.
Nyuma yâ€™imurika, itsinda rihagarariye u Rwanda rizakomereza ibikorwa byo kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo bwâ€™u Rwanda hirya no hino mu bice bya Leta ya California nka San Diego, Orange County na Los Angeles mbere yo kugaruka mu Rwanda.
Ibigo byigenga bikora ibyâ€™ubukerarugendo bihagarariye u Rwanda birimo Mantis Rwanda, Akagera Aviation, New Dawn Associates, Heritage Safaris, Far Trek Africa Safaris, Silverback Africa na FCM Charleston.
Mu byo bari kwerekana harimo umuco wâ€™u Rwanda, urusobe rwâ€™ibinyabuzima ruboneka mu Rwanda, ubwiza bwâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™ibijyanye no kwakira abakerarugendo.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubukerarugendo muri RDB, Belise Kariza, yavuze ko muri Amerika yâ€™Amajyaruguru ari hamwe mu haturuka ba mukerarugendo benshi basura u Rwanda, ko ari ibyâ€™ingenzi gukomeza kuhamenyekanisha ubukerarugendo bwâ€™u Rwanda.
Ati â€œKuba twitabiriye iri murika rizwi rya New York Times Travel Show, tukagaragara mu bandi bamurika basaga 700 baturutse hirya no hino ku isi biratuma abitabiriye bamenya ko u Rwanda ari ahantu heza ho gusura ku isi. Twiteguye guha ikaze abakerarugendo bashaka gusura igihugu cyacu cyiza.â€
New York Times Travel Show ni imurika ryâ€™ubukerarugendo riri mu akomeye ku Isi. Ryitabirwa nâ€™abantu basaga 35 000, barimo abamurika basaga 700 bavuye mu bihugu bigera ku 175.

Title: Mu basuye Pariki yâ€™Akagera umwaka ushize, 48Â % ni Abanyarwanda
Body:
Ubuyobozi bwa Pariki yâ€™Akagera bwatangaje ko umwaka ushize iyo pariki yasuwe nâ€™abakerarugendo 49 000, muri bo 48% ari Abanyarwanda.
Ubuyobozi bwa Pariki yâ€™Akagera bwatangaje ko umwaka ushize iyo pariki yasuwe nâ€™abakerarugendo 49 000, muri bo 48% ari Abanyarwanda.
Ugereranyije abasuye iyo pariki umwaka ushize nâ€™abayisuye mu 2018, habayeho ubwiyongere bwa 12Â %.
Parike #Akagera yakiriye abakerurgendo basaga 49,000 muri 2019. Habayeho ubwiyongere bwa 12% ugereranyije na 2018. 48% by'abasuye parike uyu mwaka ni ABANYARWANDA. #Ibyaranze2019#VisitRwanda
â€” Akagera (@AkageraPark) January 21, 2020
Iyi pariki kuva mu 2010 icungwa nâ€™umuryango wita ku rusobe rwâ€™ibinyabuzima, African Parks. Mu myaka itanu ishize hagiye haba amavugurura agamije guteza imbere urusobe rwâ€™ibinyabuzima muri iyo pariki no kurushaho gukurura ba mukerarugendo bayisura.
Nubwo umubare wâ€™amafaranga yinjijwe umwaka ushize utatangajwe, ashobora kuba yariyongereye ugendeye ku bwiyongere bwâ€™abayisuye.
African Parks icunga iyi pariki igaragaza ko amafaranga yinjiza yavuye ku madolari 200 000 mu 2010, akagera ku madolari miliyoni ebyiri mu 2018. Ibyo byatumye iyo pariki ibasha kwihaza ku ngengo yâ€™imari ikoresha ku kigero cya 75Â %.
Iyi pariki irimo amoko atandukanye yâ€™inyamaswa, ikaba imwe mu zikomeye muri Afurika nyuma yo kuzanwamo intare nâ€™inkura.
Pariki yâ€™Akagera irimo nâ€™izindi nyamaswa zitandukanye nkâ€™impala nâ€™imparage, impongo, inzovu, imvubu, ingwe, inyoni zâ€™amoko asaga 500 nâ€™ibindi.
Mu 2015, Pariki yâ€™Akagera yazanywemo intare zaherukagamo mu myaka ya 1990. Mu mwaka wa mbere zigaruwemo, umubare wâ€™intare wikubye kabiri kuko zahise zibyara ibyana 11. Mu 2017, hazanywemo izindi ntare ebyiri zâ€™ingabo zivuye muri Afurika yâ€™Epfo.
Mu 2017 kandi, muri iyo pariki hazanywemo inkura zâ€™umukara 18, nyuma yâ€™imyaka icumi ubwo bwoko bwâ€™inyamaswa bwarazimiye.
Umwaka ushize, Pariki yâ€™Akagera yari yasuwe nâ€™abakerarugendo 44000, kimwe cya kabiri ari Abanyarwanda.

Title: Ibigo nyarwanda byacanye umucyo mu imurikagurisha ryâ€™ubukerarugendo mu Buholandi (Amafoto)
Body:
Ibigo nyarwanda byacanye umucyo mu imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs rimaze iminsi ribera mu Buholandi mu mujyi witwa Utrecht.
Ibigo nyarwanda byacanye umucyo mu imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs rimaze iminsi ribera mu Buholandi mu mujyi witwa Utrecht.
Ni imurikagurisha riri kuba ku nshuro ya 13, ryabereyemwo gahunda zitandukanye mu bijyanye no kumenyekanisha u Rwanda, aho ryitabiriwe nâ€™ibigo byo mu Rwanda bitandukanye bikora ibijyanye nâ€™ubukerarugendo nâ€™izindi serivisi zijyana nabwo.
Ryitabiriwe uyu mwaka nâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere, RDB, Sosiyete Nyarwanda yâ€™Ubwikorezi bwo mu Kirere, RwandAir, Ambasade yâ€™u Rwanda mu Buholandi nâ€™ibigo byâ€™ubukerarugendo birimo Amahoro Tours, Palast Tours and Travel, Heritage Safaris na Wildlife Tours-Rwanda.
 Umuyobozi wâ€™Ishami ryâ€™Ubukerarugendo mu rugaga rwâ€™abikorera (PSF), Rutagarama Aimable, yabwiye IGIHE ko kwitabira iryo murikagurisha ari ubundi uburyo bwiza bwo kongera abakerarugendo basura u Rwanda.
Yagize ati â€œ Turashimira rwose Leta yâ€™u Rwanda uburyo idahwema kudufasha no gushyiramwo imbaraga ngo ubukerarugendo bukomeze butere imbere kandi natwe tubukora tukagiramo inyungu.â€
Yakomeje agira ati â€œ Iyo urebye muri iyi myaka ishize biragaragara cyane ko ubukerarugendo bwateye intamwe igaragara. Natwe umuntu ku giti cye muri twe tubukora nkâ€™umwuga ni ugushyiraho akacu ntitubiharire gusa Leta, twongera ingufu nâ€™umubare wâ€™ibigo bikora ubukerarugendo, dukomeza kubaka amahoteli nâ€™ibindi bijyanye no kwakira abantu.â€
Muri gahunda yo kumenyekanisha u Rwanda izwi nka â€˜Visit Rwandaâ€™, abahagarariye ibigo byo mu Rwanda beretse bagenzi babo bo mu Buholandi amahirwe ari mu bukerarugendo bwâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™uko yabyazwa umusaruro.
Abayobozi baryitabiriye barimo Ambasaderi wâ€™u Rwanda mu Buholandi, Karabaranga Jean Pierre; Umuyobozi muri RDB Ushinzwe kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo, Mutesi Linda na Ildephonse Kambogo ushinzwe ibijyanye nâ€™Ubusesenguzi mu byâ€™Ubukerarugendo.
Vakantiebeurs ni imurika rifatwa nkâ€™amahirwe ku bukerarugendo bwâ€™u Rwanda yo gukorana nâ€™ubwâ€™u Buholandi nâ€™andi masoko akomeye yabufasha gutera imbere.
Umuyobozi uhagarariye Visit Rwanda mu Buholandi, Harry Betist, yagize ati â€œNi umwanya mwiza wo guhura nâ€™abafatanyabikorwa bacu no kwishimira intambwe ubukerarugendo bumaze gutera no kureba uko itasubira inyuma.â€™â€™
Kuri ubu isoko ryo mu Buholandi riza mu myanya umunani ya mbere, mu kugira abakerarugendo benshi bakorana nâ€™u Rwanda. Abarusura biyongereyeho 11.9Â %, bavuye ku 4918 mu 2017 bagera kuri 5501 mu 2018.
Ibi bikorwa byâ€™imurikagurisha rigamije kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo bwâ€™u Rwanda byiyongera ku bikorwa bikomeye mu kubumenyekanisha birimo amasezerano rwasinye nâ€™amakipe ya Arsenal na Paris St Germain ndetse na Filime ya Rwanda: The Royal Tour.

Title: Wild Connector Safaris yatanze umwihariko mu gutembereza abantu Pariki yâ€™Akagera mu minsi mikuru
Body:
Sosiyete itembereza ba mukerarugendo Wild Connector Safaris igiye gufasha abanyarwanda gutembera ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda biboneka muri Pariki ya yâ€™Akagera muri iyi minsi mikuru isoza umwaka.
Sosiyete itembereza ba mukerarugendo Wild Connector Safaris igiye gufasha abanyarwanda gutembera ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda biboneka muri Pariki ya yâ€™Akagera muri iyi minsi mikuru isoza umwaka.
Uruzinduko ruzaba kuwa Gatandatu tariki 21 Ukuboza 2019, muri Pariki yâ€™Akagera icumbikiye inyamaswa nyinshi.
Abazitabira bazabasha kubona amoko atandukanye yâ€™inyamaswa ziba muri iyo pariki, imwe mu zikomeye muri Afurika nyuma yo kuzanwamo intare nâ€™inkura.
Pariki yâ€™akagera irimo nâ€™izindi nyamaswa zitanduknaye nkâ€™impala nâ€™imparage, impongo, inzovu, imvubu, ingwe, inyoni zâ€™amoko asaga 500 nâ€™ibindi.
Ushinzwe iyamamazabikorwa muri Wild Connector Safaris , Rugamba Alexis yakanguriye cyane cyane ababyeyi kuzana abana bari mu biruhuko, babafasha gusobanukirwa neza ibitatse igihugu cyabo.
Ni nâ€™umwanya kandi ku muryango nâ€™abakundana gusoza umwaka bishimye batembera ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda.
Ati â€œIki gihe abana benshi baba bari mu biruhuko. Ni umwanya mwiza kuri bo wo gutembera no kumenya byinshi ku gihugu cyabo. Nâ€™abakuru ni uko, muze dusure pariki yacu yâ€™Akagera tunezezwe no kureba inyamaswa za mbere zikomeye ku isi.â€
Kujyana na Wild Connector Safaris muri Pariki yâ€™Akagera, umuntu umwe arasabwa kwishyura amafaranga 30 000 Frw mu gihe abanyamahanga badaturuka mu muryango wa Afurika yâ€™Iburasirazuba bazishyura amadolari 110.
Muri ayo mafaranga harimo itike, uburenganzira bwo kwinjira muri pariki, ifunguro rya ku manywa, abakuyobora nâ€™ibindi.
Abantu bakundana baziye rimwe ndetse nâ€™abana bazagabanyirizwaho 10Â %.
Undi mwihariko wâ€™uru rugendo ni uko hazaba hari umufotozi wabigize umwuga uzafata amafoto kandi buri wese akazahabwa umwanya wo kubaza ibibazo byose ku bijyanye nâ€™ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda.

Title: Imbamutima zâ€™inzego zitandukanye ku bufatanye bwâ€™u Rwanda na PSG
Body:
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu nibwo Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu gishinzwe Ubukerarugendo, RDB, cyatangaje ko cyatangiye ubufatanye nâ€™Ikipe ya Paris Saint Germain buzamara imyaka itatu bugamije guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda, ubukerarugendo bwarwo nâ€™umupira wâ€™amaguru.
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu nibwo Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu gishinzwe Ubukerarugendo, RDB, cyatangaje ko cyatangiye ubufatanye nâ€™Ikipe ya Paris Saint Germain buzamara imyaka itatu bugamije guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda, ubukerarugendo bwarwo nâ€™umupira wâ€™amaguru.
Inzego zitandukanye zirimo abakora mu bijyanye nâ€™ubukerarugendo, abikorera, abashinzwe siporo nâ€™abohereza ibikomoka ku buhinzi nâ€™ubworozi bavuga ko bubumbatiye amahirwe menshi.
Muri ubu bufatanye, abakinnyi ba Paris Saint Germain nâ€™abahoze bayikinira bazashobora gusura u Rwanda bagaragaze ibyiza byâ€™u Rwanda bakoresheje imbuga nkoranyambaga zabo na PSG ibikore gutyo.
Umuyobozi wâ€™Ishami ryâ€™Ubukerarugendo muri RDB, Belise Kariza, avuga ko â€˜gukoresha abakinnyi bazwi, bemerwa nâ€™abantu benshi nâ€™abafana babo ari ikintu cyiza kizadufasha mu imenyekanishabikorwa ryacuâ€™.
Ikirango cya Visit Rwanda kigaragara muri Stade ya Parc des Princes nkâ€™uburyo bwo kumenyekanisha ibikorwa. Ibi byaraye bitangiye mu mukino PSG yakiriyemo Nantes.
Visit Rwanda izajya igaragara ku mwambaro wâ€™abakinnyi bâ€™ikipe yâ€™abagore ya PSG, ikaba igaragara ku myenda yâ€™imyitozo yâ€™abakinnyi yaba abagabo nâ€™abagore, ikaba igaragara inyuma ku ikoti ryo kwishyushyanya mbere yâ€™umukino.
Mu guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda, Made in Rwanda, mu bufatanye harimo igikorwa cyitwa â€˜Icyumweru i Parisâ€™, aho abakora imyenda, ubugeni, ubukorikori, bazashobora kugaragaza ibikorwa byabo mu Bufaransa icyumweru cyose ku bufatanye na Paris Saint Germain.
Kariza avuga ko ubu bufatanye ari â€˜ibintu bishimishije kuri twe, turabona amahirwe menshi afunguka hano byâ€™umwihariko ku bikorerwa mu Rwanda no kubona Visit Rwanda igera kure ku bantu benshiâ€™.
Perezida wa Kabiri wâ€™igice cyâ€™abakora ibijyanye nâ€™Ubukerarugendo akaba nâ€™Umuyobozi wa Serena Hotel mu Rwanda, Daniel Sambai, mu kiganiro nâ€™itangazamakuru kuri uyu wa Kane yavuze ko ubu bufatanye babubonamo amahirwe menshi.
Ati â€œNkâ€™urwego rwâ€™ubukerarugendo turishimye ku bwâ€™ubu bufatanye, twiteze kubona ubukerarugendo butera imbere nkâ€™uko butahwemye gutera imbere mu myaka ishize, ni ibyâ€™agaciro kuri twe.â€
Muri ubu bufatanye biteganyijwe ko hazabaho gahunda zâ€™imyitozo ku bana bâ€™abahungu nâ€™abakobwa, gushaka uko amashuri yâ€™umupira wâ€™amaguru â€˜academyâ€™ yo mu Rwanda yazakorana nâ€™Ikipe ya PSG.
Umunyamabanga Uhoraho muri Minisiteri ya Siporo, Shema Maboko Didier, yavuze ko ubu bufatanye buzateza imbere siporo cyane.
Ati â€œNishimiye ubu bufatanye na PSG nkâ€™ushinzwe siporo, aya ni amahirwe meza kuri twe yo gukomeza guteza imbere siporo yacu byâ€™umwihariko mu rwego rwâ€™umupira wâ€™amaguru.â€
Muri ubu bufatanye kandi ikawa nâ€™icyayi cyâ€™u Rwanda kizaba gicuruzwa cyonyine muri Stade ya Parc des Princes, aho abafana baturutse ahantu hose bazashobora kunywa ku cyayi nâ€™ikawa byâ€™u Rwanda.
Uwacu Cynthia wo mu kigo gishinzwe kohereza mu mahanga ibikomoka ku Buhinzi nâ€™Ubworozi (NAEB) yavuze ko ibi bizafasha mu kohereza ibicuruzwa mu mahanga kuko nâ€™ubundi ikawa nâ€™icyayi bitoherezwaga cyane mu Bufaransa.
Ati â€œTugendeye ku mwaka tumaze dukorana na Alibaba ubona ikawa twohereza mu Bushinwa yariyongereyeho 700%, noneho tubirebe muri stade irimo abantu ibihumbi 47 buri cyumweru turimo gutanga icyayi nâ€™ikawa twenyine.â€
â€œTuritegura iterambere rinini atari gusa amafaranga tuzakura muri ubu bufatanye ahubwo nâ€™abantu bazaba baje ku mukino baturutse hirya no hino ku Isi bazabimenya, kuko ikawa nâ€™icyayi cyacu bishimwa cyane ku Isi yose.
Ubu bufatanye bwâ€™u Rwanda na PSG buriyongera kubwo rwagiranye na Arsenal FC yo mu Bwongereza. Icyakora bwombi nta kiguzi cyabwo gitangazwa nkâ€™uko impande zombi zabyemeranyijwe ko bikomeza kuba ibanga.

Title: Icyo u Rwanda ruzungukira mu bufatanye na PSG nâ€™impamvu rwaguye imbibi zikarenga ubukerarugendo
Body:
Guhera kuri uyu wa Gatatu, Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu gishinzwe Ubukerarugendo, RDB, cyatangiye ubufatanye nâ€™ikipe ya Paris St Germain yo mu Bufaransa, buzamara imyaka itatu bugamije kureshya abashoramari no gukomeza kuba icyerekezo kibereye ubukerarugendo.
Guhera kuri uyu wa Gatatu, Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu gishinzwe Ubukerarugendo, RDB, cyatangiye ubufatanye nâ€™ikipe ya Paris St Germain yo mu Bufaransa, buzamara imyaka itatu bugamije kureshya abashoramari no gukomeza kuba icyerekezo kibereye ubukerarugendo.
Muri ubu bufatanye, ikirango cya Visit Rwanda kigaragazwa kuri Stade ya Parc des Princes aho PSG yakirira imikino yayo ndetse no ku mugongo ku myenda iyi kipe ikoresha mu myitozo no mu gihe cyo kwishyushya mbere yâ€™imikino, yaba iyo yambara yasuye indi kipe cyangwa iyo yambara iwayo muri Shampiyona yâ€™u Bufaransa, Ligue 1.
Ubu bufatanye bwatangajwe nyuma yâ€™umwaka umwe nâ€™igice, RDB itangiye gukorana nâ€™ikipe ya Arsenal yo mu Bwongereza, aho binyuze muri Visit Rwanda, iyi kipe yo mu Mujyi wa Londres yamamaza ubukerarugendo bwâ€™u Rwanda.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na Televiziyo Rwanda, Umuyobozi Mukuru wâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Iterambere, RDB, Clare Akamanzi, yavuze ko impamvu u Rwanda rwahisemo kurenga imbibi zâ€™ubukerarugendo muri ubu bufatanye rwagiranye na Paris Saint-Germain ari ukugira ngo bifashe no kuzamura Abanyarwanda binyuze mu byo bakora, bimenyekane no mu mahanga.
Ati "Mu gukomeza guteza imbere ubukungu bwâ€™igihugu cyacu nâ€™ubukungu ndetse nâ€™ubuzima bwâ€™abanyarwanda dukomeza gushaka uburyo twakongera ubushobozi bwâ€™ubukungu bwacu mu gihugu ndetse no hanze yâ€™igihugu.â€™â€™
â€™â€™ Twasinyanye nabo kugira ngo tumenyekanishe Visit Rwanda mu rwego rwâ€™ubukerarugendo, ariko ntabwo aribyo gusa no mu rwego rwa Visit Rwanda tuzakoresha nâ€™abakurikirana PSG mu Bufaransa nâ€™ahandi hose, bafitanye ubufatanye nâ€™abantu bari mu nzego zitandukanye, yaba abakora imyenda, gukora icyayi nâ€™ikawa [â€¦]. Tuzacuruza icyayi cyacu muri Parc des Princes aho PSG ikinira nâ€™ikawa imenyekanishwe mu Bufarana ndetse ducuruze byinshi kurushaho.â€™â€™
Akamanzi avuga ko ubu ari uburyo bwiza bwo kumenyekanisha ibikorerwa mu Rwanda nâ€™Ubukerarungendo bwarwo kugira ngo abanyamahanga barusheho kubumenya ariko nabo baze bagure ibintu byo mu Rwanda.
Atiâ€™â€™ Mu kugura ibyo bintu, bizatanga akazi ku Banyarwanda bakora ibi bintu, bakomeze kubikora kandi babikore ku bwinshi, babone amafaranga bitume nâ€˜igihugu cyacu gikomeza gutera imbere.â€™â€™
Agaruka ku mpamvu ubufatanye na Paris Saint Germain butarebye gusa ku bukerarugendo, Akamanzi yavuze ko byatewe nâ€™uburyo iyi kipe yo mu Bufaransa imeze ku buryo babona nayo ikoresha umupira wâ€™amaguru mu kumenyekanisha bindi bikorwa bitandukanye abantu bakunda.
Atiâ€™â€™ Impamvu twagiye mu bukerarugendo nâ€™ibindi ni uko twabonye umufatanyabikorwa tugiye gusinyana na we [PSG] adakina umupira gusa, bakoresha umupira kugira ngo abantu bagaragaze ibintu bakunda, haba mu myidagaduro, umuco, byose barabishyigikira, bakagaragaza ko ushobora gukoresha umupira kugira ngo uteze imbere ibindi bintu bituma ubaho neza.â€™â€™
" Ni ukureba uburyo twakoresha izina bafite kugira ngo dukore ibindi bashyigikira mu buzima no mu bukungu. Niyo mpamvu twahisemo kugira ngo turenge ubukerarugendo, dushake uko twakorana duteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda.â€™â€™
Muri ubu bufatanye bwâ€™u Rwanda na Paris Saint Germain, hazabaho kandi icyumweru cyâ€™imishinga yâ€™abanyempano bâ€™abanyarwanda nâ€™Abafaransa. Icyo cyumweru cyiswe â€œSemaine du Rwanda Ã  Parisâ€ kizajya gitegurwa na PSG mu kumenyekanisha ibintu byose bikorerwa mu Rwanda.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RDB avuga ko muri iki cyumweru Abanyarwanda bakora ibintu bitandukanye bazajya bahabwa umwanya wo kujya kubyerekana mu Mujyi wa Paris.
Ati"Tuzacuruza ikawa nâ€™icyayi cyâ€™u Rwanda muri Stade. Nta kindi gihugu kizabikora, nitwe gusa. Bivuze ko bazatumenya cyane kurusha uko batuzi ubu.â€™â€™
"Ntabwo ari ibyo gusa, tuzakomeza tumenyekanishe u Rwanda mu Bufaransa, buri mwaka tuzagira ikintu cyitwa â€˜â€™Icyumweru muri Parisâ€™â€™, aho tuzana abantu batandukanye bakora imyenda, bakora ubukorikori, bakora ibintu bitandukanye bashobora gucuruza hanze, tubahe umwanya wo kwerekana ibyo bintu no kwerekana Umuco wacu ku buryo bizatuma abantu baza mu Rwanda bakagura nâ€™ibintu byaho.â€™â€™
Akamanzi yashimangiye ko ubufatanye u Rwanda ruri kugirana nâ€™amakipe akomeye i Burayi bugamije gutekereza kure kugira ngo u Rwanda ruzabe igihugu gikize mu myaka iri imbere ndetse nâ€™Abanyarwanda bagire ubushobozi buhagije bwo gukora ibyishimirwa nâ€™abanyamahanga.
Ati "Turashaka gucuruza ibintu byinshi kurushaho hanze yâ€™igihugu. Turashaka ko byakwiyongera mu bwinshi ndetse no mu bwiza bwabyo. Icyo tumaze kubona nkâ€™igihugu ni uko tugomba kugira icyerekezo cyâ€™igihe kirekire cyane. Dutekereze ngo mu myaka 10, 20 cyangwa 50 tuzaba turi hehe? Turifuza kuba igihugu gikize, Abanyarwanda bize kandi bafite ubushobozi, bashobora gukora ibintu bifite agaciro kari hejuru.â€™â€™
Umuyobozi wa RDB avuga ko kuri ubu umubano wâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™u Bufaransa ari mwiza ndetse bahisemo gukorana na Paris Saint Germain nkâ€™ikipe ishaka kuzamura abato nâ€™urubyiruko no gushyikira gukora ibintu binoze nkâ€™uko bimeze no kâ€™u Rwanda.
Yakomeje avuga ko kuba u Rwanda ruri gushora cyane mu mikino ari uko rwabonye ko bitanga icyerekezo cyiza cyâ€™igihugu ndetse bizafasha nâ€™Abanyarwanda gutera imbere.
Atiâ€™â€™ Nkâ€™igihugu turimo gushora mu mikino. Twubatse Kigali Arena kugira ngo Basketball ikinwe, hari ikibuga cya Cricket, hari amagare ndetse Abanyarwanda bitwara neza, hari Golf Club turi kubaka kugira ngo igere ku rwego mpuzamahanga, bigaragaza ko Leta iri gushora cyane mu mikino kugira ngo izamuke kandi nayo bizatuma itanga umusaruro mu bukungu bwacu.â€™â€™
PSG izagira uruhare mu kuzamura abakiri bato binyuze mu gushinga ishuri ryâ€™umupira wâ€™amaguru i Kigali, aho iyi kipe izajya itegura imyitozo yâ€™abatoza nâ€™abakiri bato mu kubafasha kugira ubunararibonye bwâ€™iyi kipe ikomeye ku mugabane wâ€™u Burayi, byâ€™umwihariko yanditse amateka mu Bufaransa.
RDB ivuga kuva u Rwanda rutangiye gukorana na Arsenal binyuze muri Visit Rwanda mu mwaka ushize, kuri ubu ba mukerarungo baza mu Rwanda bamaze kugera kuri miliyoni imwe na 700 ndetse yizeye ko bazakomeza kwiyongera mu myaka iri imbere.

Title: Nyanza: Inzira zâ€™Ubukerarugendo gakondo zahawe icyangombwa cyo mu rwego rwa mbere (Amafoto)
Body:
Inzira eshatu zâ€™Ubukerarugendo gakondo zo mu Karere ka Nyanza [The Nyanza Cultural Trials] zahawe icyangombwa cyâ€™uko zujuje ibisabwa ku rwego rwo hejuru mu gukorerwamo ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku kugenda nâ€™amaguru zihabwa amanota 75.
Inzira eshatu zâ€™Ubukerarugendo gakondo zo mu Karere ka Nyanza [The Nyanza Cultural Trials] zahawe icyangombwa cyâ€™uko zujuje ibisabwa ku rwego rwo hejuru mu gukorerwamo ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku kugenda nâ€™amaguru zihabwa amanota 75.
Ni igikorwa cyabaye kuri uyu wa Gatatu ubwo izo nzira zafungurwaga ku mugaragaro zihabwa nâ€™amanota bitewe nâ€™imiterere yazo igaragaza ibyiza ndangamateka na nyaburanga.
Cyitabiriwe nâ€™abayobozi barimo Minisitiri wâ€™Urubyiruko nâ€™Umuco, Mbabazi Rosemary; Umuyobozi Mukuru wâ€™Ingoro zâ€™Igihugu zâ€™Umurage wâ€™u Rwanda, Amb. Masozera Robert; Guverineri wâ€™Intara yâ€™Amajyepfo, Gasana Emmanuel na Perezida wâ€™ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku kugenda nâ€™amaguru mu gihugu cyâ€™u Budage, Klaus Eber, nâ€™abandi.
Amanota yatanzwe nâ€™abarimo inzobere mu bukerarugendo akaba na Perezida wâ€™ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku kugenda nâ€™amaguru mu gihugu cyâ€™u Budage, Klaus Eber.
Izo nzira zitwa Nyanza Cultural Trials ni eshatu zitandukanye ariko zuzuzanya.
Iya mbere yitwa â€˜Royal Trailâ€™ ifite kilometero 10 izenguruka Umujyi wa Nyanza igakikiza Ingoro zâ€™Umurage ebyiri zihari ari zo Ingoro yâ€™Abami mu Rukari nâ€™Ingoro yâ€™Umurage wo kwigira iherereye ku Rwesero ahahoze hatuye Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa.
Iyo nzira kandi inyura ahari ibindi byiza biranga amateka yâ€™u Rwanda mu Karere ka Nyanza nkâ€™Umusezero wâ€™Abami i Mwima hatabarijwe Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa tariki ya 28 Nyakanga 1959; Umwami Kigeli V watabarijwe ku ya 15 Mutarama 2017 ndetse nâ€™Umwamikazi Gicanda Rosalie wahatabarijwe tariki ya 20 Mata 1995.
Inzira ya kabiri yitwa â€˜Big Viewâ€™ yâ€™ibirometero umunani ituruka mu Mujyi wa Nyanza ikagera ku musozi wa Remera. Iyo uri kuri uwo musozi wa Remera uba ushobora kureba ku ntera yâ€™umurambararo wa kilometero 50.
Ubasha kureba imisozi itandukanye ikikije Nyanza ndetse waterera amaso kure ukaba wabona ibindi bice byâ€™u Rwanda birimo nâ€™ibirunga biri mu Majyaruguru yâ€™igihugu.
Inzira ya gatatu yitwa â€˜Gatagara Trailâ€™ yâ€™ibiromtero 12 ituruka mu Mujyi wa Nyanza ikagenda ikikiza ibishanga ikagera i Gatagara ahari ibikorwa byâ€™ububumbyi biteye imbere ndetse nâ€™ikigo cyita ku bafite ubumuga.
Klaus Eber yavuze ko bamaze iminsi basura izo nzira baziha nâ€™amanota ariko basanze zifite umwihariko ugeranyije nâ€™izo mu bihugu byâ€™i Burayi.
Ati â€œAbantu benshi bakora ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku kugenda nâ€™amaguru bakunda inzira zirimo ibyerekezo bishushanyije birimo nâ€™amakuru atandukanye. Rero nishimiye kubamenyesha ko izi nzira zo mu Karere ka Nyanza zujuje ibyo byose.â€
Yasobanuye ko mu gutanga icyangombwa hari byinshi bishingirwaho birimo ibyerekezo nâ€™ibindi byiza nyaburanga nâ€™ibiranga amateka bikabafasha kugenda bishimye batarambirwa.
Yavuze ko kimwe mu byahesheje amanota menshi inzira zo mu Karere ka Nyanza ari amateka yâ€™Ubwami ahaboneka.
Yasobanuye ko ubusanzwe batanga amanota bakurikije ukuntu ahantu hagenda hahinduka kuko abagira amanota menshi baba bafite byibura ahantu hagera kuri 50 muri izo nzira hatandukanye.
Ati â€œNi ukuvuga ngo ukagenda ukava mu ishyamba ukagera mu mirima ihinzemo imyaka, ukagera mu mibaya, mu misozi, mu bisiza, muri kaburimbo, ahatuye abantu, ahadatuwe nâ€™ahandi. Uko guhindagurika kwâ€™ahantu ni ko gutuma inzira zigira amanota meza.â€
Yakomeje avuga ko inzira zo mu Karere ka Nyanza bazisuzumye basanga zifite ahantu hagera kuri 75 hatandukanye kandi hari ibyiza byinshi bishimisha abazinyuramo.
Ati â€œTwe twaje gusanga inzira za hano zifite ahantu 75; ni igipimo kirenze ibindi byose. Ntewe ishema nâ€™uko u Rwanda rugeze kuri icyo gipimo cyo hejuru; mwabonye amanota 75.â€
Klaus Eber yavuze ko ku mugabane wâ€™u Burayi aho izo nzira zimaze igihe; izo mu rwego rwa mbere ziba zifite amanota 60 ariko hari iyo mu Budage ifite amanota 80.
Yavuze ko ari igikorwa gikomeye gikwiriye kubyazwa umusaruro kigafasha igihugu mu iterambere.
Asobanura inzego zitandukanye izo nzira ziba zirimo yavuze ko hari urwa mbere rwo hejuru ruba rwitwa â€˜Premiumâ€™ ari narwo izo mu Karere ka Nyanza bazishyizemo.
Ati â€œUbu ku Isi hose cyane cyane mu Burayi hari izigera kuri 600 zo muri urwo rwego rwa premium.â€
Umuyobozi Mukuru wâ€™Ingoro zâ€™Igihugu zâ€™Umurage wâ€™u Rwanda, Amb. Masozera Robert, yavuze ko bishimiye amanota babonye bityo nyuma yo gutangiza izo nzira ku mugaragaro hagiye gukurikira ibikorwa byo kuzimenyekanisha no kuzibyaza umusaruro.
Ati â€œIzi nzira eshatu zimaze gutangizwa zagiye ku rwego mpuzamahanga; ubu hagiye gukurikiraho kuzimenyekanisha kugira ngo zimenyerwe; abantu bakora mu bukerarugendo batangire bazicuruze bazimenyakanishe.â€
Amb. Masozera yavuze ko usibye izo nzira eshatu hari izindi enye zizatangira gukorwa guhera umwaka utaha.
Bamwe mu baturage bitabiriye igikorwa cyo gutaha izo nzira banifatanya nâ€™abayobozi gukora urugendo rwa kilometero 10 mu nzira yitwa â€˜Royal Trailâ€™ bavuze ko bazishimiye cyane.
Dusabimana Francine waturutse mu Mujyi wa Kigali ati â€œIcyanshimishije ni ibintu nabonye bitandukanye birimo utuyira twiza tuzamuka nâ€™utumanuka imisozi; mbese ntabwo umuntu ashobora gucika intege ngo ananirwe. Nabonye Ingoro zâ€™Abami ni ubwa mbere nari mpageze byanshimishije kuhabona.â€
Hari bamwe batangiye kubibyaza umusaruro

Bamwe mu baturage batangiye ibikorwa byo kubyaza umusaruro ubwo bukerarugendo bushingiye ku kugenda nâ€™amaguru aho bakora ibikorwa byâ€™ubucuruzi kuri izo nzira.
Umusore witwa Nsanzintwari Augustin wo mu Murenge wa Busasamana yatangiye gucuruza inkoni abantu bashobora kwicumba bazamuka imisozi ndetse nâ€™ingofero zishobora kubakingira izuba.
Ati â€œHari ba mukerarugendo bahora baza hano mu Rukari gusura bagakenera inkoni zo kwicumba cyangwa ingofero zo kwambara.â€
Minisitiri wâ€™Urubyiruko nâ€™Umuco, Mbabazi Rosemary, yasabye abaturage bo mu Karere ka Nyanza kubyaza umusaruro ubwo bukerarugendo.
Yavuze ko ubukerarugendo ari ikintu u Rwanda rwiyemeje gushyiramo imbaraga ruganisha ku murage nâ€™umuco wâ€™Abanyarwanda.
Ati â€œNyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika yifuza ko Intara yâ€™Amajyepfo iba igicumbi cyâ€™umuco nâ€™umurage wacu. Iyi nzira yose ugakomeza ukagera muri Nyungwe hari byinshi cyane bigize amateka yacu nâ€™umurage wacu dushobora kubyaza umusaruro kandi nâ€™abato bakabimenya bagakura babiziâ€
Yasabye ubufatanye bwâ€™Akarere ka Nyanza, abari mu bukerarugendo nâ€™abikorera gukora ibikorwa bihabyaza umusaruro mwiza.
Ati â€œMumenyekanishe hano hantu ibikorwa bihari baze babisure bahamare umwanya munini bahasige amadevize nâ€™abaturage bacu batere imbere kurushaho.â€
Yagiriye inama abaturage yo gucuruza inkoni, ibyo kwitwikira, ibyo umuntu yakwihanaguza icyuya, amazi, imitako nâ€™ibindi bishobora gukenerwa na ba mukerarugendo banyura muri izo nzira.
Yasabye abasanzwe batanga serivise zâ€™amafunguro kwagura ibikorwa no kunoza ibyo bakora ku buryo nta mukerarugendo uzasohoka i Nyanza ngo ajye gushaka icyo kurya cyangwa icyo kunywa ahandi.
Ati â€œAbanyabugeni, abanyabukorikori nâ€™abatanga serivise mwumve ko ari amahirwe tugomba kubyaza umusaruro.â€
Abitabiriye urugendo rwo gutangiza izo nzira ku mugaragaro kuri uyu wa gatatu babarirwa mu bantu 400 barimo nâ€™abanyamahanga.
Icyangombwa inzira zâ€™i Nyanza zahawe kimara imyaka itatu, nyuma yayo nibwo hongera gutangwa ikindi.

Title: Uko byagenze ngo amasezerano yâ€™u Rwanda na PSG agerweho
Body:
Nta wabikekaga urebye uburyo benshi batunguwe. Inkuru yabaye kimomo binyuze ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, nyuma yâ€™umunota umwe yari yamaze gukwira hose.
Nta wabikekaga urebye uburyo benshi batunguwe. Inkuru yabaye kimomo binyuze ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, nyuma yâ€™umunota umwe yari yamaze gukwira hose.
Bamwe babanje gukeka ko ari â€™Fake Newsâ€™, abandi babanza kujijinganya kuko batiyumvishaga ko byashoboka cyangwa se koko ko byari byabaye, muri macye u Rwanda rwongeye gutungurana rusinyana amasezerano yâ€™imikoranire na Paris Saint Germain, ikipe rurangiza muri ruhago yo mu Bufaransa, imwe ikinamo Neymar na Mbappe.
Gutungurana kâ€™u Rwanda ko kumaze kuba akarande kuko rimwe bucya hatangijwe uruganda ruteranya imodoka, ejo ukumva ngo hatangijwe uruteranya izikoreshwa nâ€™amashanyarazi, ubundi ngo hatangijwe urwa telefone, cyangwa se ngo amaraso nâ€™imiti bisigaye bigemurwa ku mavuriro hifashishijwe drones. Buri munsi ucyana ayawo.
Kuri ubu inkuru yamaze kuba kimomo ni uko PSG igiye kujya yamamaza urwa Gasabo binyuze mu gikorwa cyo kureshya ba mukerarugendo kizwi nka â€™Visit Rwanda" ku buryo guhera kuri uyu wa Gatatu ku mukino PSG iri buze kwakiraho Nantes, hari butangire ubufatanye bwâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™iyi kipe, aho â€™Visit Rwandaâ€™ iza kugaragara bwa mbere ku myenda abakinnyi bari buze kuba bambaye bishyushya.
Kugira ngo ubu bufatanye bugerweho, byanyuze mu nzira ndende ariko itagoye na busa, kubera amakarita yakinwaga. Nta bwana na seti zasakiranaga.
Ni ngombwa ko ubanza ugasobanukirwa ba nyirâ€™iyi PSG nâ€™uko mu myaka itarenze icumi imaze kuba ubukombe mu Burayi. Iyi kipe si iya kera cyane kuko yashinzwe mu 1970 ariko igira amahirwe yo kuba ba nyirayo Guy Crescent, Pierre-Ã‰tienne Guyot na Henri Patrelle bari abagwizatunga bakomeye.
Ubuhangange bwayo bwakajije umurego ubwo yagurwaga nâ€™abanyemari bo muri Qatar, Qatar Sports Investments, mu 2011.
Iyi Sosiyete yashinzwe mu 2005 ifite icyicaro gikuru i Doha muri Qatar, ishora imari mu bikorwa byâ€™imyidagaduro na siporo. Perezida wa QSi ni nawe wa PSG, Nasser Ghanim Al-Khelaifi.
Nubwo ari Sosiyete yâ€™ishoramari ikora mu buryo bwigenga, ishingiye kuri leta ya Qatar, bituma iyi kipe ari imwe muri ebyiri zonyine ku Isi zifite ba nyirazo bashingiye kuri leta; yo na Manchester City.
Aba baherwe bayishoyemo imari ifatika, ihera mu gihugu imbere yigarurira ibikombe byose byari bimaze imyaka nâ€™imyaniko bitwarwa na Lyon.
Mu gushaka kwigarurira u Burayi, Al-Khelaifi, yashyize ingufu mu gutuma iyi kipe iba ikirangirire, igura buri mukinnyi wese ukomeye ku Isi ariko wâ€™icyamamare ku buryo byayifunguriye imiryango henshi. Uhereye kuri David Beckham, Zlatan Ibrahimovich, Kylian MbappÃ©, kugera kuri Neymar Jr uhenze ku Isi kugeza ubu.
Amakuru yizewe agera kuri IGIHE, ni uko kugira ngo ubufatanye bwa PSG nâ€™u Rwanda bubeho mu bijyanye no kuba iyi kipe yakwamamaza ibikorerwa mu Rwanda nâ€™ubukerarugendo bwarwo, byaturutse ndetse byoroshywa nâ€™umubano usanzwe hagati yâ€™u Rwanda na Qatar.
Uyu mubano umaze igihe kinini ni wo watumye Emir wa Qatar, Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani, aza mu Rwanda muri Mata uyu mwaka ndetse anasura Pariki yâ€™Akagera ari kumwe na Perezida Kagame mu mvura yagwaga icyo gihe.
Icyo gihe kandi hasinywe amasezerano mu ngeri enye arimo ajyanye nâ€™imikoranire mu rwego rwâ€™umuco, muri siporo, mu bukerarugendo nâ€™ibikorwa byâ€™ubucuruzi ndetse nâ€™ibijyanye nâ€™ingendo zo mu kirere.
Bivugwa ko ibiganiro na PSG byoroshye biturutse kuri uyu mubano ndetse bikomezanya umuvuduko nyuma yâ€™uko uyu muyobozi yari avuye mu Rwanda.
Igikomeye muri byose ni uko nubwo QSi iyoborwa na Al-Khelaifi ari nawe Perezida wa PSG, iyi sosiyete yashinzwe na Emir wa Qatar; byumvikanisha uburyo u Rwanda rwisanze mu biganiro mu buryo bworoshye.
Ikindi ni uko umwe mu bantu batumye QSi igura PSG, ni Nicolas Sarkozy wayoboye u Bufaransa, ubu akaba ari inshuti ikomeye yâ€™u Rwanda ndetse afasha abashoramari bashaka kurugana.
Ubu bufatanye bwâ€™u Rwanda na PSG butandukanye nâ€™ubwo u Rwanda rusanzwe rufitanye na Arsenal, ariko bufite akamaro kanini urebye mu cyerekezo cyâ€™igihugu.
Kuba u Rwanda rushaka kugaragariza amahanga ibyiza byarwo, hamwe mu hantu rwari ruhanze amaso ni ku isoko ryâ€™u Bufaransa, byâ€™umwihariko mu Mujyi wa Paris, ufatwa nkâ€™Umurwa Mukuru wâ€™Isi mu byâ€™umuco.
Ibyamamare hafi ya byose byâ€™Isi bifata Paris nkâ€™Umujyi wâ€™ubukerarugendo, imideli nâ€™ibindi; inkengero za Paris nko mu Mujyi wa Cannes ni ahantu handitse amateka mu bya Sinema. Ibi byose byanatumye mu mikoranire na PSG hitswa cyane ku kugaragaza u Rwanda mu isura yindi yâ€™umuco, hakanatezwa imbere ibikorerwa mu gihugu nkâ€™imideli, icyayi, ikawa nâ€™ibindi.
Ikindi kigaragaza isura yihariye yâ€™iyi mikoranire na PSG ni ishoramari riri gushyirwa mu ngeri zibanzweho muri aya masezerano cyane cyane umuco nâ€™imyidagaduro.
Uru rwego cyane rujyanye nâ€™imyidagaduro nâ€™ubundi Abafaransa bari batangiye kuruyoboka mu Rwanda bigaragazwa nâ€™ishoramari rya miliyoni $40Vivendi ibarizwamo Canal+ yiyemeje gushyira muri Kigali Cultural Village ku musozi wa Rebero.
Gusa igitangaje kandi cyiza muri byose ni uburyo guhera umwaka utaha, icyayi cyâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™ikawa aribyo byonyine bizajya bicuruzwa kuri Parc de Princes, stade ya PSG, biha amahirwe abahinzi nâ€™inganda gutera imbere kurushaho no kubona isoko rishya.
Kuki u Rwanda rwamamaje ku myenda yo mu myitozo nâ€™iyo mu kwishyushya mbere yâ€™umukino?
Amakuru avuga ko u Rwanda rwifuzaga kuba rwagirana amasezerano nâ€™iyi kipe ku buryo Visit Rwanda yamamazwa ku myenda ikipe ikinana, ariko ntibyakunda kubera abandi baterankunga kandi bakomeye PSG ifite.
PSG magingo aya ifite abaterankunga bagera kuri 30. Abâ€™imena ni babiri aribo Nike iyambika na Sosiyete yâ€™amahoteli ya Accor. Zombi zamamazwa ku mupira imbere aho agaciro kâ€™amasezerano nâ€™izi sosiyete kabarirwa muri miliyoni 165 zâ€™amadolari.
Byonyine amasezerano iyi kipe yagiranye na Accor bivugwa ko ari â€œmu masezerano ane meza mu Burayiâ€ aho ku mwaka agaciro kayo kagera muri miliyoni 50 zâ€™amadolari.
Arsenal ubusanzwe yamamaza u Rwanda binyuze ku gushyira ijambo Visit Rwanda ku kuboko kwâ€™ibumoso kwâ€™imyenda iyi kipe ikinana muri shampiyona.
Aha hantu ku mwenda wa PSG hafitwe na Banki yâ€™Igihugu muri Qatar (Qatar National Bank) nayo itanga amafaranga menshi, ikanarenzaho guha amasezerano abakinnyi barimo nka Neymar ngo bayamamaze ku giti cyabo.
Iyi banki niyo yahaye PSG inguzanyo yâ€™amafaranga yifashishijwe mu kugura Neymar, aho ayamutanzweho abarirwa muri miliyoni 222 zâ€™amadolari ya Amerika.
Mu mugongo naho hafitwe nâ€™abanya-Qatar, Ooredoo, sosiyete ikora ibijyanye nâ€™itumanaho. Ibi nibyo byatumye u Rwanda rwashakaga kugaragara muri Paris rushaka ubundi buryo hakorwa amasezerano yâ€™imikoranire ndetse hanashyirwamo ingingo nyinshi zirugaragaza mu buryo budasanzwe ndetse ubirebye neza bwihariye kurusha ubwa Arsenal.
Itandukaniro ni uko amasezerano ya Arsenal agaragaza u Rwanda ku rwego rwâ€™Isi yose ariko inyungu yayo ntihite igera ku muturage wo hasi ako kanya, mu gihe aya PSG akora ku buzima bwâ€™umuhinzi wo mu Kitabi uri mu murima wâ€™icyayi.
Umwe mu basesenguye aya masezerano waganiriye na IGIHE yagize ati â€œAya Arsenal yagejeje u Rwanda ku rwego ruhambaye bidasanzwe, atandukanye nâ€™aya, gusa icyiza kuri aya ni uko inyungu igera ku muntu ako kanya.â€
Ibi bishingirwa ku kuba guhera umwaka utaha wâ€™imikino, ubu bufatanye bwâ€™u Rwanda na PSG, buteganya ko icyayi cyâ€™u Rwanda nâ€™ikawa aribyo byonyine bizajya bitangwa kuri Parc des Princes.
Ushinzwe itangazamakuru nâ€™itumanaho mu Kigo cyâ€™Igihugu gishinzwe guteza imbere ibyoherezwa mu mahanga bikomoka ku buhinzi nâ€™ubworozi, NAEB, Pie Ntwari, yabwiye IGIHE ko aha abahinzi indi mpamvu yo kongera umusaruro.
Ati â€œIyo tubonye isoko ryiyongera ku yo dufite biba ari byiza. Igishimishije ubu ni uko ari twe twenyine tuzaba twemerewe gucuruzamo [muri stade] icyayi nâ€™ikawa. Twiteze ko amadevize yinjiraga aziyongera. Ikindi abahinzi babonye indi mpamvu yo kongera umusaruro nâ€™ubwiza ku bwinshi. Twiteze isoko ridahungabana mu gihe cyâ€™imyaka itatu.â€
Hazabaho kandi icyumweru cyâ€™imishinga yâ€™abanyempano bâ€™abanyarwanda nâ€™Abafaransa. Icyo cyumweru cyiswe â€œSemaine du Rwanda Ã  Parisâ€ kizajya gitegurwa na PSG mu kumenyekanisha ibintu byose bikorerwa mu Rwanda.
Ibi byiyongera ku mikoranire hagati yâ€™abakora mu ruganda rwâ€™imideli izatangizwa mu mezi ari imbere.
Mu bijyanye no kuzamura impano zâ€™u Rwanda, PSG izagira uruhare mu kuzamura abakiri bato binyuze mu gushinga ishuri ryâ€™umupira wâ€™amaguru i Kigali, aho iyi kipe izajya itegura imyitozo yâ€™abatoza nâ€™abakiri bato mu kubafasha kugira ubunararibonye bwâ€™iyi kipe ikomeye ku mugabane wâ€™u Burayi, byâ€™umwihariko yanditse amateka mu Bufaransa.

Title: Inzira zâ€™Ubukerarugendo gakondo zitezweho gukuba kabiri umubare wâ€™abasura i Nyanza
Body:
Ubuyobozi bwâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Ingoro zâ€™Umurage wâ€™u Rwanda bwatangaje ko inzira zâ€™Ubukerarugendo Gakondo za Kinyarwanda zigiye gutahwa mu Karere ka Nyanza zitezweho kongera umubare wâ€™abagasura bakikuba kabiri ku mwaka.
Ubuyobozi bwâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Igihugu cyâ€™Ingoro zâ€™Umurage wâ€™u Rwanda bwatangaje ko inzira zâ€™Ubukerarugendo Gakondo za Kinyarwanda zigiye gutahwa mu Karere ka Nyanza zitezweho kongera umubare wâ€™abagasura bakikuba kabiri ku mwaka.
Byatangajwe kuri uyu wa Gatandatu mu muganda rusange aho hakozwe ibikorwa byâ€™isuku muri imwe muri izo nzira iherereye mu Murenge wa Busasamana.
Hasobanuwe ko izo nzira ziswe â€˜The Nyanza Cultural Trialsâ€™ ari eshatu zitandukanye ariko zuzuzanya.
Iya mbere yitwa â€˜Royal Trailâ€™ ifite kilometero 10 izenguruka Umujyi wa Nyanza igakikiza Ingoro zâ€™Umurage ebyiri zihari ari zo Ingoro yâ€™Abami mu Rukari nâ€™Ingoro yâ€™Umurage wo kwigira iherereye ku Rwesero ahahoze hatuye Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa.
Iyo nzira kandi izanyura ahari ibindi byiza biranga amateka yâ€™u Rwanda mu Karere ka Nyanza nkâ€™Umusezero wâ€™Abami i Mwima hatabarijwe Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa tariki ya 28 Nyakanga 1959; Umwami Kigeli V watabarijwe ku ya 15 Mutarama 2017 ndetse nâ€™Umwamikazi Gicanda Rosalie wahatabarijwe tariki ya 20 Mata 1995.
Inzira ya kabiri yitwa â€˜Big Viewâ€™ yâ€™ibirometero umunani ituruka mu Mujyi wa Nyanza ikagera ku musozi wa Remera. Iyo uri kuri uwo musozi wa Remera uba ushobora kureba ku ntera yâ€™umurambararo wa kilometero 50.
Ubasha kureba imisozi itandukanye ikikije Nyanza ndetse waterera amaso kure ukaba wabona ibindi bice byâ€™u Rwanda birimo nâ€™ibirunga biri mu Majyaruguru yâ€™igihugu.
Inzira ya gatatu yitwa â€˜Gatagara Trailâ€™ yâ€™ibiromtero 12 ituruka mu Mujyi wa Nyanza ikagenda ikikiza ibishanga ikagera i Gatagara ahari ibikorwa byâ€™ububumbyi biteye imbere ndetse nâ€™ikigo cyita ku bafite ubumuga.
Izo nzira zose uko ari eshatu zifite umwihariko wâ€™uko ari utuyira twa Kinyarwanda tunyura mu misozi, ibibaya aho abantu batunyuramo bagenda bareba ahantu hateye indabyo, ahahinze imyaka itandukanye, ahatuwe, urutoki nâ€™ibindi byiza bitandukanye bihaboneka.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wâ€™Ingoro zâ€™Igihugu zâ€™Umurage wâ€™u Rwanda, Amb. Masozera Robert, yavuze ko izo nzira ziyongera ku bindi byiza biranga amateka mu Karere ka Nyanza bigatuma ba mukerarugendo bahasura biyongera.
Ati â€œTwazanye ubundi bwoko bwâ€™ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku kugenda nâ€™amaguru baciye muri izi nzira gakondo za Kinyarwanda. Ni ukuvuga ngo abo bantu nibajya baza aho kugira ngo bamare amasaha abiri nibura bazajya bamara iminsi itatu cyangwa barenzeho kandi uko batinda ni ko bituzanira inyungu yo kudusigira amafaranga.â€
Amb. Masozera yashimiye abaturage bitabiriye umuganda rusange wo gukora isuku muri izo nzira, abararikira kuzaza kuzitaha ku mugaragaro tariki ya 4 Ukuboza 2019.
Ati â€œNi igikorwa gikomeye cyane kizatuma hano i Nyanza cya cyifuzo mwari mufite cyâ€™uko haba igicumbi cyâ€™umuco kiba impamo. Dutekereza ko izo nzira zizatuma abantu basura Nyanza bava ku bihumbi 70 nibura bakagera ku bihumbi 150 ku mwaka.â€
Amb. Masozera yasobanuye ko inzobere mu bijyanye nâ€™ubwo bukerarugendo zimaze iminsi zisura izo nzira ari nako zitanga amanota hakaba hari icyizere ko zizaza mu za mbere nziza 1 000 ziri ku Isi.
Muri izo nzira bagiye bashyiraho ibyapa byerekana ibyerekezo ariko abazajya bazinyuramo hari ubwo bazajya bakenera ababasobanurira amateka yâ€™uduce dutandukanye duhari.
Umuyobozi wungirije ushinzwe iterambere ryâ€™ubukungu mu Karere ka Nyanza, Kajyambere Patrick, yasabye abaturage kwirinda kongera kumena imyanda hafi yâ€™izo nzira.
Yabibukije ko bagomba kugira isuku muri byose, buri rugo rukagira aho kujugunya imyanda habugenewe ntibongere kuyishyira aho babonye.
Ati â€œNahoze mbona umwanda wari uri hano muri iyi nzira; umuntu arava mu rugo akaza kumena ibishingwe hano cyangwa akagajugunya ibishishwa byâ€™ibitoki kubera ko atumvaga agaciro kâ€™iyi nzira.â€
Bamwe mu baturage bo mu Karere ka Nyanza bawiye IGIHE ko nyuma yo kumenya agaciro kâ€™izo nzira bagiye kuzitaho ku buryo hatazongera kugaragara umwanda.
Mukankunzi Jeannette ati â€œTwishimiye ibikorwa byâ€™ubukerarugendo bikomeje kwiyongera hano iwacu; izo nzira ntabwo zizongera kugaragaramo umwanda kuko buri wese agiye kuba ijisho rya mugenzi we ku buryo nta muntu uzongera kuza kuhamena imyanda.â€
Kalisa JMV nawe yavuze ko bishimiye ubusobanuro bahawe ku bijyanye nâ€™izo nzira kandi yumvise bizagirira akamaro Akarere kabo ka Nyanza.
Akarere ka Nyanza kabumbatiye amateka menshi yiganjemo ayo hambere kuko Nyanza yabaye Umurwa Mukuru wâ€™Ubwami kuva mu 1899 kugeza mu mu 1962
I Nyanza hahoze ari Umurwa wâ€™Ubwami kuko hatuwe nâ€™Abami bane ari bo Kigeli IV Rwabugiri wari utuye ku misozi ya Mwima na Mushirarungu; Yuhi IV Musinga watuye i Mwima na Gakenyeri; Mutara III Rudahigwa watuye mu Rukali ndetse nâ€™Umwami Kigeli V Ndahindurwa watuye i Busasamana.
Muri nyanza kandi haboneka Amariba ya Mutende yafukuwe ku ngoma yâ€™Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa, aho Inyambo ze ndetse nâ€™inka zâ€™abaturage ziturutse imihanda yose zashokaga.
Hari kandi Icyuzi cya Nyamagana cyafukujwe nâ€™Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa afatanyije nâ€™agoronome wâ€™Umubiligi witwaga Dubois.
I Nyanza kandi hafatwa nkâ€™igicumbi cyâ€™ubutabera kuko hahoze urukiko umwami yaciragamo imanza.

Title: Inyubako za mbere mu Rwanda zakira ba mukerarugendo zihenze kurusha izindi (Amafoto)
Body:
U Rwanda rukomeje gutera imbere cyane mu rwego rwâ€™ubukerarugendo, ndetse inyubako zakira ba mukerarugendo zikomeje kuba nyinshi, gusa si ko zose ziri ku rwego rumwe nkâ€™uko amikoro yâ€™abantu agenda asumbana.
U Rwanda rukomeje gutera imbere cyane mu rwego rwâ€™ubukerarugendo, ndetse inyubako zakira ba mukerarugendo zikomeje kuba nyinshi, gusa si ko zose ziri ku rwego rumwe nkâ€™uko amikoro yâ€™abantu agenda asumbana.
Ubwo Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yarangiraga, u Rwanda rwari igihugu cyangiritse, abanyamahanga baragitereranye ndetse nta bikorwa bifatika rufite, kugeza ubwo filime yiswe Hotel Rwanda yajyaga gukinwa, hagafatwa icyemezo ko ikinirwa muri Afurika yâ€™Epfo ku mpamvu zirimo ko mu Rwanda hatari hari hoteli zakwakira ibyamamare nka Don Cheadle uyigaragaramo.
Burya si buno! Ibintu byarahindutse, ubu muri hoteli eshanu zâ€™inyenyeri eshanu zibarirwa mu rwa Gasabo, ebyiri ziri hanze yâ€™Umurwa Mukuru Kigali. Izo ni One & Only Nyungwe House yo muri Pariki yâ€™Igihugu ya Nyungwe na Bisate Eco Lodge yo mu Karere ka Musanze yashyizwe kuri urwo rwego ku wa 1 Ugushyingo 2019.
Kugeza ubu hoteli zâ€™inyenyereri eshanu ziyongera kuri izo ni Radisson Blu Hotel & Convention Centre, Kigali Serena Hotel na Kigali Marriott Hotel.
Ni intambwe zikomeye zizatuma u Rwanda rubasha kugera ku rwego rwo kwinjiza nibura miliyoni 800 zâ€™amadolari ya Amerika mu 2024, ahwanye na miliyari 760 zâ€™amafaranga yâ€™u Rwanda.
Twagerageje kwegeranya hoteli za mbere mu Rwanda zihenze, nubwo ibiciro byazo bihindagurika bitewe nâ€™ibihe, ni ukuvuga niba ari mu mezi ajyanye nâ€™ubukeraryugendo cyangwa mu gihe abasura igihugu baba ari bake.
Haniyongeraho ko mu kugena igiciro hitabwa ku gihe umuntu azamara muri hoteli runaka. Ntabwo bivuze ko uburyo zikurikirana hano ari bwo buryo ntakuka. Kugira ngo wumve neza iyi nkuru, birasaba ko wifashisha Calculatrice, hanyuma idolari rimwe riri kuri 925 Frw ugendeye ku ivunjisha rya Banki Nkuru yâ€™Igihugu.
1. Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House
Singita yatashywe ku wa 1 Kanama 2019 na Perezida Paul Kagame aherekejwe na Madamu Jeannette Kagame. Ni inyubako yo ku rwego rwo hejuru yakira ba mukerarugendo nabo bo ku rwego nkâ€™urwo, yubatswe mu Karere ka Musanze ku birenge byâ€™Ikirunga cya Sabyinyo, aho uba unitegeye ibirunga bya Gahinga na Muhabura.
Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House yubatswe mu gishanga cyari urwuri, ariko ubu hashibutse umushinga ukomeye wâ€™ubukerarugendo ugizwe nâ€™inzu umunani zubatswe mu buryo zirengera ibidukikije.
Zirimo zirindwi zagenewe umuntu umwe cyangwa uherekejwe kuko buri imwe ifite uburiri bumwe, uruganiriro rwagutse nâ€™ibindi byangombwa nkenerwa, hakaba indi imwe yiswe Kataza House yo igizwe nâ€™ibyumba bine byo kuraramo.
Yubatswe nâ€™ibikoresho byinshi byakorewe mu Rwanda, ibyinshi ni ibiboneka i Musanze birimo amakoro nâ€™imigano, itwara miliyoni $25.
Ibiciro byaho byihagazeho nubwo bihindagurika bitewe nâ€™ibihe byâ€™ubukerarugendo nkâ€™uko twabivuze.
Nkâ€™ubu kuva ku wa 1 Ugushyingo kugeza ku wa 19 Ukuboza, icyumba gishobora kuraramo abantu babiri cyishyurwa $1495 ku muntu ku ijoro, mu gihe mu mpeshyi aba ari $1750.
Muri iyi minsi kandi icyumba kibamo ibitanda bibiri kirimo kwishyurwa $4 485, mu gihe ubusanzwe aba ari $5250 hagati yâ€™umuntu umwe na batatu, hakwiyongeraho undi umwe bikajyana nâ€™inyongera ya $1495 mu minsi nkâ€™iyi cyangwa $1750 mu bihe byâ€™ubukerarugendo.
Kurara muri Kataza House yo ishobora kwakira abantu umunani ubu ni $6877 mu gihe ubusanzwe aba ari $8050 ku ijoro rimwe ku bantu hagati yâ€™umwe na bane, hagira uwiyongeraho bikajyana nâ€™izamuka rya $1495 cyangwa $1750 bitewe nâ€™ibihe.
Muri icyo giciro haba hakubiyemo nâ€™ibintu byose umuntu akenera mu ijoro, birimo ibyo kurya no kunywa byose bihaboneka.
2.	One&Only Gorillaâ€™s Nest
Mu kwezi gushize nibwo inkuru yabaye kimomo ko nyuma ya hoteli igezweho imaze igihe muri Pariki yâ€™Igihugu ya Nyungwe, One & Only Resorts yibarutse irindi shami mu karere ka Musanze, ryitezweho kuzajya ryakira ba mukerarugendo basura ingagi.
One&Only Gorillaâ€™s Nest yubatswe mu Kinigi mu ishyamba ryâ€™inturusu, ahantu hitegeye ibyiza byâ€™ibirunga byâ€™u Rwanda. Yubatswe mu biti mo hagati ku buryo buri nzu iteretse ku byuma bishinze, aho nibura bibarwa ko inzu imwe yagiye itwara miliyoni imwe yâ€™amadolari ngo yubakwe.
Kugeza ubu kuharara byihagazeho kuko nka Forest lodge irimo ibitanda bibiri, kuyiraramo ijoro rimwe ari $3,825 ni ukuvuga nibura miliyoni 3.5 Frw; Forest Lodge King ni $3,060 ni ukuvuga asaga miliyoni 2,8 Frw; Virunga Suite ni $4,760 ni ukuvuga miliyoni 4,3 Frw naho Ingagi suite ni $5,900, nibura ni miliyoni 5,4 Frw.
3.	Radisson Blu Hotel
Muri Nyakanga 2016 nibwo Perezida Paul Kagame yafunguye ku mugaragaro inyubako ya Radisson Blu and Kigali Convention Centre, ahamya ko ari intsinzi yâ€™Abanyarwanda kuko bananiwe kenshi kuyuzuza kubera ubushobozi buke, ariko ntibacike intege bikarangira bayujuje.
Iyi nyubako yubatse mu birometero bitanu uvuye ku kibuga cyâ€™indege mpuzamahanga cya Kigali, mu Murenge wa Kimihurura ku buso bungana na hegitari 12,6.
Kigali Convention Centre igizwe na Hotel yâ€™inyenyeri eshanu ifite ibyumba 292, icyumba cyâ€™inama cyakira abantu basaga 2500, ibiro byo gukoreramo nâ€™ibindi. Inyubako zirimo zifite agaciro ka miliyoni 300 zâ€™amadolari abarirwa muri miliyari 223 zâ€™amafaranga yâ€™u Rwanda.
Iyo ukigera ku rubuga rwayo wakirizwa ubutumwa ko ushobora kurara muri iyi nyubako itagira uko isa guhera ku $265.50
Ayo madolari agenda azamuka ukagera kuri Junior Suite ifite ibaraza, ikakwemera kugira aho wakirira abashyitsi ugahabwa nâ€™ifunguro rya mu gitondo ku madolari $690.00 kugeza kuri Suite yo iguha ibyo ukeneye byose (Terrace & Lounge Access-Breakfast) yishyurwa $ 3,540.
4.	Kigali Marriott Hotel
Mu 2016 nibwo u Rwanda rwahaye ikaze Marriott Hotel, hoteli yâ€™inyenyeri eshanu igizwe nâ€™ibyumba 254 birimo nâ€™icyo ku rwego rwâ€™abaperezida. Niyo hoteli yayo ya kabiri yari ifunguwe ku mugabane wa Afurika nyuma yâ€™iri mu Misiri.
Kuharara byihagazeho, kuko uwagiyemo nko ku wa Mbere agasohokamo kuri uyu wa Kabiri ku mafaranga make byamusabye kwishyura $210, yakenera kujya mu cyumba cyo ku rwego rwo hejuru akishyura $3,500 kandi ku ijoro rimwe gusa.
Muri rusange iyi hoteli igizwe nâ€™inyubako umunani zigerekeranye, ikagira ibyumba 229 nâ€™icyo twagereranya nâ€™inzu mu yindi cyangwa suite 25, ziri mu rwego rwo hejuru ku buryo umuntu aba yisanzuye, afite ibyangombwa nkenerwa byose imbere ye. Ifite kandi ahantu 14 hatandukanye hashobora kubera inama.
5.	Bisate Lodge
Iyi ni indi nyubako ya Wilderness Safari yubatswe muri Pariki yâ€™Igihugu yâ€™Ibirunga.
Bisate ifite ibyumba bitandatu buri kimwe kiri ukwacyo, bishobora kwakira abantu byaba mu buryo bwâ€™umuntu ukeneye kurara wenyine, kurarana nâ€™undi cyangwa guhabwa ibitanda bibiri.
Kuharara umuntu yishyura bitewe nâ€™ibihe ndetse no kuba aherekejwe cyangwa ari wenyine. Nkâ€™urugero uwajya kurara muri Bisate Logde muri aya mezi hagati ya tariki 16 Ukuboza 2019 na tariki 29 Gashyantare 2020, byamusaba kwitwaza US$1654. Gusa ashobora no kugabanuka ku mpamvu zitandukanye.
6.	Kigali Serena Hotel
Kigali Serena Hotel ni imwe muri hotel zigezweho kandi zifite amazina amaze igihe mu Rwanda, ndetse ho ibiciro byayo iyo ufunguye urubuga rwayo ubisoma mu mafaranga yâ€™u Rwanda. Nibura icyumba gihera ku 215 855 Frw ; hakwiyongeramo ifunguro rya mu gitondo bikaba 246 784 Frw. Ni amadolari ya Amerika asaga $230.
Bigenda bizamuka mu biciro bitewe nâ€™imiterere yâ€™icyumba nâ€™ibijyana nacyo, wagera ku byumba byo mu rwego rw hejuru (Junior suite & Suite) ukishyura hagati ya 895 891 Frw na 1.087.018 Frw, ni ukuvuga agera mu madolari ya Amerika $1170.
7.	One and Only Nyungwe House 
One & Only Nyungwe House ni hotel iteye amabengeza yubatswe mu nkengero za Pariki yâ€™Igihugu ya Nyungwe.
Iyi hoteli iri rwagati mu mirima yâ€™icyayi ya Gisakura yongeye gufungurira bose amarembo tariki ya 1 Ukwakira 2018, nyuma yo kuvugururwa no kwagurwa. Yubatswe mu 2010 ku bufatanye na Guverinoma yâ€™u Rwanda ihabwa izina rya Nyungwe Forest Lodge, rihinduka mu 2017 nyuma yâ€™uko yeguriwe One & Only Nature Resorts.
Hotel za One & Only Nature Resorts zifite umwihariko wo kuba mu gihe zubakwa, hazirikanwa ku kurengera ibidukikije nâ€™urundi rusobe rwâ€™ibinyabuzima.
Ibyumba byayo uko ari 22 bigaragaza ubwiza bwâ€™imitako igaragaza umuco nyarwanda, bituma uwabirayemo abasha kwisobanurira no kurushaho kwegerana nâ€™u Rwanda atabanje kugira uwo asobanuza.
Serivisi zo ku rwego rwo hejuru One&Only itanga kandi zinihagazeho kuko ibyumba byabo byishyurwa guhera ku madolari 595 mu ijoro rimwe. Hari kandi nâ€™ikindi cyumba cyagutse (Two-Bedroom Forest Suite), gifite uruganiriro nâ€™aho gufatira amafunguro, kandi kiri ahantu uba witegeye ibyiza bitatse ishyamba rya Nyungwe.
Iki cyumba gishobora kwakira abantu bane, kiri mu byumba byâ€™amahoteli bihenze cyane mu Rwanda, kuko cyishyurwa 2 288$.
8.	Amakoro Songa Lodge
Amakoro Songa Lodge ni indi nyubako yiyubashye yakira ba mukerarugendo, iherereye mu Kinigi mu Karere ka Musanze. Ni inyubako ziri ahantu hatuje, ku buryo igihe wasuye ingagi mu birunga cyangwa wagiyeyo kuruhuka, hagufasha gusubiza ubwenge ku gihe ukunga ubumwe nâ€™ibvidukikije.
Kurara muri izi nyubako nabyo byihagazeho, kuko bisaba kwishyura nibura $1200 ku ijoro rimwe, ndetse hari nâ€™aho wishyura $1500 ku ijoro. Ni inyubako yâ€™akataraboneka ibereye buri wese uri mu kwezi kwa buki.
Amakoro Songa Lodge kandi yahawe ubushobozi butuma nkâ€™ababyeyi bafite abana, babona ikibuga gihagije cyo kwidagaduriraho.
9.	The Bishopâ€™s House 
The Bishopâ€™s House ni inyubako itazwi na benshi ariko yihagazeho, yubatswe mu Karere ka Musanze gafatwa nkâ€™irembo ryâ€™ubukeraugendo bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru mu Rwanda, kuko ari iwabo wâ€™Ingagi ziba mu birunga.
Uyirebeye inyuma si inyubako yâ€™igitangaza kuko yubatswe mu buryo bwakoreshwaga mu gihe cyâ€™ubukoloni, ariko itanga serivisi zikomeye ndetse nâ€™ibikorwa biyigize birihariye. Ifite ibyumba icyenda byakira ba mukerarugendo.
Ibyo bituma nkâ€™icyumba cyayo kinini kuruta ibindi (executive suite), kukiraramo bisaba umuntu kwishyura $1200 ku ijoro, Deluxe room ikishyurwa $800 ku ijoro naho ibyumba binini bishobora no kujyamo ibitanda bibiri bikishyurwa $700.
10.	Magashi Camp 
Iyi ni indi nyubako igezweho yubatswe mu Majyaruguru ya Pariki yâ€™Igihugu yâ€™Akagera, aho uba witegeye ikiyaga cya Rwanyakazinga. Ni hamwe mu hakundwa na ba mukerarugendo banyuranye, baba bajyanwe no gusura inyamaswa ziboneka muri Pariki yâ€™Igihugu yâ€™Akagera cyangwa kureba inyoni zâ€™amoko arenga 520.
Magashi yifashishije amahema atandatu, yubatswe nâ€™ikigo Wilderness Safaris itahwa muri Gicurasi 2019.
Ibiciro byayo byihagazeho kuko kuharara ijoro rimwe, nko mu ihema abantu bashobora gusangira, muri aya mezi akunze gukorerwamo ubukerarugendo kuva ku wa 16 Ukuboza 2019 kugeza ku wa 29 Gashyantare, ni amadolari US$650 ku ijoro.
11. Ruzizi Tented Lodge
Ni inyubo igezweho ikoreshwa cyane nâ€™abashaka gukambika muri Pariki yâ€™Igihugu yâ€™Akagera, aho umuntu aba yitegeye neza ikiyaga cya Ihema. Igizwe nâ€™amahema icyenda ateye neza mu biti bituma hahora umuyaga utagira uko usa.
Ishobora kwakira abashyitsi 20 kandi buri hema rikagira ubushobozi bwo gutanga amazi ashyushye nâ€™akonje ku muntu uyakeneye, ikagira umwihariko wo kuba ikoresha ingufu zikomoka ku mirasire yâ€™izuba.
Mu mezi atarimo ubukerarugendo ku rwego rwo hejuru nko kuva ku wa 1 Werurwe kugeza ku wa 30 Gicurasi ndetse no kuva ku wa 1 Ukwakira kugeza ku wa 14 Ugushyingo, umunyamahanga ushaka kuharara, ku ihema rigari abantu bashobora kuraranamo bishyura $195 ku ijoro, umuntu umwe akishyura $265, ihema abana bashobora kuraranamo bakishyura $95 mu gihe ihema ryiyubashye ryishyurwa $280.
Naho mu bihe bibereye ubukerarugendo, umunyamahanga muri Ruzizi yishyura $235 ku ihema ryagutse (Double tent) abantu bashobora kuraranamo, umuntu umwe akishyura $325, aho abana bashobora kurarana bakishyura $115 naho icyumba cyisumbuyeho kikishyurwa $335.
Ibi biciro biragabanuka iyo ari ku banyarwanda cyangwa abanyamahanga bafite ibyemezo byo gutura no gukorera mu Rwanda.

Title: Impamvu u Rwanda rwatoranyijwe kwakira isozwa ryâ€™imurika ryâ€™Ingoro Ndangamurage muri Afurika
Body:
Kuva ku wa 15 Ugushyingo kugera ku wa 31 Ukuboza 2019 mu Ngoro yâ€™Umurage yitiriwe Richard Kandt hari kubera imurika ridahoraho riri mu akomeye muri Afurika rizwi nka Future Africa Visions in Time (FAVT).
Kuva ku wa 15 Ugushyingo kugera ku wa 31 Ukuboza 2019 mu Ngoro yâ€™Umurage yitiriwe Richard Kandt hari kubera imurika ridahoraho riri mu akomeye muri Afurika rizwi nka Future Africa Visions in Time (FAVT).
FAVT ni imurika rizasorezwa mu Rwanda nyuma yo kuzenguruka ibindi bihugu bya Afurika nâ€™ibyo ku yindi migabane bibarizwamo Abanyafurika benshi.
Ryashyizwemo ibihangano bitandukanye byâ€™abahanzi nâ€™abanyabugeni bazwi muri Afurika no mu Rwanda birimo bishushanya urugendo rwâ€™ubumwe nâ€™ubwiyunge no gukira ibikomere nka zimwe mu nsanganyamatsiko zatanzwe ku banyabugeni bashushanyije.
Imurika ryanyuze mu bihugu birimo Kenya, Afurika yâ€™Epfo, Brazil, Zimbabwe, Namibia, Burkina Faso, Cuba, Uganda mbere yo kugera mu Rwanda.
Umuyobozi wâ€™Ingoro yâ€™Umurage yitiriwe Richard Kandt, Rusaro Utamuriza Carine, yavuze ko mu gukusanya ibyamuritswe habajijwe abantu batandukanye barimo abahanzi, abashakashatsi nâ€™abandi icyo batekereza ku hazaza.
Iri murika riri mu Ngoro yo kwa Richard Kandt, ririmo ibihangano byâ€™ubwoko butandukanye, amajwi yâ€™abantu babajijwe yumvikana mu cyumba cyabugenewe ndetse hari nâ€™ahantu ushobora kwicara ukitekerezaho, ukibaza ku hazaza hawe.
Yakomeje ati â€œIri murika ridahoraho ni ryiza cyane ku bashyitsi badusura, mu buzima hari ibyo udatekereza ariko aha ufata umwanya ugatekereza ku byo wakora. Rizafasha abantu kumenya umuco wâ€™u Rwanda.â€
Ni imurika ryitezweho kongera umubare wâ€™amafaranga yinjizwa nâ€™Ingoro Ndangamurage yitiwe Kandt avuye kuri miliyoni 3-4 Frw ya buri kwezi no kuzamura abasura bakarenga 1500.
Umuyobozi wa Goethe Institute Kigali, Katharina Hey, yavuze ko iri murika rizasorezwa mu Rwanda kuko ari igihugu gihagaze neza.
Ati â€œKigali ni icyitegererezo kuri Afurika, iterambere ryâ€™igihugu riha u Rwanda umwanya wihariye utuma rwibandwaho ku Isi yose nâ€™i Burayi. Twatekereje ko hano mu mutima wa Afurika ari ahantu habereye gusorezwa imurika ririmo Abanyafurika.â€™â€™
Yakomeje ati â€œUburyo iri murika rikorwa byerekana ko abantu bashobora kugaragaza ibitekerezo byabo mu buryo butandukanye bufasha ababireba kugerwaho nâ€™ubutumwa.â€™â€™
Mu Rwanda imurika ryahaye umwihariko kwibuka no gukira ibikomere nkâ€™ingingo yâ€™ingenzi ku muryango Nyarwanda.
 Yakomeje ati â€œNi uburyo bwo gutekereza ku hahise hagoye urema ahazaza heza. Hari ibindi bihugu twanyuzemo aho twavuze ku bijyanye nâ€™ubukoloni nâ€™ibindiâ€™â€™
Umunyabugeni Uwase Christa ufite ibihangano bitatu muri iri murika yavuze ko kuba byaratoranyijwe ari ishema kuri we.
Ati â€œNibanze ku nsanganyamatsiko ivuga ku kwibuka no gukira ibikomere. Nahisemo gukira kuko ari ikintu tudakunze kuvuga, mu Rwanda hari Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, kuri njye numva ari icya ngombwa cyo kuganirwaho ngo twitegure kutajyana bya bikomere mu gihe kiri imbere.
Uyu munyabugeni ubimazemo imyaka itanu avuga ko kuganira ku byabaye mu Rwanda bituma abantu bakira ibikomere bityo bigafasha ko habaho kwiyubaka no gutera imbere.
Abahanzi bafite ibihangano muri FAVT barimo Mizero Cedric, Chris Schwagga, Crista Uwase, Uwayo Ingrid, Lilian Magodi, Moses Serubibi, John Kamicha, Sam Hopkins, Rui Assubuj, Sylowia Kyambi nâ€™abandi.
FAVT ni imurika ryatangiye mu 2015, mu Rwanda ryateguwe ku bufatanye bwâ€™Ikigo cyâ€™Ingoro zâ€™Igihugu zâ€™Umurage wâ€™u Rwanda (INMR), Goethe Institute na Kaminuza yo mu Budage ya Bayreuth.

Title: Inyamaswa ziri muri Pariki yâ€™Akagera zageze ku bihumbi 13
Body:
Ibarura rya gatanu rigaragaza imibare yâ€™inyamaswa ziri muri Pariki yâ€™Akagera, ryagaraje ko zimaze kugera ku 13500 zivuye 12000 zabarwaga mu 2017.
Ibarura rya gatanu rigaragaza imibare yâ€™inyamaswa ziri muri Pariki yâ€™Akagera, ryagaraje ko zimaze kugera ku 13500 zivuye 12000 zabarwaga mu 2017.
Kubarura inyamaswa ziri muri iyi pariki byatangiye gukorwa mu 2010 mu ibarura rikorwa buri myaka ibiri. Uyu mwaka ryakozwe hifashijwe indege ya kajugujugu yo mu bwoko bwa AS350 B3 yagenzuye ibice byose bya Pariki.
Imibare itangazwa na Pariki yâ€™Akagera igaragaza ko raporo yâ€™ibarura yerekanye inyamaswa zose ziri muri iyi pariki ari 13500 aho bigaragara ko ziyongereye zikava ku 12000 zabarurwaga mu 2017.
Iyi pariki ni imwe mu zisurwa cyane mu Rwanda aho umubare munini wa ba mukerarugendo bayigana ari abanyarwanda bihariye 50% byâ€™abayisura bose. Mu mwaka ushize yasuwe nâ€™abantu 44000.
Aba bayisuye bayinjirije amadorali miliyoni ebyiri ni ukuvuga amafaranga yâ€™u Rwanda arenga miliyari imwe na miliyoni 800.
Parike yâ€™Igihugu yâ€™Akagera iherereye mu Ntara yâ€™Iburasirazuba yashinzwe mu 1934. Uretse kuba ari ahantu hagizwe nâ€™uduce twâ€™imirambi habereye abahasura, harimo nâ€™inyamanswa zikundwa na ba mukerarugendo nkâ€™Imparage, Udusumbashyamba, Inzovu, Intare, Ingona nâ€™Imvubu biri mu Kiyaga cya Ihema nâ€™andi moko yâ€™inyoni.
Iyi pariki ifite ubuso bungana na kilometero kare 1122, irimo inyamaswa zizwi nka â€˜Big Fiveâ€™ ari zo; Intare, Inkuru, Inzovu, Ingwe nâ€™Imbogo.

Title: Maria Sharapova yashimagije Bisate Eco Lodge yacumbitsemo ari mu Rwanda
Body:
Icyamamare mu mukino wa Tennis, Maria Sharapova, waje mu Rwanda agasura ingagi muri Pariki yâ€™Ibirunga; yashimagije Bisate Eco Lodge yubatse mu gace kâ€™ibirunga mu Majyaruguru yâ€™u Rwanda aho acumbitse.
Icyamamare mu mukino wa Tennis, Maria Sharapova, waje mu Rwanda agasura ingagi muri Pariki yâ€™Ibirunga; yashimagije Bisate Eco Lodge yubatse mu gace kâ€™ibirunga mu Majyaruguru yâ€™u Rwanda aho acumbitse.
Uyu Murusiyakazi yaje mu biruhuko bisanzwe nyuma yâ€™umwaka wâ€™imikino utaramuhiriye, dore ko waranzwe nâ€™imvune zatumye anakina amarushanwa make bikamuviramo no gusubira inyuma ku rutonde rwâ€™uko abakinnyi bahaze mu mukino wa Tennis ku isi.
Yashyize amashusho ku rukuta rwe rwa Instagram yerekana ko yishimiye gucumbikirwa muri Bisate Eco Lodge iri muri hoteli zihenze mu Rwanda.
Aya mashusho yabanjirijwe nâ€™amagambo agira ati â€œMu gace ko mu ishyamba muri Bisate Lodge, Rwanda. Gutembera icyumba kose gutangizwa nâ€™ikimenyetso cyâ€™inkende cyihaniza abashobora gushaka kunkomangira kuraba kwiza [â€¦] Rwanda turagukumbuye.â€
Mu mashusho yagaragaraga ari gutembera mu cyumba cya Bisate Eco Lodge ari kumwe nâ€™ufata amashusho agenda yerekana uko mu cyumba cyâ€™iyi hoteli haba hameze arangije avuga ko ari ahantu heza hateye amabengeza yishimiye kuba.
Bisate Eco Lodge Sharapova yacumbikiwemo, yatashywe na Perezida Paul Kagame tariki ya 1 Nzeri 2017. Yubatse muri Pariki yâ€™Ibirunga aho uba witegeye neza udusongero twâ€™ibirunga bya Bisoke, Kalisimbi na Mikeno.
Iyi hoteli iza mu za mbere zakira ba mukerarugendo bo ku rwego rwo hejuru mu Rwanda, yubatswe nâ€™ikigo Wilderness Safaris. Impumeko yayo yavuye ku miterere yâ€™Ingoro yâ€™Umwami iherereye i Nyanza mu Ntara yâ€™Amajyepfo.
Bisate Lodge ifite ibyumba bitandatu bigiye biteretse mu ishyamba hagati, bisakaje ibyatsi hejuru, ndetse byihagazeho kuko kuharara ijoro rimwe wishyura amadolari ya Amerika ari hagati ya 1100â€“1400.
Sharapova wigeze kuba nimero ya mbere ku isi mu bagore, nâ€™umwe mu bafite amafaranga menshi dore ko yigeze kuba umugore wa mbere mu bakina imikino itandukanye winjiza amafaranga menshi, abikora inshuro 11 zikurikiranya.
Maria Sharapova yabaye nimero ya mbere ku Isi guhera mu 2005, ariko kuri ubu ari kubarizwa ku mwanya wa 132 nyuma yo kwitabira amarushanwa 12 gusa uyu mwaka.

Title: Impamvu yâ€™izina â€˜Kenyaâ€™ ryahawe agasantere kari ku Kirwa cya Bugarura i Rutsiro
Body:
Ku kirwa cya Bugarura, gihereye mu kiyaga cya Kivu mu karere ka Rutsiro mu Murenge wa Boneza, hari agasantere kâ€™ubucuruzi kiswe â€˜Kenyaâ€™. Hari bamwe batangazwa nâ€™iryo zina, bakibaza niba hari aho bihuriye nâ€™igihugu cya Kenya kiri muri Afurika yâ€™iburasirazuba.
Ku kirwa cya Bugarura, gihereye mu kiyaga cya Kivu mu karere ka Rutsiro mu Murenge wa Boneza, hari agasantere kâ€™ubucuruzi kiswe â€˜Kenyaâ€™. Hari bamwe batangazwa nâ€™iryo zina, bakibaza niba hari aho bihuriye nâ€™igihugu cya Kenya kiri muri Afurika yâ€™iburasirazuba.
Munyagitare Epimaque utuye kuri icyo kirwa, asobanura ko hiswe hatyo bikomotse ku buryo hari hashyushye bitewe nâ€™utubari twaho twari dutangiye gucuranga indirimbo zitandukanye.
Ngo byatangiye mu 1993 na mbere yâ€™aho ubwo utubari twajya ducuranga hakoreshejwe radiyo yitwa â€™technicaâ€™ yajyagamo gaseti.
Ati â€œKera hari abantu bacuruzaga za Primus [gahuzamiryango] bityo hazamuka hagaragara neza, abaturage bari bahatuye bitewe nâ€™uko bajyaga bumva ngo hari umujyi wa Kenya, bituma bahitirira ngo ni muri Kenya, kubera ibyishimo byâ€™ukuntu hari hameze, nâ€™umuziki wahabonekaga, icyo gihe kubona radiyo byari imboneka rimwe.â€
Nubwo Munyagitare atibuka neza amazina yâ€™indirimbo zacurangwaga bigatuma hitwa â€˜Kenyaâ€™ ngo hari nkâ€™indirimo yari iharawe baririmbaga bagera hagati bati â€œoye Kenya!â€, â€˜Nairobi Nightâ€™ yâ€™itsinda Lokassa&Soukous nâ€™izindi ziri mu njyana yâ€™injyaruwa.
Ati â€œAbabyeyi bacu nubwo bagiye basaza nibo bayise â€˜Kenyaâ€™ bakurikije ukuntu babonaga hameze neza, hari umuziki usobanutse, ari santere iri gutera imbere, bituma bayitirira â€˜Kenyaâ€™ nkuko bajya bumva kera kuri radiyo abacuranzi bacuranga, bajya kumva bakumva baravuze ngo â€˜oye Kenya!â€™
Mugenzi we Habimana Justin , avuga ko nâ€™abavaga hakurya bazaga kunywera ku kirwa kubera hari agasantere gashyushye.
Ati â€œKenya byatangiye ari agasantere abantu bayihuriramo ari benshi, hari nâ€™abaturukaga hakurya bagahurira hano, noneho babonye ukuntu hari kuzamuka bahagereranya na Kenya.â€
Kuri ubu Kenya yabaye agasantere gasanzwe, kuko hari utundi twayitambutse mu yindi Mirenge yâ€™Akarere ka Rutsiro zirimo Gakeri, Nkomero, Nkora, Gisiza nâ€™izindi.
Ikirwa cya Bugarura kiri nko mu birometero bitatu uvuye ku gice cyâ€™ubutaka mu Murenge wa Boneza. Hari umuriro wâ€™amashanyarazi, amashuri amavuriro nâ€™ubwato bubafasha gushyikirana nâ€™abandi.
Abaturage bahatuye babeshejweho nâ€™imirimo itandukanye irimo uburobyi, ubuhinzi bwiganjemo ubwa kawa nâ€™ibindi.

Title: David Luiz yasuye Singita Kwitonda Lodge ahatera igiti (Amafoto)
Body:
Myugariro wa Arsenal FC David Luiz, uri mu Rwanda mu bikorwa bitandukanye bigamije kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo bwarwo, yasuye Singita Kwitonda Lodge, mu Karere ka Musanze, ahatera igiti.
Myugariro wa Arsenal FC David Luiz, uri mu Rwanda mu bikorwa bitandukanye bigamije kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo bwarwo, yasuye Singita Kwitonda Lodge, mu Karere ka Musanze, ahatera igiti.
Uyu myugariro wa Arsenal ni we mukinnyi wâ€™iyi kipe yo mu Majyaruguru ya Londres mu Bwongereza watoranyijwe ngo asure u Rwanda, mu bikorwa bijyanye nâ€™amasezerano ikipe ye yagiranye narwo yo kwamamaza ubukerarugendo.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu David Luiz yasuye urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali, yunamira abasaga ibihumbi 250 bahashyinguwe, akomereza muri Village Urugwiro yakirwa na Perezida Kagame.
Nyuma yo guhura nâ€™Umukuru wâ€™igihugu, Luiz yerekeje i Musanze asura Singita Kwitonda Lodge, inyubako yo ku rwego rwo hejuru yakira ba mukerarugendo, akaba yanateye igiti muri gahunda yo kwagura Pariki yâ€™Ibirunga no kongera gutera ibiti kuri Singita Kwitonda Lodge.
Yashyizeho icyapa kivuga ko icyo giti cyatewe nkâ€™ikimenyetso cyo kurengera ibidukikije ndetse nâ€™ubufatanye bwâ€™u Rwanda na Arsenal FC.
Singita Kwitonda Lodge igizwe nâ€™inyubako zigezweho zubatse mu Karere ka Musanze mu Murenge wa Nyange, ku birenge byâ€™Ikirunga cya Sabyinyo, aho uba unitegeye ibirunga bya Gahinga na Muhabura.
Singita Kwitonda Lodge yubatswe ahantu hahoze igishanga cyari urwuri, ariko ubu hashibutse umushinga ukomeye wâ€™ubukerarugendo ugizwe nâ€™inzu umunani zubatswe mu buryo zirengera ibidukikije.
Zirimo zirindwi zagenewe umuntu umwe cyangwa uherekejwe kuko buri imwe ifite uburiri bumwe, uruganiriro rwagutse nâ€™ibindi byangombwa nkenerwa.
Kuri Singita Kwitonda Lodge, Luiz yahuye na Guverineri wâ€™Intara yâ€™Amajyaruguru, Gatabazi Jean Marie Vianney, Umuyobozi wâ€™abarinda Pariki yâ€™Ibirunga, Prosper Uwingeli na Eugene Mutangana wo mu ishami ryâ€™ubukerarugendo mu kigo cyâ€™igihugu cyâ€™iterambere (RDB).
Biteganyijwe ko kuri uyu wa Gatandatu 17h00, Luiz agirana ikiganiro nâ€™abanyamakuru kuri Kigali Convention Centre, akazasubira mu Bwongereza kuri uyu wa Kane.
Muri Gicurasi 2018 nibwo u Rwanda rwinjiye mu bufatanye bwâ€™imyaka itatu na Arsenal FC, bugamije kurumenyekanisha u Rwanda nkâ€™icyerekezo gikomeye cyâ€™ubukerarugendo nâ€™ishoramari, binyuze mu gushyira ikirango â€˜Visit Rwandaâ€™ ku kuboko kwâ€™ibumoso ku myenda yayo.

Title: Abakora ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco na siporo bagiye gukorera ku igenamigambi bahuriyeho
Body:
Abafatanyabikorwa ba Minisiteri yâ€™umuco na Siporo, bahurira mu bukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco na siporo bashyizeho igenamigambi bahuriyeho hagamijwe guteza imbere urwo rwego no gukoresha neza amahirwe arurimo.
Abafatanyabikorwa ba Minisiteri yâ€™umuco na Siporo, bahurira mu bukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco na siporo bashyizeho igenamigambi bahuriyeho hagamijwe guteza imbere urwo rwego no gukoresha neza amahirwe arurimo.
Mu nama ya mbere yahuje abahurirye mu bukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco na siporo (cultural and Sport Tourism Cluster) kuri uyu wa Kane, bamwe mu bagize iryo huriro bagaragaje ko riziye igihe kuko hari byinshi rizabafasha mu iterambere ryâ€™ibikorwa byabo.
Eugene Bridge uyobora ihuriro rishinzwe umuco nâ€™amateka muri sosiyete itwara ikanayobora ba mukerarugendo (RSGA) avuga ko bizatuma imikorere igenda neza kandi ibyerekeye akazi kabo bakabiganiriramo.
Ati â€œNiba tumaze kuhabona [ahabera ubukerarugendo] tumenye ngo hari ibikorwa remezo byo kuhagera, niba hakenewe umuhanda tubigaragaze. Hari ikindi ukajya nko ku rutare rwa Ndaba, urwa Kamegeri ntumenye niba biri mu maboko ya RDB, Akarere cyangwa undi wundi? Ibyo byose rero jye nishimye tuzajya tubihera umurongo muri iri huriro.â€
Yavuze kandi ko ahabera ubukerarugendo cyane ubushingiye ku muco, hazajya hahora ibya ngombwa nkenerwa, kuburyo igihe cyose bazajya bahajyana ba mukerarugendo bazi ko bimeze neza.
Amb. Robert Masozera, Umuyobozi wâ€™ingoro zâ€™umurage wâ€™u Rwanda akaba nâ€™umuhuzabikorwa wâ€™iryo huriro, yabwiye IGIHE umusaruro ukomeye wâ€™iyo nama ya mbere ari ugushyiraho igenamigambi bahuriyeho.
Ati â€œ Haravamo ikintu kimwe gikomeye cyane. Ni ukuvuga ngo umuntu wese waje hano yaje azanye igenamigambi nibura muri uyu mwaka turimo. Turaza gufata ibikorwa bya buri muntu tugerageze kubishyira mu mbonerahamwe imwe tugire igenamigambi duhuriyeho twese. Turinoze, tuvanemo bya bindi bigongana, tuvanemo bimwe byahuraga, duhurize hamwe ariko noneho tugirane inama yo gukora nkâ€™umuntu umwe turashaka noneho kujya dukora tudatatanye.â€
Gukorera hamwe bikazatuma urwego rwâ€™ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco na siporo rutera imbere, rugateza imbere abarukoramo ndetse rukazamura ubukungu bwâ€™igihugu.
Yakomeje avuga ko ibyo bizatuma amasoko ya ngombwa yose bayabyaza umusaruro.
Ati â€œ Dukore nkâ€™abantu bamwe batahiriza umugozi umwe, bajya imigambi imwe. Kuko muri iki gihugu twaje gusanga harimo amahirwe, tutajyaga dukoresha. Dutanze nkâ€™urugero izi nama zibera hano nini cyane, hari iyi ya Youth Connect hari nâ€™izindi, turi kwibaza ngo aba bashyitsi nibaza ko ari twebwe dufite ibicuruzwa, ni uwuhe musururo tuzabyaza izo nama kandi tukabikora tudatatanye.â€
Masozera yakomeje agira ati â€œTwebwe mu ngoro zâ€™umurage dufite ingoro zâ€™umurage ariko ntabwo dufite ababashaka, hari abandi bafite amahoteri, hari abandi bafite amaresitora, hari abandi bafite ibikorwa byâ€™ubukorikori, hari abandi bafite imbyino tukavuga tuti ni gute twakora nkâ€™ikintu kimwe. Abantu bari hano dukoze nkâ€™umuntu umwe twakora uruhererekane bigatuma wa mushyitsi waje azi ko amara iminsi itatu ine gusa hano yâ€™imana, tumugumana igihe kirekire mu bukerarugendo turavuga ngo uko umuntu atinda ninako asiga amafaranga, niko ya mirimo iboneka.â€
Ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco na siporo burimo; ingoro zâ€™umurage, ahantu Nyaburaga, imikino nâ€™amarushanwa atandukanye nâ€™aho bibera, imbyino, ubugeni nâ€™ibyerekeye Sinema na muzika.
Ishami ryâ€™Umuryango wâ€™Abibumbye rishinzwe guteza imbere ubukerarugendo (UNWTO) rigaragaza ko, Abakerarugendo 37% basura ahantu bashingiye ku byiza nyaburanga byâ€™umuco bihari ndetse abagera kuri 57% bahitamo ibihugu bazajya kuruhukiramo bagendeye ku byiza nyaburanga byâ€™umuco bihari.
Mu Rwanda nta mibare igaragaza ibyinjizwa nâ€™ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco byâ€™umwihariko. Cyakora Imibare yâ€™ikigo cyâ€™igihugu cyâ€™iterambere igaragaza ko mu mwaka wa 2017 ubukerarugendo bwinjirije u Rwanda miliyoni $401, ariko intego ni ukugera kuri miliyoni $ 800 mu 2024.

Title: David Luiz ukinira Arsenal ategerejwe mu Rwanda
Body:
